label: Name:SRTG
value: 萨拉托加炮艇机
translated: Saratoga Gunship

label: Name:HOLO
value: 自由之锤
translated: Hammer of Freedom

label: Name:AIPA
value: 机库
translated: Hangar

label: Name:DELTA
value: 试验体-德尔塔
translated: Delta

label: Name:EOFB
value: 命运之瞳（建造中）
translated: Eye of Fate (Under Construction)

label: Name:EOFD
value: 不明残骸
translated: Unidentified Wreckage

label: Name:YADEPT
value: 心能尖塔
translated: Psychic Spire

label: Name:YACASE
value: 尤里计算主机
translated: Yuri Compute Host

label: Name:YASPCO
value: 意念核心
translated: Spiritual Core

label: Name:STHP
value: 暴风直升机
translated: Storm Chopper

label: Name:CACB01
value: 工业建筑
translated: Industrial Building

label: Name:CACOMO
value: 教堂
translated: Church

label: Name:CAGCUG
value: 车库
translated: Garage

label: Name:CARPUB
value: 农场
translated: Farm

label: Name:NEMESIS
value: 复仇女神轰炸机
translated: Nemesis Bomber

label: LDU:0
value: 林德拉克计划 - 美国篇：自由重锤落下
translated: Rynderack Project - United States: Hammer of Freedom Drops

label: LDR:0
value: 林德拉克计划 - 心灵起义军篇：高尔顿的遗愿
translated: Rynderack Project - Psychic Rebellion: Galton's Last Wish

label: LDU:B001
value: 美国，内华达州沙漠。
translated: Nevada Desert, United States.

label: LDU:BT001
value: 正在传输 计算主机A -> 计算主机B
translated: Transmitting: Host A -> Host B

label: LDU:BT002
value: 正在传输 计算主机B -> 计算主机C
translated: Transmitting: Host B -> Host C

label: LDU:BT003
value: 正在传输 计算主机C -> 计算主机D
translated: Transmitting: Host C -> Host D

label: LDU:BT004
value: 正在传输 计算主机D -> 丢失
translated: Transmitting: Host D -> Lost

label: LDU:BT005
value: [当前数据包数量] 已拦截 : 计算主机A : 计算主机B
translated: [Number of packets] Intercepted : Host A: Host B

label: LDU:BT006
value: [当前数据包数量] 已拦截 : 计算主机B : 计算主机C
translated: [Number of packets] Intercepted : Host B: Host C

label: LDU:BT007
value: [当前数据包数量] 已拦截 : 计算主机C : 计算主机D
translated: [Number of packets] Intercepted : Host C: Host D

label: LDU:BT008
value: [当前数据包数量] 已拦截 : 计算主机D : 丢失
translated: [Number of packets] Intercepted : Host D: Lost

label: LDU:BT009
value: [当前数据包数量] 计算主机A : 计算主机B
translated: [Number of packets] Host A : Host B

label: LDU:BT010
value: [当前数据包数量] 计算主机B : 计算主机C
translated: [Number of packets] Host B : Host C

label: LDU:BT011
value: [当前数据包数量] 计算主机C : 计算主机D
translated: [Number of packets] Host C : Host D

label: LDU:BT012
value: [当前数据包数量] 计算主机D : 丢失
translated: [Number of packets] Host D : Lost

label: Name:CADVRP
value:
欢迎来到内华达州死亡谷
死亡谷位于加州和内华达州边界，是北美洲最低、最干旱的地区，
有“死火山口”、“干骨谷”和“葬礼山”等不祥的别称。
translated:
Welcome to Death Valley, Nevada
Located on the border of California and Nevada. Death Valley is the lowest and driest region in North America, with ominous nicknames such as "Dead Crater", "Dry Bone Valley" and "Funeral Mountain".

label: Name:PWRY
value: 超级电站
translated: Super Power Station

label: Name:CACTMG
value: 通讯塔
translated: Communication Tower

label: Name:PWRZ
value: 单位负载
translated: Unit load

label: LDU:B002
value: 指挥官，我们检测到位于内华达州的数据传输链路出现了异常。
translated: Commander, we have detected an anomaly in the data transmission link in Nevada.

label: LDU:B003
value: 一支维修小队已经到达。请沿传输线路进行检查，排除异常状况。
translated: Maintenance crew have arrived. Please inspect along the transmission link and troubleshoot the issue.

label: LDU:B004
value: 任务目标 - 检查内华达州沙漠的数据传输链路。
translated: Mission Objective - Inspect the data transmission link in the Nevada desert.

label: LDU:B005
value: 「工程师：“这里气氛不太对劲！可没人通知过我们这里有敌人！”」
translated: Engineer: "Something is wrong here! No one informed us about the enemies!"

label: LDU:B006
value: 注意 - 情况有变！ 请立刻中止此次行动！
translated: Attention - Situation has changed! Abort the mission immediately!

label: LDU:B007
value: 警告 - 我们在数据传输链路上发现了尤里残部的计算主机和防守部队。
translated: Warning - We have discovered Yuri's compute hosts and defending forces on the data transmission link.

label: LDU:B008
value: 敌人的数量看起来不少，我们会派遣更多的部队前往此区域。
translated: There are considerable amount of enemy. We will send more troops to the area.

label: LDU:B009
value: 看起来他们有所警觉了，正在将计算主机中的数据传输走，不让我们得到。
translated: They might be aware of this and are transferring data from the compute hosts away.

label: LDU:B010
value: 我们需要尽快占领那些计算主机，以截获足够的数据进行分析。
translated: We need to seize those compute hosts as quickly as possible to intercept data for analysis.

label: LDU:B011
value: 任务目标 - 占领并保护所有计算主机。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture and protect all compute hosts.

label: LDU:B012
value: 任务目标 - 不能丢失10个数据包。
translated: Mission Objective - Do not lose 10 data packets.

label: LDU:B013
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 一座计算主机被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Compute host destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:B014
value: 援军已经进入死亡谷区域，接下来他们由你来指挥。
translated: Reinforcements have entered the Death Valley area. They are now under your command.

label: LDU:BT013
value: 注意 - 计算主机A中的数据包已经传输完成，开始下一阶段传输。
translated: Note - The data packet in Host A has been transmitted. The next phase of transmission has begun.

label: LDU:BT014
value: 注意 - 计算主机B中的数据包已经传输完成，开始下一阶段传输。
translated: Note - The data packet in Host B has been transmitted. The next phase of transmission has begun.

label: LDU:BT015
value: 注意 - 计算主机C中的数据包已经传输完成，开始下一阶段传输。
translated: Note - The data packet in Host C has been transmitted. The next phase of transmission has begun.

label: LDU:BT016
value: 注意 - 计算主机D中的数据包已经传输完成。
translated: Note - The data packet in compute host D has been transmitted.

label: LDU:BT017
value: 虽然其中已经没有数据包了，但你仍需要占领它。
translated: There is no packet left, but you still need to capture it.

label: LDU:BT018
value: 干的漂亮！我们已经拦截足够多的数据包了。
translated: Great job! We have intercepted enough packets.

label: LDU:BT019
value: 已占领计算主机A。
translated: The compute host A has been captured.

label: LDU:BT020
value: 已占领计算主机B。
translated: The compute host B has been captured.

label: LDU:BT021
value: 已占领计算主机C。
translated: The compute host C has been captured.

label: LDU:BT022
value: 已占领计算主机D。
translated: The compute host D has been captured.

label: LDU:BT023
value: 但是剩下的计算主机仍然需要我们去占领。
translated: But the remaining compute hosts still need to be captured.

label: LDU:BT024
value: 警告 - 尤里残部正在通过信号塔把计算主机D中的数据包发送出去！
translated: WARNING - Yuri's remnants are sending data packets from Compute Host D through the communication tower!

label: LDU:BT025
value: 警告 - 一旦数据包被发送出去，它就真的“丢失”了！
translated: WARNING - once a packet has been sent, it is irreversibly "lost"!

label: LDU:BT026
value: 丧失关键目标 - 丢失了10个数据包，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNITS LOST - 10 packets lost, mission failed.

label: LDU:BZ001
value: 美国，内华达州沙漠。
translated: Nevada Desert, United States.

label: LDU:BZ002
value: 「夜鹰直升机：“前面已经没有路了。”」
translated: Nighthawk: "There is no road ahead."

label: LDU:BZ000
value: 美国附加任务 - 「未授权访问」
translated: US Hidden Mission - "Unauthorized Access"

label: LDU:BZ003
value: 通过从仁川的那座计算主机中得到的数据，我们锁定了这附近的一个坐标。
translated: Using the data obtained from the compute host in Incheon, we locked on a coordinate nearby.

label: LDU:BZ004
value: 为了弄清楚这个坐标的意义，一支侦查小队已经进入沙漠深处。
translated: To find out the meaning of this coordinate, a scout team has entered the depths of the desert.

label: LDU:ZCtrl
value: --作战控制连线--
translated: --Battle Control Online--

label: LDR:ZCtrl
value: --作战控制连线--
translated: --Battle Control Online--

label: LDU:BZ005
value: 任务目标 - 前往并侦查指定坐标。
translated: Mission Objective - Scout the specified location.

label: LDU:BT027
value: 太棒了，指挥官！你提前切断了后续的数据链路，他们无法再把数据转移了。
translated: Excellent, Commander! You cut off the data link in advance. They can no longer transmit the data.

label: LDU:BT028
value: 他们正在把剩余的数据包继续向后传输。我们得加快进度追上他们。
translated: They are sending the remaining packets. We need to speed up to catch them.

label: LDU:BT029
value: 所有的计算主机都已被占领，任务完成。
translated: All compute hosts have been captured, objective complete.

label: LDU:B015
value: 提示 - 除了提供优秀的地勤以外，我们的空指部已经可以提供伞兵支援。
translated: Hint - In addition to excellent ground support, our Air Command can provide paratroopers.

label: LDU:BT030
value: 他们好像遇到了点故障。无论如何，现在传输中断了，这对于我们来说是个好机会。
translated: They seem to have had some problems with the transmission. Anyway, it's a good opportunity for us.

label: LDU:Selector
value: 点击一面国旗，选择要进入的关卡。
translated: Click on a flag to select the level you want to enter.

label: LDR:FZ000
value: 心灵起义军附加任务 - 「弃子」
translated: Psychic Rebellion Hidden Mission - "The Abandoned"

label: LDR:Selector
value: 点击一面旗帜，选择要进入的关卡。
translated: Click on a flag to select the level you want to enter.

label: Name:YURIFLAG
value: 尤里国旗
translated: Yuri Flag

label: LDU:BT031
value: 警告 - 你需要占领这些计算主机，不能摧毁它们！
translated: WARNING - You need to capture these compute hosts, not destroy them!

label: LDU:BT032
value: 警告 - 计算主机正在受到攻击！不能让它们被摧毁！
translated: WARNING - Compute Hosts are under attack! Do not let them be destroyed!

label: LDU:B016
value: 提示 - 这些高处的尤里雕像可能会有些麻烦，记得提前使用空军摧毁它们。
translated: Hint - These Yuri statues can be troublesome, remember to destroy them with air force in advance.

label: LDU:B017
value: 我们的目标是截获数据包，可以暂时不用去管这里的尤里基地，至少现在没必要。
translated: Our goal is to intercept data packets. We don't need to deal with the Yuri base here for now.

label: LDU:HEasy
value: 难度 - 休闲
translated: Difficulty - Casual

label: LDU:HMid
value: 难度 - 正常
translated: Difficulty - Normal

label: LDU:HHard
value: 难度 - 折翼
translated: Difficulty - Broken Wings

label: LDU:B018
value: 「工程师：“我们是不是已经偏离了预定的检修路线了？我可不想在沙漠中迷路。”」
translated: Engineer: "Have we strayed off the planned route? I don't want to get lost in the desert."

label: LDU:B019
value: 提示 - 一批幻影坦克小队已经到达。
translated: Hint - A squad of Mirage Tanks has arrived.

label: LDU:B020
value: 「“我也搞不懂，他们是怎么骗过我们的情报网，在我们的眼皮底下建立这么多军事设施的？”」
translated: "I don't understand how they managed to build this many military facilities right under our noses."

label: LDU:B021
value: 这些“杀人工厂”确实都该被销毁。
translated: These "killing factories" should indeed be destroyed.

label: LDU:B022
value: 「工程师：“时间浪费太多了！我们是来检修数据线路的，不是来沙漠一日游的！”」
translated: Engineer: "We're wasting too much time! We're here to repair, not take a day trip in the desert!"

label: LDU:B023
value: 全军覆没 - 我方作战部队全部被消灭，任务失败。
translated: ALL UNITS LOST - All our combat units are lost, mission failed.

label: LDU:BC
value: 分析数据已经回传。从目前的解析来看，我们似乎能够窥视到，这是一个庞大计划的冰山一角……
translated: The data has been sent back. From what we know so far, this is just the tip of the iceberg of a huge plan...

label: LDU:B024
value: 一支海豹小组已经乘直升机前来支援，善用他们。
translated: A SEAL team has arrived by air for support, make good use of them.

label: LDU:B025
value: 提示 - 使用直升机运送步兵占据这些高耸的岩柱，有利于我们防守基地。
translated: Hint - Use helicopters to transport infantry to these towering rock pillars to help defend the base.

label: LDU:B026
value: 警告 - 敌人的复制中心似乎在全力运作，产生大量的狂兽人！
translated: WARNING - The enemy's cloning vats are spawning a large numbers of Brutes!

label: LDU:B027
value: 提示 - 夺回这些油井，你就可以得到更多的战争经费。
translated: Hint - Capture these oil derricks to get more funding.

label: LDU:B028
value: 好的，有了这些信号发射塔，我们就可以对此地区进行地图测绘。
translated: OK, with these communication towers we can map the area.

label: LDU:B030
value: 发生什么了？为什么他们的数据包传输停止了？
translated: What happened? Why did their transmission stop?

label: LDU:BZ006
value: 警告 - 检测到尤里残部的部队！请小心对付他们。
translated: Warning - Yuri's remnants detected! Be careful.

label: LDU:HExtra
translated: Difficulty - ???

label: LDU:BZ007
value: 「海豹突击队：“在前面我们可能随时会遇到敌人，还是要多加小心。”」
translated: Navy SEAL: "We may encounter enemies at any time now. We should be more careful."

label: LDU:BZ008
value: 这里有一座废弃的前哨站。或许这里的设施以后能派上用场？
translated: There is an abandoned outpost here. Perhaps it can be useful in the future?

label: LDU:BZ009
value: 前哨站附近的敌人已经被肃清。如果以后有需要的话，我们随时会派遣工程师来修复这里。
translated: The enemy forces near the outpost have been cleared. We will send engineers to repair it when needed.

label: LDU:BZ010
value: 提示 - 肃清此处前哨站盘踞的敌人，然后我们会在这里空降工程师进行修复。
translated: Hint - Clear out the enemies entrenched in this outpost. Then, we'll drop engineers in to repair it.

label: LDU:BZ011
value: 前哨站的敌人已经被肃清。工程师马上就会抵达。
translated: The outpost has been cleared. Engineers will arrive shortly.

label: LDU:BZ012
value: 工程师已到达。他们会修复此前哨站的设施。
translated: Engineers have arrived. They will repair this outpost.

label: LDU:BZ013
value: 我们还是把注意力转回到侦查的事情上来吧。
translated: Let's return to the investigation.

label: LDU:BZ014
value: 注意 - 我们发现沙漠里埋藏着异常的东西！ 好像是一块巨大的残骸！
translated: Attention - We found something unusual buried in the desert! Looks like a giant piece of debris!

label: LDU:BZ015
value: 警告 - 尤里残部的部队发现了我们在接近，并正在试图销毁那块残骸！
translated: Warning - Yuri's remnants have spotted our approach. They are attempting to destroy the wreckage!

label: LDU:BZ016
value: 敌人要销毁的东西，肯定是对于我们有价值的！ 请立刻去保护它！！！
translated: Whatever they want to destroy must be valuable to us! Please secure it immediately!!!

label: LDU:BZ017
value: 任务目标 - 保护不明残骸，直到运输小队到达。
translated: Mission Objective - Secure the unidentified wreckage until the moving crew arrive.

label: LDU:BZ018
value: 警告 - 附近检测到尤里残部的部队活动！
translated: Warning - Yuri's remnants activity detected nearby!

label: LDU:BZ019
value: 提示 - 我们的侦察小队缺乏重火力，难以与成规模的敌人部队抗衡，请尽量避开他们。
translated: Hint - Our reconnaissance force lacks firepower. Please avoid direct confrontation with the enemy.

label: LDU:BZ020
value: 我们已经紧急抽调了一支空降部队前来支援。
translated: We have urgently dispatched an airborne force to provide support.

label: LDU:BZ021
value: 一些遥控坦克也正在通过空投的方式抵达。
translated: Some robot tanks are also arriving via airdrop.

label: LDU:BZ022
value: 这种轻型坦克通过远程遥控来作战，完全不会受精神控制和混乱武器的影响。
translated: These light tank operates by remote control and is immune to mind control and chaos weapons.

label: LDU:BZ023
value: 提示 - 更多的空降部队已经抵达。
translated: Hint - More airborne troops have arrived.

label: LDU:BZ024
value: 提示 - 更多的遥控坦克已经通过空投抵达。
translated: Hint - More robot tanks have arrived via airdrop.

label: LDU:BZ025
value: 警告 - 我们检测到更多的病毒狙击手正在进入战场！
translated: WARNING - More Virus Snipers entering the battlefield!

label: LDU:BZ026
value: 警告 - 我们检测到大规模的敌人部队正在此地区集结！
translated: WARNING - We have detected a large enemy force massing in the area!

label: LDU:BZ027
value: 一支火箭飞行兵部队也随工程师抵达。
translated: A squad of rocketeers also arrived with the engineers.

label: LDU:BZ028
value: 提示 - 一些火箭飞行兵与幻影坦克已经抵达。
translated: Hint - Some rocketeers and Mirage Tanks have arrived.

label: LDU:BZ029
value: 「海豹突击队： “原来是沙丘掩埋了这里的道路。又有多少秘密，被掩埋在这片沙漠之中呢……”」
translated: Navy SEAL: "The road here was buried by the sand dunes. How many secrets are hidding in this desert..."

label: LDU:BZ030
value: 等一下，他们好像突然无心恋战了？为什么他们都在撤退？
translated: Wait, why are they all retreating?

label: LDU:BZ031
value: 成功保护不明残骸，任务完成。
translated: Successfully secured the unidentified wreckage, objective complete.

label: LDU:BZ032
value: 全军覆没 - 侦察小队无人生还，任务失败。
translated: All units lost - The reconnaissance team has been wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDU:BZ033
value: 丧失关键目标 - 不明残骸被销毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - unidentified wreckage destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:BZ034
value: 等等，他们在做什么？？！
translated: Wait, what are they doing??!

label: LDU:BZ035
value: 警告 - 残骸正在受到攻击，不能让它被摧毁！
translated: WARNING - The wreck is under attack, don't let it be destroyed!

label: LDU:BZ036
value: 警告 - 残骸的耐久度已降到50%以下！
translated: WARNING - The durability of the wreckage has dropped below 50%!

label: LDU:BZ037
value: 警告 - 残骸的耐久度已降到25%以下！
translated: WARNING - The durability of the wreckage has dropped below 25%!

label: LDU:BZ038
value: 好了，残骸已经在我们的控制之下了……吗？
translated: Okay, the wreckage is under our control... or is it?

label: LDU:BZ039
value: 抢运小队已经在路上了，但他们可能还会反扑。我们得做好万全的准备。
translated: The moving crew is on the way, but the enemy may fight back. We must be fully prepared.

label: LDU:BZ040
value: 工程师马上会空降到这座前哨站。看来这些废弃设施真的要派上用场了。
translated: Engineers will be airdropped to this outpost soon. These abandoned facilities really come in handy.

label: LDU:BZ041
value: 我们在这里检测到一座被敌人占据的前哨站。
translated: We have detected an enemy outpost here.

label: LDU:BZ042
value: 警告 - 尤里的残部在此处建立了……一座基地？！
translated: Warning - The Yuri's remnants have established... a base here?!

label: LDU:BZ043
value: 有没有搞错？！他们就那么执着于这块大型破烂吗？
translated: Seriously?! Are they so obsessed with this giant piece of junk?

label: LDU:BZ044
value: 干得漂亮，指挥官，你挫败了他们在这里建造基地的企图！
translated: Well done, Commander, you've thwarted their attempt to build a base here!

label: LDU:BZ045
value: 尤里残部的军队已经撤离，他们放弃了和我们争夺残骸。
translated: Yuri's remanats have withdrawn. They have given up on the wreckage.

label: Name:YURIFLAG2
value: 尤里旗帜
translated: Yuri Flag

label: Name:CAIBUS
value:
为一个普通士兵竖立的雕塑
纪念每一个为全人类解放事业而战斗的同志。
translated:
Sculpture for Ordinary Soldier
To commemorate every comrade who fought for human liberation.

label: LDU:BZ046
value: 我们最好保持低调直奔目标，否则尤里的残部可能会发现我们的行踪，然后做出反应。
translated: It's better to keep a low profile and head straight for the target, otherwise Yuri's remnants may spot us.

label: LDU:BZ047
value: 我想我们应该更加抓紧时间了。敌人不会对我们的搜索行动坐视不理的。
translated: I think we should hurry up. The enemy will not sit quiet while we search.

label: LDU:BZ048
value: 不要再浪费时间了，指挥官！再这样下去，我们要搜索的东西恐怕要永远埋藏在沙漠中了！
translated: Don't waste more time, Commander! If this continues, we may never find it in the desert!

label: LDR:B001
value: 苏联，西伯利亚地区，雅库茨克。
translated: Yakutsk, Siberia, USSR.

label: LDR:B002
value: 「雷鸣潜艇： “让我们开始吧！”」
translated: Boomer Submarine: "Let's get started!"

label: LDR:B003
value: 「试验体-德尔塔：“他们已经在这片区域有相当庞大的势力，但他们的防御也并不是滴水不漏。”」
translated: Delta: "They already have a considerable presence in this area, but their defenses are not impenetrable."

label: LDR:B004
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “登岸之前，再来温习一遍我们之前制定的计划吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Before landing, let's review the plan we made earlier."

label: LDR:B005
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “首先，我们需要想办法接近那座心灵控制器，然后我就能尝试掌握它的控制权限。”」
translated: Delta: "First, we need to get close to the Psychic Dominator. Then I can try to take over it."

label: LDR:B006
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “然后，使用心灵控制器摧毁这里的心灵信标，雅库茨克城区的苏联部队受到的心灵控制就会被解除。”」
translated: Delta: "Then, use the Psychic Dominator to destroy the Psychic Beacon. This will free the Soviet troops."

label: LDR:B007
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “虽然我不指望他们和我们成为伙伴——只需要他们能在这里制造充分的混乱就够了。”」
translated: Delta: "Although I don't expect them to become our allies, they are useful enough to create chaos here."

label: LDR:B008
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “接下来，我们需要趁乱抢夺一座尤里基地，并把它打包成移动基地车带离这里。”」
translated: Delta: "Next, we need to capture a Yuri base amid chaos, pack it into a MCV to take it away."

label: LDR:B009
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们会很快察觉这里的异常，并采取反制措施的。我们的最优策略是快抢快走，见好就收。”」
translated: Delta: "They will soon find out and take countermeasures. Our best bet is to snatch and run."

label: LDR:B010
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “都记好了吗？”」
translated: Delta: "Do you copy?"

label: LDR:B011
value: 「林德拉克： “明白。唉，虽然是在自己熟悉的土地上，但寄人篱下的感觉还是不让人感到安心啊……”」
translated: Rynderack: "Copy. Alas, even on my homeland, living under someone else's roof still makes me uneasy..."

label: LDR:B012
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “其实我并没有命令你的意思……但在你沉睡期间，世界真的发生了很大的变化，需要你重新来适应。”」
translated: Delta: "I don't mean to give order…, but the world has changed, and you need to adapt to it."

label: LDR:B013
value: 「林德拉克： “雅库茨克可能已经不是我记忆里的样子了……不过也顾不得想那么多了，要上了！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Yakutsk may not be what I remembered…, but there is no time to think about it, let's go!"

label: LDR:B014
value: 任务目标 - 让试验体-德尔塔靠近心灵控制器。
translated: Mission Objective - Get Delta close to the Psychic Dominator.

label: LDR:B015
value: 任务目标 - 使用心灵控制器摧毁心灵信标。
translated: Mission Objective - Use the Psychic Dominator to destroy the Psychic Beacon.

label: LDR:B016
value: 任务目标 - 前往隧道口，与起义军小队会合。
translated: Mission Objective - Meet up with the rebel forces at the tunnel entrance.

label: LDR:B017
value: 任务目标 - 占领一座尤里建造厂，并将其打包成移动基地车。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture a Yuri construction yard and pack it into a MCV.

label: LDR:B018
value: 任务目标 - 护送尤里基地车到达撤离点。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort the Yuri MCV to the evacuation point.

label: LDR:B019
value: 任务目标 - 林德拉克和试验体-德尔塔不能阵亡。
translated: Mission Objective - Keep Rynderack and Delta alive.

label: LDR:B020
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “现在去进攻这里的基地是徒劳无功的，还可能会引起他们的警觉。”」
translated: Delta: "It is futile to attack the base here now. It may also arouse their vigilance."

label: LDR:B021
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们最好还是绕开这里，换另一条路。”」
translated: Delta: "We'd better avoid this place and take another route."

label: LDR:B022
value: 警告 - 检测到尤里雕像！
translated: WARNING - YURI STATUE DETECTED!

label: LDR:B023
value: 「林德拉克： “该死！最近的路被一座尤里雕像封锁了，我们没办法通过这里。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn it! The nearest road is blocked by a Yuri statue, we can't get through here."

label: LDR:B024
value: 「林德拉克： “但是我印象里西侧有一条直通雅库茨克城区的小路，我们可以走走看。”」
translated: Rynderack: "But I remember there is a path on the west that leads to the city. We can have a try."

label: LDR:B025
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “什么，这种事情你还记得吗？！”」
translated: Delta: "What, you still remember that?!"

label: LDR:B026
value: 「林德拉克： “当然，当然。当年我刚入伍的时候，就经常顺这条路从驻地溜去城镇喝酒……”」
translated: Rynderack: "Of course. When I first joined the army, I often took this path from to the town to drink..."

label: LDR:B027
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “城市里面都是被心灵控制的苏军。我们最好远离城区，傍山行进。”」
translated: Delta: "The city is full of Soviet troops. We'd better stay away from the it and move along the mountain."

label: LDR:B028
value: 「林德拉克： “见鬼，这里的上坡路怎么坍塌了？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn it, the road is blocked by the landslide"

label: LDR:B029
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不慌，我应该能用我的修复性心灵能量来让这个上坡路复原……”」
translated: Delta: "Don't panic. I should be able to fix it with my restorative psychic power..."

label: LDR:B030
value: 丧失关键单位 - 林德拉克阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Rynderack is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:B031
value: 丧失关键单位 - 试验体-德尔塔阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Delta is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:B032
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 心灵控制器在被用于摧毁心灵信标之前被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - The Psychic Dominator is destroyed before destroying Psychic Beacon, mission failed.

label: LDR:B033
value: 丧失关键单位 - 失去了所有工程师，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNITS LOST - All Engineers are lost, mission failed.

label: LDR:B034
value: 丧失关键目标 - 地图上已经没有尤里基地和尤里基地车，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - There are no Yuri bases and MCVs on the map, mission failed.

label: LDR:HEasy
value: 难度 - 休闲
translated: Difficulty - Casual

label: LDR:HMid
value: 难度 - 正常
translated: Difficulty - Normal

label: LDR:HHard
value: 难度 - 脑死
translated: Difficulty - Brain Dead

label: LDR:HExtra
translated: Difficulty - ???

label: LDR:B035
value: 警告 - 我们的渗透行动已暴露！
translated: WARNING - OUR INFILTRATION HAS BEEN EXPOSED!

label: LDR:B036
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们在派出镭射幽浮搜索我们！快隐蔽！”」
translated: Delta: "They are sending floating discs to search for us! Take cover!"

label: LDR:B037
value: 警告 - 被心控的苏联基地好像已经察觉到了我们的渗透行动！
translated: Warning - The Soviet base seems to have noticed our infiltration!

label: LDR:B038
value: 「林德拉克： “他们开始用铁幕持续保护心灵信标了！”」
translated: Rynderack: "They are using the Iron Curtain to continuously protect the Psychic Beacon!"

label: LDR:B039
value: 未能达成目标 - 引起了被心控苏联部队的注意，任务失败。
translated: Failed to achieve objective - attracted the attention of mind-controlled Soviet forces, mission failed.

label: LDR:B040
value: 试验体-德尔塔已经到达心灵控制器附近，目标完成。
translated: Delta has reached the vicinity of the Psychic Dominator. Objective Completed.

label: LDR:B041
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我可以把我的心灵能量接入这座心灵控制器……”」
translated: Delta: "I can connect my psychic energy to this Psychic Dominator..."

label: LDR:B042
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “搞定了。在被他们发现之前，我们赶紧执行下一步计划吧”」
translated: Delta: "Done. Let's quickly execute the next move before they find us."

label: LDR:B043
value: 距离被发现所剩时间
translated: Time left until exposure

label: LDR:B044
value: 已成功使用心灵控制器摧毁心灵信标，目标完成。
translated: Successfully destroyed the Psychic Beacon. Objective Completed.

label: LDR:B045
value: 「林德拉克： “好了，西伯利亚驻守部队受到的心灵控制已经解除了——至少暂时解除了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Well, the Siberian garrison are freed from mind control - at least temporarily."

label: LDR:B046
value: 「林德拉克： “他们应该会向尤里的基地发起猛攻……至少在攻坚方面我是最相信他们的。”」
translated: Rynderack: "They should attack Yuri's base fiercely... At least I trust them in terms of the assault."

label: LDR:B047
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “遭遇猛攻的尤里残部基地应该完全腾不出手处理我们的渗透行动。”」
translated: Delta: "Yuri's remnant shouldn't be able to handle our infiltration under heavy attack."

label: LDR:B048
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “最新消息，起义军的一支工程师小队已经到达北部的隧道。”」
translated: Delta: "A team of engineers from the rebel has arrived at the northern tunnel."

label: LDR:B049
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “一旦与他们会合，我们就可以开始抢夺建造厂的行动。”」
translated: Delta: "Once we meet up with them, we can begin to capture the construction yard."

label: LDR:B050
value: 已成功将一座建造厂打包为移动基地车。
translated: Successfully packed a Construction Yard into a MCV.

label: LDR:B051
value: 已成功护送移动基地车到达撤离点，任务完成。
translated: The MCV has been successfully escorted to the evacuation point, objective complete.

label: LDR:B052
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “虽然无力阻止他们对西伯利亚的统治，但起义军已经拿到需要的东西了。”」
translated: Delta: "Although we were unable to stop them in Siberia, the rebels have gotten what they needed."

label: LDR:B053
value: 「林德拉克： “总有一天我会回来的，回到我的家乡，带着完全的胜利归来。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I will be back to my hometown one day, with complete victory."

label: LDR:B054
value: 已成功到达隧道口，目标完成。
translated: Successfully reached the tunnel entrance, objective accomplished.

label: LDR:B055
value: 「尤里复制人： “我感到迷茫：我究竟因何而存在？难道仅仅是一个意志凭依的『复制体』？”」
translated: Yuri Clone: "I am confused: Why do I exist? Am I just a 'copy' with a will?"

label: LDR:B056
value: 「尤里复制人： “为了寻找存在的意义，我们愿意与起义军一同战斗。”」
translated: Yuri Clone: "In order to find the meaning of existence, we are willing to fight alongside the rebels."

label: LDR:B057
value: 已成功占领一座尤里建造厂。选中它并点击附近一处空地以将其打包成移动基地车。
translated: Captured a Yuri construction yard. Select it and click on a nearby space to pack it into a MCV.

label: LDR:B058
value: 一辆尤里基地车被摧毁。
translated: A Yuri MCV was destroyed.

label: LDR:B059
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不要紧！还有剩余的尤里建造厂可以占领，我们还有机会。”」
translated: Delta: "Don't worry! There are still some Yuri construction yards left. We still have a chance."

label: LDR:B060
value: 警告 - 不要靠近苏军基地！一旦我们引起了他们的注意，渗透行动就可能遇到阻挠。
translated: Warning - Stay away from the Soviet base! Our infiltration could be thwarted if we attact their attention.

label: LDR:B061
value: 警告 - 现在先不要靠近基地！一旦引起了他们注意，我们就难以继续进行渗透行动了。
translated: Warning - Don't go near the base yet! It will be difficult to infiltrate if we attact their attention.

label: LDR:B062
value: 提示 - 命令试验体-德尔塔攻击坍塌的上坡路，可打通该处道路。
translated: Hint - Use Delta to attack the collapsed uphill road to restore it.

label: LDR:B063
value: 「林德拉克： “道路打开了，我们继续前进吧。”」
translated: Rynderack: "The road is clear. Let's move on."

label: LDR:B064
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “城市里有一处兵营，我们好像可以把它夺取过来，为我们所用。”」
translated: Delta: "There is a barrack in the city. We can capture it for our use."

label: LDR:B065
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “你还在发愣什么！快使用心灵控制器摧毁心灵信标！我们快要暴露了！”」
translated: Delta: "Use the Psychic Dominator to destroy the Psychic Beacon NOW! We are about to be exposed!"

label: LDR:B066
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “先不要摧毁心灵控制器！我们还要利用它来摧毁心灵信标呢！”」
translated: Delta: "Don't destroy the Psychic Dominator yet! We still need it to destroy the Psychic Beacon!"

label: LDR:B067
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们需要穿越敌人的防线，通过那处坍塌的上坡前往隧道。”」
translated: Delta: "We need to get through the enemy's defenses and go through the collapsed road to the tunnel."

label: LDR:B068
value: 「林德拉克： “他们的基地防御密不透风！看来还是要等苏军先冲破他们的防线，我们才能通过。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Their defense is impenetrable! We have to wait for the Soviets to break through first."

label: LDR:B069
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “现在我们要把它护送回运输船那里进行撤离。”」
translated: Delta: "Now we need to escort it back to the amphibious transport for evacuation."

label: LDR:BC
value: 试验体-德尔塔： “起义军已经成功得到了一辆尤里机动基地车。我们可以利用它提供的建造能力，组建军队与敌人进行正面对抗了。”
translated: Delta: "The rebels have successfully obtained a Yuri MCV. We can build an army with it to confront the enemy head-on."

label: LDR:B070
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “已经探明一部分敌人防线的部署。”」
translated: Delta: "We have discovered part of the enemy's defense deployment."

label: LDR:B071
value: 「林德拉克： “没想到我们居然真的做到了……这下连雅库茨克的苏军基地也可以为我们所用了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We actually did it... Now we can even use the Soviet base in Yakutsk."

label: LDR:B072
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “但我们还是更需要尤里的科技，以方便心灵起义军继续对『最终意志』的反制方法进行研究。”」
translated: Delta: "But we still need Yuri's technology, to study the countermeasures against the "Final Spirit"."

label: LDR:B073
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我能感受到别处的心灵控制器正在把能量聚焦到这个区域。”」
translated: Delta: "I can feel the Psychic Dominators elsewhere focusing energy into this area."

label: LDR:B074
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “苏军应该难逃再次被控制的下场，而我们得在心灵波重新覆盖这里之前离开。”」
translated: Delta: "The Soviets will inevitably be controlled again. We have to leave before it's too late."

label: LDR:B075
value: 距离心灵控制重新覆盖此区域
translated: Time left until mind control wave reach this area

label: LDR:B076
value: 任务时间已到 - 心灵控制已经重新覆盖雅库茨克，任务失败。
translated: Mission time has expired - Mind control wave has reached over Yakutsk, mission failed.

label: LDR:B077
value: 「林德拉克： “我们时间不多了！再这样下去我们也会被心灵控制的！”」
translated: Rynderack: "We don't have much time! If we continue like this, we will succumb to mind control!"

label: Name:CACRAN
value: 港口吊机
translated: Port Crane

label: Name:EOFU
value: 心灵核心未激活的命运之瞳
translated: Eye of Fate (Unactivated)

label: Name:CACONT
value: 集装箱
translated: Container

label: LDU:A001
value: 韩国，仁川。
translated: Incheon, South Korea.

label: LDU:A002
value: 警告 - 尤里残部势力突然出现在了仁川！
translated: Warning - Yuri remnants suddenly appeared in Incheon!

label: LDU:A003
value: 本以为尤里死后，他们已经群龙无首，真没想到他们会组织起如此规模的进攻。
translated: After Yuri's death, nobody expect them to organize an attack of such scale.

label: LDU:A004
value: 坏消息，仁川机场已经被尤里残部完全控制。
translated: Bad news, Incheon Airport has been controlled by Yuri's remnants.

label: LDU:A005
value: 我们只有重新夺回仁川机场，才能投送充足的空军支援。
translated: We have to recapture Incheon Airport to provide sufficient air support.

label: LDU:A006
value: 一支地面部队已经在附近集结。请充分利用它们为后续的援军开辟道路。
translated: A ground force has been assembled nearby. Make use of it to prepare for subsequent reinforcements.

label: LDU:A007
value: 任务目标 - 夺回仁川机场。
translated: Mission Objective - Recapture Incheon Airport

label: LDU:A008
value: 任务目标 - 防守仁川机场，等待援军到达。
translated: Mission Objective - Defend Incheon Airport until reinforcements arrive

label: LDU:A009
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁尤里残部在仁川市的基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the base of Yuri's remnant in Incheon

label: LDU:A010
value: 登陆部队到达时间
translated: Landing Force Arrival Time

label: LDU:A011
value: 「黑鹰战机：“我这里所剩燃料不多了，只能尽可能的为你们侦查前方的道路了。”」
translated: Black Eagle: "I don't have much fuel left. I will do my best to scout the road ahead."

label: LDU:A012
value: 「黑鹰战机：“注意这里，要前往仁川机场，你们必须要通过永宗大桥。”」
translated: Black Eagle: "To go to Incheon Airport, you must cross the Yeongjong Bridge."

label: LDU:A013
value: 「黑鹰战机：“我的使命结束了。保重！全靠你们了！”」
translated: Black Eagle: "My mission is over. Take care! It's all up to you!"

label: LDU:A014
value: 提示 - 快速通过永宗大桥，避免与路上的敌人纠缠。
translated: Hint - Cross the Yeongjong Bridge quickly. Avoid the enemies on the road.

label: LDU:A015
value: 我们的坦克杀手驾驶员已经通过了严格的战术训练，至少他们不会把宝贵的穿甲弹用来瞄准步兵了。
translated: Our Tank Destroyers have gone through rigorous training. They won't use their AP shells against infantry.

label: LDU:A016
value: 「灰熊坦克：“指挥官，我们好像搞错方向了，现在没有在城里乱逛的时间！”」
translated: Grizzly Tank: "Commander, we seem to have lost our way. There is no time to wander around the city!"

label: LDU:A017
value: 警告 - 尤里残部正在永宗大桥附近建立基地！
translated: Warning - Yuri's remanats are establishing a base near Yeongjong Bridge!

label: LDU:A018
value: 不要被他们拖住，赶紧通过这座大桥！
translated: Don't let them hold you back. Cross the bridge quickly!

label: LDU:A019
value: 一支火箭飞行兵部队已经设法进入仁川空域。
translated: A rocketeer squad has entered Incheon's airspace.

label: LDU:A020
value: 「火箭飞行兵：“数支黑鹰战机小队也在我们后面不远，但他们需要机场才能降落。”」
translated: Rocketeer: "Black Eagle squadrons are not far behind us, but they need an airfield to land."

label: LDU:A021
value: 提示 - 摧毁机场中的盖特机炮以确保援军安全降落。
translated: Hint - Destroy the Gattling Cannons in the airfield to ensure the safe landing of the reinforcements.

label: LDU:A022
value: 已成功夺回仁川机场，目标完成。
translated: Incheon Airport has been successfully recaptured. Objective Completed.

label: LDU:A023
value: 一支工程师小队已经抵达。利用他们修复破损的建筑物。
translated: A team of engineers has arrived. Use them to repair the damaged buildings.

label: LDU:A024
value: 我们的海空军支援都在赶来。请防守仁川机场，提防尤里残部的反扑。
translated: Our naval and air support is on the way. Please defend Incheon Airport against Yuri's remanats.

label: LDU:A025
value: 当心这些狂兽人！他们的肉体经过基因强化，可以轻易撕碎坦克！
translated: Watch out for these Brutes! They are genetically enhanced and can shred tanks with ease!

label: LDU:A026
value: 一支黑鹰战机小队正在进入战场。
translated: A squadron of Black Eagles are entering the battlefield.

label: LDU:A027
value: 他们的燃料基本都耗尽了，但在机场稍事休整以后就能继续投入战斗。
translated: Their fuel was depleted, but they will be back to the fight after a short rest in the airport.

label: LDU:A028
value: 更多的黑鹰战机还在路上。保护好机场，准备迎接他们！
translated: More Black Eagles are on the way. Protect the airport and get ready to welcome them!

label: LDU:A029
value: 提示 - 我们拥有最优秀的地勤，受损的战机只要回到停机坪，就可以得到快速的维修。
translated: Hint - With the best ground crew, damaged aircrafts can be quickly repaired in the airfields.

label: LDU:A030
value: 我们已经可以从机场中生产更多的黑鹰战机。
translated: We can already produce more Black Eagles from the airfield.

label: LDU:A031
value: 已解锁隐藏线路。
translated: Unlocked hidden route.

label: LDU:A032
value: 干得好！也就只有这种办法，能让我们从这座安防严密的计算主机中提取数据了。
translated: Well done! This is the only way we can extract data from this secure computer.

label: LDU:A033
value: 警告 - 这些进驻尤里新兵的楼房能对任何地面部队造成严重杀伤。
translated: Warning - These buildings housing Initiates can wreak havoc on any ground troops.

label: LDU:A034
value: 「黑鹰战机飞行员：“你们终于来了，快通过永宗大桥吧！”」
translated: Black Eagle pilot: "You are finally here, please cross the Yeongjong Bridge!"

label: LDU:A035
value: 「黑鹰战机飞行员：“你问我？感谢上帝，最后的关头我成功跳伞，捡回来一条命。”」
translated: Black Eagle pilot: "You ask me? Thank God, I successfully parachuted at the last moment."

label: Name:IPDP
value: 不可见的伞兵运输机
translated: Invisible paratrooper transport

label: LDU:A036
value: 我们应当优先径直通过永宗大桥，等援军到齐后再来清理城市中的敌人也不迟。
translated: We should cross the Yeongjong Bridge first. We can deal with the enemies later with reinforcements.

label: LDU:A037
value: 提示 - 数支黑鹰战机小队正在进入仁川空域，请为他们准备充足的停机坪以备降落。
translated: Hint - Black Eagle squadrons are entering Incheon, please prepare sufficient airfields for them to land.

label: LDU:A038
value: 另一支黑鹰战机小队正在进入战场。
translated: Another squadron of Black Eagle is entering the battlefield.

label: LDU:A039
value: 最后一支黑鹰战机小队正在进入战场。
translated: The last squadron of Black Eagle is entering the battlefield.

label: LDU:A040
value: 已肃清机场周围的防空火力。空降部队即将抵达。
translated: The AA guns around the airport has been silenced. The airborne troops are about to arrive.

label: LDU:A041
value: 我们的登陆部队已经抵达，目标完成。
translated: Our landing force has arrived. Objective Completed.

label: LDU:A042
value: 「航空母舰：“我说什么来着？反攻的时刻到了！”」
translated: Aircraft carrier: "What did I say? It's time to fight back!"

label: LDU:A043
value: 指挥官，我们已经定位了尤里残部在仁川的几处据点。
translated: Commander, we have located several bases of Yuri's remnant in Incheon.

label: LDU:A044
value: 无论他们想要实现什么阴谋，他们都不能在我们这里得逞的。
translated: Regardless of their conspiracy, they must not succeed here.

label: LDU:A045
value: 已经消灭尤里残部在仁川的主要势力，任务完成。
translated: The main force of Yuri's remnants in Incheon has been eliminated. objective complete.

label: LDU:A046
value: 全军覆没 - 我方部队全军覆没，任务失败。
translated: Total annihilation - Our troops were completely annihilated, mission failed.

label: LDU:AC
value:
我们成功击退了尤里残部对仁川的进攻。
可这样规模的敌人，真的是“残部”吗？他们的目的又是什么？
translated:
We successfully repelled the attack on Incheon by the remnants of Yuri's army. 
But are enemies of this size really "remnants"? What is their goal?

label: LDU:A047
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 仁川机场失守，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Incheon Airport was lost, mission failed.

label: LDU:A048
value: 指挥官，你确实要这么做吗？这种节外生枝的行为，极有可能惊动敌人主力部队。
translated: Commander, are you sure about this? These extraneous behaviors are likely to alert the enemy's main force.

label: Name:TITANA
value: 泰坦机甲量产型号（热能炮损坏）
translated: Titan mass production model (thermal cannon damaged)

label: Name:TITANB
value: 泰坦机甲量产型号（红箭飞弹损坏）
translated: Titan mass production model (Red Arrow missile damaged)

label: Name:TITANC
value: 泰坦机甲量产型号（汲取光束损坏）
translated: Titan mass production model (drain beam damaged)

label: Name:TITAND
value: 泰坦机甲量产型号
translated: Titan mass production model

label: LDU:A049
value: 一支韩国守军正在永宗岛西南集结。调动他们参与机场的防御。
translated: A Korean garrison is gathering southwest of Yeongjong Island. Mobilize them to defend the airport.

label: Name:SAKU
value: 樱花无人自杀机
translated: Sakura kamikaze drone

label: LDU:C001
value: 中国，天津港。
translated: Tianjin Port, China.

label: LDU:C002
value: 「清芷： “下午好，指挥官。欢迎来到战火燃烧中的天津港。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Good afternoon, Commander. Welcome to the port of Tianjin."

label: LDU:C003
value: 「清芷： “就在今天上午，尤里残部在我们毫无防备的状态下，突然袭击了塘沽。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "This morning, Yuri's remnants assulted Tanggu when we were unprepared."

label: LDU:C004
value: 「清芷： “根据东北亚协防条约，中国政府向你们请求支援，而我会成为你的副官。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "According to our Defense Treaty, the Chinese government requests your support. I will assist you."

label: LDU:C005
value: 「清芷： “目前，我们初步推测敌人的目标是这里——塘沽数据中心。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We speculate that the enemy's target is here - Tanggu Data Center."

label: LDU:C006
value: 「清芷： “为避免机密落入敌手，数据中心已经启动自毁程序，但我们仍然希望把它抢救回来。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The data center has activated self-destruction, but we still hope to salvage it."

label: LDU:C007
value: 「清芷： “天权已经到达战场。目前只有他的生物特征密钥有停止自毁的权限。请务必护送他抵达数据中心。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Tianquan has arrived. He can stop the self-destruction. Please escort him to the data center."

label: LDU:C008
value: 「天权： “真是烦透了！为什么我走到哪里，战火就烧到哪里——连休假都不放过！”」
translated: Tianquan: "This is so dumb! Why is there war wherever I go - even during my vacation!"

label: LDU:C009
value: 我们的对地攻击机——萨拉托加炮艇机已经加入军备。
translated: Our ground attack aircraft, the Saratoga Gunship, has been added to the armament.

label: LDU:C010
value: 它们对建筑乏力，但拥有装甲保护，可以使用机炮与敌人的防空车辆正面对抗。
translated: They are weak against structures, but they can engage enemy AA vehicles head-on with guns and heavy armour.

label: LDU:C011
value: 任务目标 - 护送天权到达塘沽数据中心。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort Tianquan to the Tanggu Data Center.

label: LDU:C012
value: 「清芷： “中国军队夺回海港和城市还需要一段时间。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It will take some time for the Chinese army to retake the port and the city."

label: LDU:C013
value: 「清芷： “在此之前，请利用美国强大的空军，重点为天权提供空中支援。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Before that, please provide air support for Tianquan, with the superior U.S. Air Force."

label: LDU:C014
value: 「天权： “我正在遭受攻击！”」
translated: Tianquan: "I am under attack!"

label: LDU:C015
value: 「天权： “我这里需要支援！”」
translated: Tianquan: "I need support here!"

label: LDU:C016
value: 「天权： “请求火力掩护！重复，请求火力掩护！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Request for fire support! Repeat, request for fire support!"

label: LDU:C017
value: 丧失关键部队 - 天权阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Tianquan was killed, mission failed.

label: LDU:C018
value: 未能按时完成 - 塘沽数据中心自毁程序启动，任务失败。
translated: Failed to meet deadline - Tanggu Data Center self-destruct sequence initiated, mission failed.

label: LDU:C019
value: 塘沽数据中心自毁
translated: Tanggu data center self-destructs

label: LDU:C020
value: 「天权： “天权呼叫战术导弹打击！重复，天权呼叫战术导弹打击！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Tianquan requesting missile strike! Repeat, Tianquan requesting missile strike!"

label: LDU:C021
value: 「清芷： “收到，我们会发射导弹炸平你指示的目标。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Copied. We will launch missiles to bomb the target you indicated."

label: LDU:C022
value: 「安磊： “我的海军部队正在进入天津港，配合天权的行动。”」
translated: Anlei: "My naval forces are entering the Port of Tianjin to assist Tianquan's operations."

label: LDU:C023
value: 「安磊： “真是反了天了，居然敢跑到我们老家来。把他们痛揍一顿方解我心头之恨。”」
translated: Anlei: "This is outrageous! They dared to come to our hometown. Let me beat them up."

label: LDU:C024
value: 「清芷： “尤里残部好像在尽全力阻止你们把基地拓展到南部的城市中。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Yuri's remnants are preventing you from expanding to the south."

label: LDU:C025
value: 「清芷： “看来需要更多的中国军队在南岸开辟战场了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It seems that we need more troops to fight on the south bank."

label: LDU:C026
value: 「天权： “安磊，水路那边推进的怎么样？我快要赶到港口了。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Anlei, how is the progress on the water? I'm almost at the port."

label: LDU:C027
value: 「安磊： “别着急，无畏级战舰已经在赶来的路上了。”」
translated: Anlei: "Don't worry, the Dreadnoughts are on the way."

label: LDU:C028
value: 「安磊： “天权，我看到这座广场是一个合适的部署基地的位置。”」
translated: Anlei: "Tianquan, This square is a suitable location for base."

label: LDU:C029
value: 「安磊： “能不能麻烦你帮忙清理一下那边的敌人前哨？”」
translated: Anlei: "Could you please help clear out the enemy outpost over there?"

label: LDU:C030
value: 「天权： “行吧，这样你就欠我一个人情啦。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Okay, now you owe me a favor."

label: LDU:C031
value: 「安磊： “行，等我建立好基地就配合你一起进攻，这样咱俩就扯平了。”」
translated: Anlei: "Copied. Once I build the base, I will assist you in the attack, and then we will be even."

label: LDU:C032
value: 「清芷： “安磊已经在城区建立了基地。你可以利用他的建造厂拓展建造范围。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Anlei has already established a base in the city. You can use his construction yard to expand."

label: LDU:C033
translated: Anlei: "?"

label: LDU:C034
value: 「清芷： “时间看起来不多了。天权，你有充足的把握及时赶到吗？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Time is running out. Tianquan, can you arrive on time?"

label: LDU:C035
value: 警告 - 塘沽数据中心自毁倒计时还有1分钟！
translated: Warning - There is 1 minute left before Tanggu Data Center self-destructs!

label: LDU:C036
value: 天权顺利赶到了塘沽数据中心，任务完成。
translated: Tianquan successfully arrived at the Tanggu Data Center, objective complete.

label: LDU:C037
value: 「天权： “好了，数据中心的自毁指令已经解除。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Okay, the data center's self-destruction has been deactivated."

label: LDU:C038
value: 「清芷： “干得好，指挥官。按照之前的约定，我们会和你们共享一部分数据。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Well done, Commander. As agreed before, we will share some data with you."

label: LDU:C039
value: 「安磊： “天津港剩余的敌人也不用担心，都交给我吧，我会把他们清除干净。”」
translated: Anlei: "Don't worry about the remains in Tianjin Port. Leave them to me. I will wipe them out."

label: LDU:C040
value: 提示 - 大量中国部队正在进入城市。
translated: Hint - Large numbers of Chinese troops are entering the city.

label: LDU:C041
value: 「安磊： “那边的美国的兄弟！我为你们准备了一批中国装备，你可以自由调动他们。”」
translated: Anlei: "My American commarde! I have prepared you some equipment. You can mobilize them at your will."

label: LDU:CC
value:
已接收「行动报告-海参崴」（安磊）。
已接收「行动报告-釜山」（天权）。
已接收「“命运之瞳”相关情报汇总」（清芷）。
已接收「对心灵军团网络的渗透测试资料」（天枢）。
translated:
Received "Operation Report - Vladivostok" (Anlei). 
Received "Operation Report - Pusan" (Tianquan). 
Received "Summary of Intelligence Related to "Eye of Fate"" (Qingzhi). 
Received "Pen-Test Report on PsiCorps Network" (Tianshu).

label: LDU:C042
value: 「清芷： “敌人在数据中心的唯一入口前建立了坚固的防御。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The enemy has established a strong defense near the only entrance to the data center."

label: LDU:C043
value: 「清芷： “看来这里要有一场恶战了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It looks like there's going to be a fierce battle here."

label: LDU:C044
value: 「清芷： “为了缓解军费紧张的状况，我们已经为你调拨了额外的资金。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "In order to ease the tight budget, we have allocated additional funds for you."

label: LDU:C045
value: 「天权： “现在战况胶着，仅靠我一个人不行，还需要两位指挥官的协助。”」
translated: Tianquan: "The battle situation is now at a stalemate. I need the assistance of the two commanders."

label: LDU:C046
value: 「清芷： “天权无法孤身穿过敌阵，请使用你的部队为他扫清道路。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Tianquan cannot get through the enemy alone. Please clear a path for him with your forces."

label: Name:NATGDC
value:
塘沽数据中心
中国军队在天津港建立的军用网络数据中心。
保存着第二次世界大战期间中国情报机构获得的大量资料数据。
translated:
Tanggu Data Center
A military network data center established by the Chinese military. 
Containing a large amount of data obtained by Chinese intelligence agencies during World War II.

label: LDU:C047
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 塘沽数据中心被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Tanggu Data Center destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:C048
value: 警告 - 塘沽数据中心内部发生了一次爆炸！
translated: WARNING - An explosion occurred inside the Tanggu Data Center!

label: LDU:C049
value: 「清芷： “我们现在的重点是协助天权推进，请尽量不要被别的事情分散精力。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We need to assist Tianquan in advancing. Please don't be distracted by other things."

label: LDU:C050
value: 「清芷： “消灭尤里残部主基地这件事，等你们拿到数据以后再做也不迟。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It won't be too late to destroy the main base of Yuri's remnants after you get the data."

label: LDU:C051
value: 「清芷： “目前中国军队尚未完全夺回天津港的制海权，现在水中到处都是敌人的潜艇。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have not yet regained control of the sea. The water is now full of enemy submarines."

label: LDU:C052
value: 「清芷： “现在生产海军，将会受到很大的阻力。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "You will encounter heavy resistance if you build navy now."

label: LDU:C053
value: 「天权： “啊，是那三艘船啊。反正它们已经卸货了，不小心炸沉应该也没什么事情吧。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Oops, it's those three ships. I hope it shouldn't matter if they accidentally sink."

label: LDU:C054
value: 「安磊： “我们的基洛夫空艇部队已经迂回到了敌人基地的后面。”」
translated: Anlei: "Our Kirov airships have flanked the enemy."

label: LDU:C055
value: 「安磊： “给我狠狠地炸！不要手下留情！”」
translated: Anlei: "Destroy them all! Show no mercy!"

label: LDU:C056
value: 「清芷： “上午被突袭时，城中没有爆发激烈的巷战，因此大部分建筑保存完好。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "There was no fierce fighting in the morning, so most of the buildings were well preserved."

label: LDU:C057
value: 「清芷： “可现在，这座城市要留下一些伤疤了……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But now, this city will be left with some scars..."

label: LDU:C058
value: 「清芷： “另外，你可以收复这里的海上油井平台，来获得更多的战争经费。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "In addition, you can recapture the offshore oil platforms here to obtain more war funds."

label: LDU:D001
value: 日本，伊贺。
translated: Iga, Japan.

label: LDU:D002
value: 指挥官，日本这边发生了麻烦的状况。
translated: Commander, there is a troublesome situation in Japan.

label: LDU:D003
value: 今天早些时候，日本战区司令官笠原明前往上野盆地独自侦查，然后突然失踪。
translated: Earlier today, Japanese commander Akira Kasahara went for reconnaissance at Ueno Basin and went missing.

label: LDU:D004
value: 这里地形复杂，利用我们的空中小队尽快搜索他的行踪！快！
translated: The terrain here is complex. Use our air squad to search for him ASAP!

label: LDU:D005
value: 一个好消息，暴风直升机已经加入军备。
translated: Good news, the Storm Chopper has been added to the armament.

label: LDU:D006
value: 他们携带的小型天气控制设备可以制造龙卷风，对空中目标造成有效杀伤。
translated: Their miniaturized weather control device can create tornadoes, effectively killing aerial targets.

label: LDU:D007
value: 提示 - 暴风直升机在部署后可以快速降落至地面，届时可使用维修车进行维修。
translated: Hint - Once deployed, the Storm Chopper can be landed, where it can be repaired with Repair IFVs.

label: LDU:D008
value: 任务目标 - 找到并保护失联的笠原明。
translated: Mission Objective - Find and protect Kasahara Akira.

label: LDU:CC2
value: 正在接收中国部队共享的数据……
translated: Receiving data shared by Chinese troops...

label: LDU:C059
value: 「清芷： “远距离声呐显示，还有更多的敌人潜艇从外海源源不断的赶往天津港。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Long-range sonar shows that more enemy submarines are rushing to Tianjin Port from the open sea."

label: LDU:C060
value: 「安磊： “看来他们是铁了心要和我们拼到底了？我们奉陪！”」
translated: Anlei: "They are determined to fight us to the end? We are fully prepared!"

label: LDU:C061
value: 「安磊： “我的部队正在进入城市，基地车将随后到达。”」
translated: Anlei: "My troops are entering the city. The MCV will arrive shortly."

label: LDU:C062
value: 「清芷： “天子仁老将军曾经说过，战争的胜利不只依靠统帅，更要依靠每一个在前线奋战的普通士兵。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "General Tianziren once said that victory depends on the commander but also ordinary soldiers."

label: LDU:C063
value: 「天权： “我有时也在怀疑，我真的能成为像父亲那样伟大的人吗……”」
translated: Tianquan: "I sometimes doubt whether I can really become a great man like my father..."

label: LDU:C064
value: 「清芷： “自信点，你已经做的很棒了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Be confident, you have done a great job."

label: LDU:C065
value: 「清芷： “更多中国的地面部队正在进入城市。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "More Chinese ground troops are entering the city."

label: LDU:C066
value: 「安磊： “这些部队对于清扫一个前哨站已经足够了，但我需要一个基地才能部署更多的重型单位。”」
translated: Anlei: "These troops are enough to clear an outpost, but I need a base to deploy more heavy units."

label: LDU:D009
value: 提示 - 虽然对大型建筑效果甚微，但暴风直升机制造的龙卷风可以轻松破坏占地面积小的防御塔。
translated: Hint - The tornado created by the Storm chopper can easily destroy small defense structures.

label: LDU:D010
value: 一支维修小队已经进入伊贺山区。
translated: A maintenance team has entered the Iga Mountains.

label: LDU:D011
value: 「笠原明： “我叫的维修小队可终于来了！快过来帮我出个主意！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "The maintenance team is finally here! Come over and give me some advice!"

label: LDU:D012
value: 「笠原明： “这三台机甲虽然都有不同程度的损坏，但大体上还是能用的。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Although these three Titans have been damaged, they are still generally usable."

label: LDU:D013
value: 选择环节 - 现在，笠原明要从三台损坏程度不同的泰坦机甲中选择一台驾驶。
translated: Selection phase - Now, Akira Kasahara has to choose one of three Titans to drive.

label: LDU:D014
value: 提示 - 左边这台机甲的热能炮损坏了。这意味着它不能先手对地开火，也不能在移动中攻击目标。
translated: Hint - The left Titan has a damanged thermal cannon. It can't auto attack, or attack while moving.

label: LDU:D015
value: 提示 - 右边这台机甲的红箭飞弹损坏了。这意味着它的对空能力大幅度减弱。
translated: Hint - The Red Arrow missiles on the right Titan are damaged. Its anti-air capability is greatly reduced.

label: LDU:D017
value: 提示 - 下面这台机甲的汲取光束损坏了。这意味着它不能在攻击敌人的同时回复自身装甲。
translated: Hint - The Titan below has a damaged drain beam. This means it can't regenerate from attacking enemies.

label: LDU:D018
value: 提示 - 请点击相应的机甲，做出你的选择。这个选择会影响美国篇所有的后续任务。
translated: Hint - Please make your choice. This choice will affect the rest of the missions in the US chapter.

label: LDU:D019
value: 已选择 - 热能炮损坏的泰坦机甲。
translated: Selected - Titan with damaged thermal cannon.

label: LDU:D020
value: 已选择 - 红箭飞弹损坏的泰坦机甲。
translated: Selected - Titan with damaged Red Arrow missile.

label: LDU:D021
value: 已选择 - 汲取光束损坏的泰坦机甲。
translated: Selected - Titan with damaged drain beam.

label: LDU:D022
value: 「笠原明： “嗯，面对尤里残部的飞碟大军，防空火力很重要。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Well, facing the floating discs of Yuri's remnants, AA firepower is very important."

label: LDU:D023
value: 「笠原明： “明智的选择。我相信我们的对空火力足够强大，应该不差它一个。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "It's a wise choice. I believe our AA is strong enough and we should not need one more."

label: LDU:D024
value: 「笠原明： “也是，修复的问题不一定靠汲取光束，多准备维修IFV就能解决。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "That's right. We can solve the repair problem by preparing more repair IFVs."

label: LDU:BZ049
value: 抢运小队到达时间
translated: Arrival time of the rescue team

label: GUI:RynderackUSTest
value: 林3美国科技树
translated: Rynderack Project 3 United States Tech Tree

label: STT:ModeRynderackUSTest
value: 在「林3美国科技树」中，玩家控制的美国阵营将拥有战役中的全科技。
translated: In the "Rynderack Project 3 United States Tech Tree", the player will have all the technologies in the campaign.

label: LDU:D025
value: 「笠原明： “接下来得返回前哨站。可最好先解决敌人的追兵。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We have to return to the outpost. But it's best to deal with the enemy's pursuers first."

label: LDU:D026
value: 「笠原明： “尤里的残部也在这里搜索还能动的泰坦机甲，并把它们占为己有。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Yuri's remants are also here searching for usable Titans and taking them for themselves."

label: LDU:D027
value: 「笠原明： “所以我们还是多加小心。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "So we should be more careful."

label: LDU:D028
value: 注意 - 我们的泰坦机甲现在是由笠原明的“人脑”控制而非“电脑”操控，这使得它很容易被心灵控制影响。
translated: NOTE - Our Titan is now controlled manually by Akira Kasahara, making it susceptible to mind control.

label: LDU:D029
value: 笠原明应该不在这片区域。继续向东侧探索，我们要赶在尤里部队前面！
translated: Kasahara Akira is not in this area. Keep searching the east side, we have to get ahead of Yuri's troops!

label: LDU:D030
value: 成功找到了笠原明，目标完成。
translated: Kasahara Akira was successfully found. Objective Completed.

label: LDU:D031
value: 警告 - 一台热能炮损坏的泰坦机甲正在从北侧靠近！
translated: Warning - a Titan with damaged thermal cannons is approaching from the north!

label: LDU:D032
value: 警告 - 一台汲取光束损坏的泰坦机甲正在从西北侧靠近！
translated: WARNING - A Titan with a damaged drain beam is approaching from the northwest!

label: LDU:D033
value: 泰坦无人机甲（完全损坏，无法修复）
translated: Titan (damage beyond repair)

label: LDU:D034
value: 已摧毁的泰坦机甲 : 仍在敌人控制下的泰坦机甲
translated: Destroyed Titans : Enemy controlled Titans

label: LDU:D035
value: 「笠原明： “他们这么快就来了！寻找有利地形，准备防御！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "They are coming so quickly! Find a favorable terrain and prepare for defense!"

label: LDU:D036
value: 「笠原明： “追兵好像都消灭了，接下来我们需要前往最近的前哨站。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "The pursuers have been eliminated. Next we need to head to the nearest outpost."

label: LDU:D037
value: 任务目标 - 与伊贺山区的日本前哨站会合。
translated: Mission Objective - Rendezvous with the Japanese outpost in the Iga Mountains.

label: LDU:D038
value: 任务目标 - 搜索并消灭敌人控制下的全部泰坦机甲。
translated: Mission Objective - Search and destroy all Titans under enemy control.

label: LDU:D039
value: 已与前哨站会合，目标完成。
translated: Reunited with outpost, objective completed.

label: LDU:D040
value: 「笠原明： “唉，终于能歇口气了。我刚刚上任就接手了这么个烂摊子……”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Ah, I can finally take a break. I just took over such a mess when I took office..."

label: LDU:D041
value: 「笠原明： “尤里残部在日本的兵力远远多于我们，我也不知道他们从哪儿搞来的这么多军队。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Yuri's remants have far more troops than us. I have no idea where they got so many."

label: LDU:D042
value: 「笠原明： “现在我们能做的，是尽可能阻止他们对这里泰坦机甲的回收利用。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We need to prevent them from take over the Titans here as much as possible."

label: LDU:D043
value: 提示 - 暴风直升机已经可以从战车工厂中生产。
translated: Hint - Storm chopper can now be produced from war factories.

label: LDU:D044
value: 「笠原明： “附近还有两处机场，但是已经被敌人抢占。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "There are two other airports nearby, but they have been captured by the enemy."

label: LDU:D045
value: 「笠原明： “我们在把机场夺回来之前，都有可能受到战斗机的扫射与轰炸。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Until we take back the airport, we are under enemy air attacks."

label: LDU:D046
value: 从留下的残骸就可以看出，中国军队曾经在此处与泰坦机甲激战。
translated: Judging from the wreckage, Chinese army once fought fiercely with the Titans here.

label: LDU:D047
value: 这些机甲难以修复了，连敌人都抛弃了它们……但受损的坦克修一修应该还能用。
translated: These Titans are beyond repair, but the tanks should be repairable.

label: LDU:D048
value: 「笠原明： “什么，你问为什么让我这样的年轻指挥官来接手这个烂摊子？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Are you asking why I have to take over this mess?"

label: LDU:D049
value: 「笠原明： “当然是因为我的前辈们都已经被送到军事法庭了！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Well, my seniors have all been court-martialed!"

label: LDU:D050
value: 「笠原明： “所有和尤里有点关系的指挥官都被撤职了，剩下的指挥官中我是经验最丰富的——”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Anyone related to Yuri were dismissed. Among those left, I am the most experienced--"

label: LDU:D051
value: 「笠原明： “——啊呸！反正大家经验几乎都是零！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "——Or not! Anyway, nobody has virtually any experience!"

label: LDU:D052
value: 丧失关键单位 - 笠原明驾驶的泰坦机甲被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOSTs - The Titan piloted by Akira Kasahara was destroyed, mission failed.

label: Name:AKIRA
value: 笠原明
translated: Kasahara Akira

label: LDU:D053
value: 丧失关键单位 - 损失了关键剧情要素，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Loss of key plot elements, mission failed.

label: LDU:D054
value: 全军覆没 - 我方全灭，任务失败。
translated: All units lost - All our troops are wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDU:D055
value: 指挥官，请对伊贺山区北部进行彻底搜查。这片区域应该还留有不少。
translated: Commander, please conduct a thorough search of the north. There should still be quite a few left.

label: LDU:D056
value: 警告 - 一个大型不明空中飞行物体正在接近！
translated: WARNING - A LARGE UNIDENTIFIED AERIAL OBJECT IS APPROACHING!

label: LDU:D057
value: 警告 - 我们比对了数据库中的资料，判断它有可能是中国军队在北极遇到过的「命运之瞳」。
translated: Warning - According to intel, this might be the "Eye of Fate" encountered by the Chinese in the Arctic.

label: LDU:D058
value: 「笠原明： “啊，居然是那个玩意。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Ah, it's that thing."

label: LDU:D059
value: 「笠原明： “我的前辈在福井可被坑惨了。没有十足的把握的话，还是别去惹它为好。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "If you are not absolutely sure, it is better not to provoke it."

label: LDU:D060
value: 警告 - 命运之瞳正在移动！
translated: WARNING - The Eye of Fate is moving!

label: LDU:D061
value: 我们会时刻监控它的动向。请注意调动你的空军及时规避，以避免不必要的损失。
translated: We will monitor its movements. Please mobilize your air force to avoid unnecessary losses.

label: LDU:D062
value: 我们不知道这条隧道通往哪里，反正可能是通向很远的地方。要派部队去看一看吗？
translated: We don't know where this tunnel leads to. Should we send some troops to take a look?

label: LDU:D063
value: 所有在敌人操控下的泰坦机甲都已经被摧毁，目标完成。
translated: All Titans under enemy control have been destroyed, objective complete.

label: LDU:D064
value: 「笠原明： “这种程度就足够了。他们已经失去了全部的样机。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "That's enough. They've lost all the prototypes."

label: LDU:D065
value: 「笠原明： “他们再想独立还原出这种程度的科技，怕是还要研究十年。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "It will probably take them another ten years of research to reproduce it."

label: LDU:D066
value: 命运之瞳已被摧毁。
translated: The Eye of Fate has been destroyed.

label: LDU:D067
value: 「笠原明： “我也搞不明白这玩意为什么会出现在这里。说不定还有更多的在等着我们？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I don't understand why this thing is here. Maybe there are more waiting for us?"

label: LDU:DC
value: 日本战场的形势紧张的出乎我们预料，尤里残部已经在这里有大动作了。
translated: The situation on the Japanese battlefield is worse than we expected. Yuri's remnants have already made big moves here.

label: LDU:D068
value: 「笠原明： “已经销毁一半了。看来这些家伙不是我们的对手。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Half of them have been destroyed. It seems these guys are no match for us."

label: LDU:D069
value: 「笠原明： “还剩最后几个，它们躲在哪里呢？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "There are only a few left. Where are they hiding?"

label: LDU:D070
value: 「笠原明： “把爆炸物散乱的摆放在显眼的地方，我觉得这就不是正常人能干出来的事情……”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Putting explosives in a conspicuous place is something that only a moron would do..."

label: Name:TENSHUKAKU
value:
天守阁
最初在1585年由丰臣秀吉修建，经历多次焚毁重建。
现在看到的天守阁是1928年由大阪市长筹资重建的。
translated:
Tenshukaku
Originally built by Toyotomi Hideyoshi in 1585 and was burned down and rebuilt many times.
Tenshukaku you see now was rebuilt in 1928 with funds raised by the mayor of Osaka.

label: Name:BOWL
value: 碗
translated: bowl

label: LDU:D071
value: 提示 - 一支日本登陆部队已经前来与我们会合。
translated: Hint - A Japanese landing force has come to join us.

label: LDU:D072
value: 提示 - 更多的日本空军部队已经抵达。
translated: Hint - More Japanese air units have arrived.

label: LDU:D073
value: 「笠原明： “这些还不够！去通知友邻部队，我们这里需要更多的空军支援！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "This is not enough! Go inform our friendly forces, we need more air support here!"

label: LDU:E001
value: 日本，大阪。
translated: Osaka, Japan.

label: LDU:E002
value: 「笠原明： “我刚刚查阅了中国分享的资料，现在我心中已经有一个大胆的计划了。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I just reviewed the information shared by China, and now I have a bold plan in mind."

label: LDU:E003
value: 「笠原明： “情报显示，大阪这里有一支中国驻军，希望他们能给我们进一步的帮助。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "There is a Chinese garrison in Osaka. I hope they can provide us further assistance."

label: LDU:E004
value: 警告 - 我们搞错了！驻扎在大阪的不是一支中国驻军，而是一支使用中国军备的尤里残部！
translated: Warning - We messed up! This is not a Chinese garrison, but Yuri remnant with Chinese armaments!

label: LDU:E005
value: 「笠原明： “全体就地呈防御姿态，准备应战！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Everyone, take defensive position and prepare for battle!"

label: LDU:E006
value: 「笠原明： “该死，为什么机甲突然不听使唤了！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Damn it, why did the Titan suddenly stop responding!"

label: LDU:E007
value: 警告 - 出现了意料之外的状况，尤里残部似乎直接在对机甲进行网络攻击，扰乱它的行动。
translated: Warning - Yuri's remnants appear to be conducting a cyber attack on Titan, disrupting its operations.

label: LDU:E008
value: 「笠原明： “我正在尽力抢夺武器系统的控制权，但动力系统完全不听使唤！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I'm trying to seize control of it, but the power system is completely out!"

label: LDU:E009
value: 敌人想要先操控泰坦机甲靠近他们，然后再伺机将笠原明心灵控制。
translated: The enemy wanted to get the Titan close to them and then mind control Kasahara Akira.

label: LDU:E010
value: 任务目标 - 笠原明驾驶的泰坦机甲不能被摧毁。
translated: Mission Objective - Keep Akira Kasahara's Titan alive.

label: LDU:E011
value: 网络攻击的来源已经查明，就是这些「意念压制塔」。
translated: The source of the cyber attack has been identified, and it is these "Spiritual Suppression Towers".

label: LDU:E012
value: 摧毁这些「意念压制塔」，我们应该就可以夺回泰坦机甲的控制权。
translated: By destroying these "Spiritual Suppression Towers", we should be able to regain control of the Titan.

label: LDU:E013
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁所有意念压制塔。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy all Spiritual Suppression Towers.

label: LDU:E014
value: 警告 - 尤里残部启用了在大阪城中的超时空传送器。
translated: Warning - Yuri's remnants have activated the Chronosphere in Osaka.

label: LDU:E015
value: 这座超时空传送器本来是我们用来转移的。必须把它夺回来。
translated: This Chronosphere was originally for our next move. We must take it back.

label: LDU:E016
value: 任务目标 - 占领并保护超时空传送器。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture and protect the Chronosphere.

label: LDU:E017
value: 「笠原明： “不行，机甲仍然只能乱动！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "No, the Titan can only move randomly!"

label: LDU:E018
value: 「笠原明： “（砸操纵杆）你倒是给我听话啊！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "(smashing the joystick) Just listen to me!"

label: LDU:E019
value: 「笠原明： “我还是没有办法夺回机甲的控制权！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I still can't take back control of the Titan!"

label: LDU:E020
value: 注意 - 笠原明已经被敌人心灵控制。
translated: Warning - Kasahara Akira has been mind controlled by the enemy.

label: LDU:E021
value: 提示 - 超时空军团兵可以暂时限制机甲的行动，但要注意别让机甲被彻底抹除。
translated: Hint - Chrono Legionnaires can restrict the movement of the Titan, but be careful to not wiped it out.

label: LDU:E022
value: 谭雅已经从欧洲战场归队待命。你可以从兵营中召唤她。
translated: Tanya has returned from the European and is ready for deployment. You can summon her from the barracks.

label: LDU:E023
value: 丧失关键单位 - 笠原明驾驶的泰坦机甲被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - The Titan piloted by Akira Kasahara was destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:E024
value: 全军覆没 - 在大阪的突击部队全军覆没，任务失败。
translated: All units lost - The assault team in Osaka is completely wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDU:E025
value: 提示 - 一支日本海军部队正在进入大阪河。
translated: Hint - A Japanese naval force is entering the Osaka River.

label: LDU:E026
value: 「航空母舰： “我们来了！这里有什么需要我们的地方吗？”」
translated: Aircraft carrier: "Here we come! Is there anything we can do for you?"

label: LDU:E027
value: 提示 - 击杀心控笠原明的敌方单位，以避免泰坦机甲对我们开火。
translated: Hint - Kill the enemy unit that mind-control Akira Kasahara to avoid friendly fire.

label: LDU:E028
value: 摧毁了一座意念压制塔。
translated: Destroyed a Spiritual Suppression Tower.

label: LDU:E029
value: 已摧毁全部意念压制塔，目标完成。
translated: All Spiritual Suppression Towers have been destroyed, object completed.

label: LDU:E030
value: 已经成功夺回泰坦机甲的控制权。
translated: Control of the Titan has been successfully regained.

label: LDU:E031
value: 「笠原明： “终于可以歇息一会了……不行，敌人还没有被彻底打败，还得打起精神战斗才行。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Finally, we can take a break… No, we must keep fighting until we wipe out the enemy."

label: LDU:E032
value: 「笠原明： “检测到数座『意念压制塔』。尤里残部可能随时通过它们对我们发动网络攻击。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Several Spiritual Suppression Towers detected. They may launch cyber attack any time."

label: LDU:E033
value: 提示 - 更多的日本地面部队正在赶来支援。
translated: Hint - More Japanese ground troops are on their way to support.

label: LDU:HT1
value: 泰坦机甲选择 - 热能炮损坏
translated: Titan Selection - Thermal Cannon Damaged

label: LDU:HT2
value: 泰坦机甲选择 - 红箭飞弹损坏
translated: Titan Selection - Red Arrow Missile Damaged

label: LDU:HT3
value: 泰坦机甲选择 - 汲取光束损坏
translated: Titan Selection - Drain Beam Damaged

label: LDU:E034
value: 提示 - 基地车已经抵达。
translated: Hint - The MCV has arrived.

label: LDU:E035
value: 太狡猾了！他们料定我们不能杀死笠原明！
translated: How smart! They knew we couldn't kill Kasahara Akira!

label: LDU:E036
value: 提示 - 敌人不会攻击泰坦机甲，但会尝试去心控它，然后操纵它来攻击我们。
translated: Hint - The enemy will not attack the Titan, but will try to mind control it and use it to attack us.

label: LDU:E037
value: 「笠原明： “（拍控制台）这什么破烂玩意！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "(smash the control panel) What a piece of crap!"

label: LDU:E038
value: 「笠原明： “对机甲的网络攻击仍然在进行！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Cyberattacks on the Titan are still ongoing!"

label: LDU:E039
value: 「笠原明： “我还是没法控制机甲的行动方向！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I still can't control the movement of the Titan!"

label: LDU:E040
value: 注意 - 泰坦机甲的位置被超时空转移了！
translated: Attention - the Titan has been teleported!

label: LDU:E041
value: 注意 - 敌人正通过超时空传送进攻！
translated: Attention - the enemy is attacking via the Chronosphere!

label: LDU:E042
value: 提示 - 我们不能杀死笠原明。我们得想办法限制机甲的行动，或者消除心控的来源。
translated: Hint - We can't kill Kasahara Akira. We have to restrict it, or eliminate the source of the mind control.

label: LDU:E043
value: 「笠原明： “我们得把它们全部摧毁才行。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We have to destroy them all."

label: LDU:E044
value: 已占领超时空传送器，目标完成。
translated: The Chronosphere has been captured, objective completed.

label: LDU:E045
value: 「笠原明： “日本已经不再安全，这里到处都是敌人。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Japan is no longer safe. Enemies are everywhere."

label: LDU:E046
value: 「笠原明： “我们应该通过超时空转移至澳大利亚，在那里再制定下一步计划。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We should teleport to Australia and make further plans there."

label: LDU:E047
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 超时空传送器被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Chronosphere is destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:E048
value: 我们应该是无法把海军部署到大阪城的护城河中……不过北部的河流应该可以。
translated: We probably can't deploy navy into the moat... but we should be able to in the rivers in the north.

label: LDU:E049
value: 这里……为什么有一口如此之大的碗？
translated: Here...why is there such a big bowl?

label: LDU:E050
value: 等等，指挥官，战场上有出乎我们意料的情况发生。
translated: Wait, Commander, something unexpected happened on the battlefield.

label: LDU:E051
value: 那个使用中国军备的尤里指挥官似乎放弃战斗了？算了，也不是什么坏消息。
translated: The enemy commander seemed to have given up the fight? Never mind, it wasn't bad news.

label: LDU:EC
value:
日本的敌人越来越多，我们不得不撤离日本前往南半球。
笠原明正在分析敌人的网络攻击手段，并做出针对措施。
translated:
More and more enemies are appearing in Japan. We have to evacuate to the southern hemisphere. 
Kasahara Akira is analyzing the enemy's cyber attacks and taking targeted measures.

label: LDU:E052
value: 警告 - 超时空传送器正在受到攻击！我们不能让它被摧毁！
translated: WARNING - The Chronosphere is under attack! We cannot let it be destroyed!

label: LDU:E053
value: 我们已经夺回泰坦机甲的完全控制权。
translated: We have regained full control of the Titan.

label: LDU:E054
value: 等等，笠原明还被心灵控制影响着。我们得消灭心灵控制的来源，才能完全解救他。
translated: Wait, Kasahara Akira is still under mind control. We have to eliminate the source of mind control to save him.

label: Name:YASPUN
value: 意念压制塔
translated: Spiritual Suppression Tower

label: LDU:E055
value: 「谭雅： “好久不见，指挥官！又能和你一起执行任务了。”」
translated: Tanya: "Long time no see, Commander! It's nice to be on a mission with you again."

label: LDU:E056
value: 「谭雅： “我在埃及那边待了很久，一直在干反恐工作，不知还能不能适应这边的战斗。”」
translated: Tanya: "I've been working in Egypt for a while. I am not sure if I can adapt to the fighting here."

label: LDU:E057
value: 「谭雅： “不过不要担心，我会一直在你麾下效力，直到度过这次危机。”」
translated: Tanya: "But don't worry, I will continue to serve you until this crisis is over."

label: LDU:E058
value: 提示 - 敌人已经在天守阁附近依托护城河建立了防御。
translated: Hint - The enemy has built a defense near Tenshukaku relying on the moat.

label: LDU:E059
value: 提示 - 我们应当先解救笠原明，然后再对这里进行强攻。
translated: Hint - We should rescue Kasahara Akira first, and then storm this place.

label: LDU:E060
value: 提示 - 一支突击小队正沿另一条公路向前推进。
translated: Hint - An assult team is advancing along another road.

label: LDU:E061
value: 好了，雷鸣潜艇都解决了。真没想到他们会在这么浅的护城河中藏潜艇。
translated: Well, the Boomers have been dealt with. I never thought they would hide them in such a shallow moat.

label: LDU:F001
value: 澳大利亚，布里斯班。
translated: Brisbane, Australia.

label: LDU:F002
value: 我们不知道是谁在领导着尤里残部这群乌合之众，但显然他们的反扑很成功。
translated: We don't know who is leading Yuri's remnants, but their counterattack is successful.

label: LDU:F003
value: 澳大利亚是我们亚太地区的最后一处据点，我们已经退无可退了。
translated: Australia is our last stronghold in the Asia-Pacific region and we have nowhere to retreat.

label: LDU:F004
value: 「笠原明： “我们还有翻盘的机会，相信我。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We still have a chance to turn the tide, trust me."

label: LDU:F005
value: 「笠原明： “我对意念压制塔攻击泰坦机甲的数据进行分析复盘，发现他们的指挥系统不是无懈可击的。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I analyzed their cyber attack on the Titan. Their command system is not impeccable."

label: LDU:F006
value: 「笠原明： “天枢也留下了渗透测试报告，这是他给我们留下的希望。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Tianshu also left a penetration test report. This is the hope he left for us."

label: LDU:F007
value: 「笠原明： “把二者结合，我有信心对他们发动『广播注入攻击』——”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "With these, I am confident to launch a 'broadcast injection attack' against them—"

label: LDU:F008
value: 「笠原明： “——通过卫星向全球发送攻击代码，他们的设备一旦收到这段代码就会瘫痪。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "to send attack code via satellite. Their equipment will be paralyzed upon reception."

label: LDU:F009
value: 他们来了！我们的舰队数量有限，无法抵挡这样猛烈的攻击！
translated: They are coming! Our fleet is unable to withstand such a fierce attack!

label: LDU:F010
value: 「笠原明： “为此，我需要至少2座卫星通讯站来上载数据，请为我保护好它们。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "For this, I need at least two satellite communication stations to upload data."

label: LDU:F011
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少2座卫星通讯站，直到攻击代码准备完毕。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least 2 satellite communication stations.

label: LDU:F012
value: 「笠原明： “我的部队稍后到达，坚持住，指挥官！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "My troops will arrive shortly, hold on, Commander!"

label: LDU:F013
value: 我们已经失去了这片区域的制海权，我们需要更多的空军来弥补。
translated: We have lost naval control in this area and we need more air power to make up for it.

label: LDU:F014
value: 美国空军的荣耀——『自由之锤』重型轰炸机已经上线。
translated: The glory of the US Air Force - the "Hammer of Freedom" heavy bomber is now online.

label: LDU:F015
value: 他们可以发动地毯式轰炸，对地面上的一切目标发动毁灭性的打击。
translated: They can launch carpet bombing and unleash devastating blows on all targets on the ground.

label: LDU:F016
value: 提示 - 天气控制器可以制造灾难性的闪电风暴，轻易击沉敌人的舰队。
translated: Hint - The Weather Control Device can create catastrophic lightning storms that easily sink enemy fleet.

label: LDU:F017
value: 忒伊亚卫星已连接。请建造一座间谍卫星终端以接收战场实时监测数据。
translated: Theia Satellite is connected. Please build a spy satellite uplink to receive real-time battlefield data.

label: LDU:F018
value: 好的，就是这样！只要你保有间谍卫星终端，就可以获得战场的全部视野。
translated: Okay, that's it! As long as you keep the Spy Satellite, you'll have a full view of the battlefield.

label: LDU:F019
value: 提示 - 来自澳大利亚防卫部队的支援已经到达，连同一辆移动基地车。
translated: Hint - Support from the Australian Defence Force has arrived, along with a MCV.

label: LDU:F020
value: 攻击代码准备剩余时间
translated: Time remaining until attack code is ready

label: LDU:F021
value: 间谍卫星已经探明敌对部队的基地，是尤里残部与被控制的苏军。
translated: We have identified the hostile forces, it's Yuri's remnants and the mind controlled Soviet troops.

label: LDU:F022
value: 警告 - 一支使用苏联军备的敌人也在集结！
translated: Warning - An enemy force using Soviet weapons is also gathering!

label: LDU:F023
value: 警告 - 敌人正在东侧海滩发动登陆作战！
translated: Warning - Enemy landings underway on east beach!

label: LDU:F024
value: 警告 - 敌人舰队正在靠近西侧港口！
translated: Warning - Enemy fleet approaching port on the west!

label: Name:MKPLANE
value: 驾驶员喝醉了的运输机
translated: Transport plane with drunk pilot

label: Name:CABANK
value: 银行
translated: bank

label: Name:AD21
value: 肥料掺了金坷垃，一袋能顶两袋撒！
translated: If you mix Jinkela into the fertilizer, one bag can be used as two bags!

label: Name:CATP
value: 混乱部队
translated: Chaos Troops

label: LDU:D074
value: 不行的，我们需要最好的机械师才能修复并驾驭这种机甲。笠原明是唯一人选。
translated: No, we need the best mechanic to repair and operate this. Kasahara Akira is the only one.

label: Name:ELLE
value: 艾拉
translated: Ella

label: Name:SIGMA
value: 试验体-西格玛
translated: Sigma

label: LDU:F025
value: 警告 - 重型轰炸舰正在接近外海！
translated: Warning - Heavy bombing ships approaching offshore!

label: LDU:F026
value: 注意 - 检测到雷鸣潜艇在近海活动！他们可能随时浮出水面发射飞弹偷袭！
translated: Attention - Boomer Submarines detected offshore! They may surface and launch missile attack at any time!

label: Name:YGATE
value: 屏蔽门
translated: Screen Door

label: LDU:F027
value: 一座卫星通讯站被摧毁。
translated: A satellite communications station was destroyed.

label: LDU:F028
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 损失了2座卫星通讯站，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - 2 satellite communication stations lost, mission failed.

label: LDU:F029
value: 「笠原明： “卫星通讯站已经开始上传攻击代码。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "The satellite communication station has begun uploading attack code."

label: LDU:F030
value: 卫星通讯站代码已上传，目标完成。
translated: Code has been uploaded to satellite, objective accomplished.

label: LDU:F031
value: 「笠原明： “广播注入攻击即将开始，给他们点颜色看看吧。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "The broadcast injection attack is about to begin. Let's teach them a lesson."

label: LDU:F032
value: 警告 - 广播注入攻击发动了！
translated: WARNING - BROADCAST INJECTION ATTACK ACTIVE!

label: LDU:F033
value: 「伊藤若泽： “成功了！敌人一瞬间就都失去指挥了，看来这方法能行！”」
translated: Ito Jose: "It worked! The enemy lost their command instantly. It seems that this method works!"

label: LDU:F034
value: 警告 - 在布里斯班南部检测到大量空中目标！
translated: WARNING - LARGE NUMBERS OF AERIAL TARGETS DETECTED SOUTH OF BRISBANE!

label: LDU:F035
value: 等等，那些目标不是敌人，而是日本的空中轰炸编队！
translated: Wait, those targets are not enemies, but Japanese aerial bombing formations!

label: LDU:F036
value: 「笠原明： “我已经从澳大利亚集结了一支空军来打破敌人的包围圈。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I have assembled an air force from Australia to break the enemy's encirclement."

label: LDU:F037
value: 「笠原明： “接下来我会全力准备攻击代码，我的部队交给副手伊藤若泽来指挥。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I will prepare the attack code. My deputy Ito Jose will be in charge of my troops."

label: LDU:F038
value: 「伊藤若泽： “日本空军指挥官伊藤若泽，向您报到！”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Japanese Air Force Commander Ito Jose, reporting to you!"

label: LDU:F039
value: 注意 - 笠原明已经驾驶泰坦机甲进入战场。
translated: Note - Kasahara Akira has entered the battlefield in a Titan.

label: LDU:F040
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我会准备战机编队支援前线的战斗。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I will prepare a fighter formation to support the battle on the front line."

label: LDU:F041
value: 丧失关键单位 - 笠原明驾驶的泰坦机甲被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - The Titan piloted by Akira Kasahara was destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:F042
value: 指挥官，务必小心。我们现在已经是丧失制海权的状态了，再想生产舰船可能十分困难。
translated: Commander, we have already lost control of the sea, and it may be very difficult to produce navy.

label: LDU:FC
value:
这次网络攻击取得了非常好的效果：世界各地的尤里残部失去指挥，陷入一片混乱。
但这还远远不够。我们必须要找出他们的指挥中枢，并一举消灭。
translated:
This cyber attack has achieved very good results: Yuri's remnants around the world have lost their command and are in chaos. 
But this is far from enough. We must find their command center and destroy it in one fell swoop.

label: LDU:F043
value: 警告 - 检测到命运之瞳！
translated: WARNING - Eye of Fate Detected!

label: LDU:F044
value: 「伊藤若泽： “他们从哪挖出来这么多命运之瞳的？难道这玩意是量产货？”」
translated: Ito Jose: "How do they have so many Eyes of Fate? Is this thing a mass-produced product?"

label: LDU:F045
value: 指挥官，我们的资料显示，命运之瞳的心灵核心是其弱点。
translated: Commander, intel shows that the psychic core of the Eye of Fate is its weakness.

label: LDU:F046
value: 我们的爱国者飞弹可以瞄准心灵核心攻击，对命运之瞳造成高额伤害。
translated: Our Patriot missiles can aim at the Psychic Core and attack, causing high damage to the Eye of Fate.

label: LDU:F047
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我会继续指挥地面部队清理城中残余的敌人。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I will continue to command the ground forces to clear out the enemies in the city."

label: LDU:F048
value: 「伊藤若泽： “别忘了拓展基地，采集布里斯班南部的资源。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Don't forget to expand your base and collect resources south of Brisbane."

label: LDU:F049
value: 「伊藤若泽： “原先这些资源都被敌人占据着，现在可都归我们了。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "These resources were once occupied by the enemy, but now they belong to us."

label: LDU:F050
value: 布里斯班城区的敌人已经被完全肃清。
translated: The Brisbane city area has been completely cleared of enemies.

label: LDU:F051
value: 指挥官，伊藤若泽已经将他生产的一支空军小队转交给你。
translated: Commander, Ito Jose has handed over an air force squadron to you.

label: LDU:F052
value: 警告 - 检测到另一艘命运之瞳！
translated: WARNING - Another Eye of Fate detected!

label: LDU:F053
value: 警告 - 战场上同时出现了3艘命运之瞳！小心应付！
translated: Warning - 3 Eyes of Fate appear on the battlefield at the same time! Be careful!

label: LDR:0001
value: “我们该如何得知，自己是否走在正确的道路上？”
translated: "How do we know if we are on the right path?"

label: LDR:0002
value: “也许正常的表象下，有数不清的暗流蠢蠢欲动，稍不留意就会被裹挟而去。”
translated: "Perhaps beneath the normal appearance, there are countless undercurrents, seeking to swept you away."

label: LDR:0003
value: “可踌躇不前更是与束手待毙无异，已经到了必须做点什么的时候了。”
translated: "But hesitation is the same as waiting for death. It is time to do something."

label: LDR:0004
value: “试想，如果只能保留一个信念，余下的都必须抛弃，那你会保留什么？”
translated: "Imagine, if you can only keep one belief and discard the rest, what would you keep?"

label: LDR:0005
value: “相信你心中已经有了答案。那就是你现在要做的事情。大胆的去做吧。”
translated: "You already have the answer in your mind. That's what you have to do now. Don't be afraid."

label: LDR:A001
translated: ???: "Wake up! Wake up!"

label: LDR:A002
value: 「？？？： “我们没有时间了！”」
translated: ???: "We don't have time!"

label: LDR:A003
value: 选择环节 - 请从右侧边栏点击相应图标以继续对话。
translated: Selection Phase - Click an icon from the right sidebar to continue the conversation.

label: LDR:A004
value: “你是谁？”
translated: "Who are you?"

label: LDR:A005
value: “我为什么在这里？”
translated: "Why am I here?"

label: LDR:A006
value: 「林德拉克： “你是谁？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Who are you?"

label: LDR:A007
value: 「林德拉克： “我为什么在这里？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Why am I here?"

label: Name:YGLCD
value: 意念交互终端
translated: Spiritual Interactive Terminal

label: LDR:A008
value: 「？？？： “快走！和我一起离开这个鬼地方！”」
translated: ???: "Go! Come with me and leave this damn place!"

label: LDR:A009
value: 「？？？： “我没有名字，只有一个编号‘德尔塔’。我是尤里制造出来的一个基因试验体。”」
translated: ???: "I don't have a name, only a code name 'Delta'. I am a genetic test subject created by Yuri."

label: LDR:A010
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “然而我们现在都有一个共同的目标：逃离这个实验室。”」
translated: Delta: "But now we have a common goal: to escape from this laboratory."

label: LDR:A011
value: 「？？？： “我也不清楚。这座实验室收容了大量的‘试验材料’，你可能也是因此被抓来的。”」
translated: ???: "I don't know. You might have been captured for the 'experiment'."

label: LDR:A012
value: 「？？？： “你可以叫我‘试验体-德尔塔’。现在我们得一起想办法离开这个地方。”」
translated: ???: "You can call me 'Delta'. Now we have to work together to find a way to leave this place."

label: LDR:A013
value: 「林德拉克： “他们到底还是没能把我的战斗装甲从身上拆下来。”」
translated: Rynderack: "They still couldn't remove my battle armor from my body."

label: LDR:A014
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “看来他们既想研究你的装甲，又想研究你本人，所以没采取破坏性的方式。”」
translated: Delta: "It seems that they want to study your armor as well, so they didn't take destructive moves."

label: LDR:A015
value: 「林德拉克： “然而他们还是把能量环流器拧乱了，导致聚能射线武器的输出功率不足……只能凑合用了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Well, they still messed up the circulator, resulting in insufficient power of the weapon..."

label: LDR:A016
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这里还有很多囚犯。如果能把他们放出来，他们一定愿意与我们为伍。”」
translated: Delta: "There are still many prisoners here. They will definitely join us if we set them free."

label: LDR:A017
value: 提示 - 试验体-德尔塔有心灵能量护身，这使得他可以承受大量伤害。
translated: Hint - Delta has a psychic energy shield, which allows him to withstand a lot of damage.

label: LDR:A018
value: 提示 - 试验体-德尔塔在攻击命中目标时，会散发修复性的心灵波，修复周围单位。
translated: Hint - When Delta hits the target, it will emit a restorative wave to repair the surrounding units.

label: LDR:A019
value: 任务目标 - 探索地下实验区域，并找到出口。
translated: Mission Objective - Explore the underground experimental area and find the exit.

label: LDR:A020
value: “你为什么来救我？”
translated: "Why did you come to rescue me?"

label: LDR:A021
value: “你属于哪一支势力？”
translated: "Which faction do you belong to?"

label: LDR:A022
value: 「林德拉克： “你为什么来救我？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Why did you come to rescue me?"

label: LDR:A023
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我从中央数据库里面查到了和你相关的资料，认为你应该是坚定的反抗者。”」
translated: Delta: "I found information about you in the central database. I think you are firmly against Yuri."

label: LDR:A024
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们‘心灵起义军’把一切反抗尤里势力的人当作朋友看待。”」
translated: Delta: "We, the Psychic Rebellion, regard anyone who resists Yuri's forces as a friend."

label: LDR:A025
value: 「林德拉克： “你属于哪一支势力？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Which faction do you belong to?"

label: LDR:A026
