value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们自称‘心灵起义军’，是尤里阵营内部的一支反抗力量。”」
translated: Delta: "We call ourselves the Psychic Rebellion, and we are a resistance force within Yuri's camp."

label: LDR:A027
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我之前调查过你的资料，你也坚定的反对尤里对吧。”」
translated: Delta: "I have investigated your background before, and you are firmly against Yuri, right?"

label: LDR:A028
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这条路到尽头了，我们应该往另一边探索。”」
translated: Delta: "This road has come to an end. We should explore the other side."

label: LDR:A029
value: 「林德拉克： “该死，是一座基因突变器！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn, it's a genetic mutator!"

label: LDR:A030
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们可能想把逃跑的囚犯都基因突变为狂兽人。得在我们遭殃之前摧毁它！”」
translated: Delta: "They want to turn all escaped into brutes. We must destroy it before it happens to us!"

label: LDR:A031
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这台终端上好像有整座地下实验室的结构图。”」
translated: Delta: "This terminal seems to have a diagram of the entire underground laboratory."

label: LDR:A032
value: 终端交互 - 获得地图，小地图视野可用。
translated: Terminal interaction - Get the map, mini-map view is available.

label: LDR:A033
value: 「狂兽人： “痛！我的全身感到火辣辣的疼痛！他们在我的身上做了什么？！”」
translated: Brute: "It hurts! My whole body is burning with pain! What did they do to me?!"

label: LDR:A034
value: 「狂兽人： “……不要靠近我！我不想再受到惨无人道的折磨了！！我只想把眼前的东西都砸烂！！！”」
translated: Brute: "...Don't come to hurt me! I just want to smash everything in front of me!!!"

label: LDR:A035
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那就砸烂束缚你们的枷锁，和我们一起逃出去！”」
translated: Delta: "Then break the shackles that bind you and escape with us!"

label: LDR:A036
value: 提示 - 狂兽人可以破拆铁丝网。利用他们解救其他的囚犯。
translated: Tip - Brutes can break barbed wire. Use them to free other prisoners.

label: Name:RDLK2
value: 林德拉克（能流炮功率不足）
translated: Rynderack (Insufficient weapon power)

label: LDR:A037
value: 丧失关键单位 - 林德拉克阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Rynderack is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:A038
value: 丧失关键单位 - 试验体-德尔塔阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Delta is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:A039
value: 「“有囚犯靠近了监狱大门！启动毒气防御系统封锁出口，并增添兵力待命！”」
translated: "Prisoners are approaching the gate! Activate the gas defense system and request more troops on standby!"

label: LDR:A040
value: 警告 - 基因突变器启动还有30秒！
translated: Warning - 30 seconds until the Genetic Mutator activates!

label: LDR:A041
value: 「狂兽人： “对的，就是这样！我们要先把所有囚犯解救出来，然后一起逃出去！”」
translated: Brute: "Yes, that's right! We must rescue all the prisoners first, and then escape together!"

label: LDR:A042
value: 提示 - 所有囚犯都已解救。继续探索地下实验室的其他区域。
translated: Hint - All prisoners have been freed. Continue exploring other areas of the underground laboratory.

label: LDR:A043
value: 「林德拉克： “你为什么要背叛尤里？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Why did you betray Yuri?"

label: LDR:A044
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “……准确的说，是‘反抗’而非‘背叛’吧。”」
translated: Delta: "...To be precise, it is 'rebellion' rather than 'betrayal'."

label: LDR:A045
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “于是我们组成了‘心灵起义军’，成为在他的统治心脏之中的反抗力量。”」
translated: Delta: "So we formed the Psychic Rebellion and became a resistance force in the heart of his rule."

label: LDR:A046
value: “你为什么要背叛尤里？”
translated: "Why did you betray Yuri?"

label: LDR:A047
value: “现在我们的敌人是谁呢？”
translated: "Who is our enemy now?"

label: LDR:A048
value: “现在尤里军队的领袖是谁呢？”
translated: "Who is the leader of Yuri's army now?"

label: LDR:A049
value: “你在起身反抗之前，在尤里军中过的一定很惨吧？”
translated: "You must had a rough time before resisting?"

label: LDR:A050
value: 「林德拉克： “现在我们的敌人是谁呢？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Who is our enemy now?"

label: LDR:A051
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们的敌人当然是还在运营这座实验室的尤里残部。”」
translated: Delta: "Our enemy is of course Yuri's remnants who are still operating this laboratory."

label: LDR:A052
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “但很遗憾，我不清楚他们现在的领袖是谁。”」
translated: Delta: "But unfortunately, I don't know who their current leader is."

label: LDR:A053
value: 「林德拉克： “现在尤里军队的领袖是谁呢？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Who is the leader of Yuri's army now?"

label: LDR:A054
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我不清楚。按理来说，尤里本人已经随着命运之瞳解体而化为灰烬了。”」
translated: Delta: "I don't know. Yuri himself has already turned into ashes when the Eye of Fate disintegrated."

label: LDR:A055
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “难道是他留了一个后手，提前指定了一个继承人？我也只能猜测。”」
translated: Delta: "Could it be that he left a backup and designated a successor in advance? I can only speculate."

label: LDR:A056
value: 「林德拉克： “你在起身反抗之前，在尤里军中过的一定很惨吧？”」
translated: Rynderack: "You must had a rough time in Yuri's army before resisting, right?"

label: LDR:A057
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “唉……是挺惨的。”」
translated: Delta: "Ah... it's quite miserable."

label: LDR:A058
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “虽然试验体是他们无比珍贵的实验材料，但也仅仅是实验材料而已罢了。”」
translated: Delta: "Although the test subjects are precious, but they are still just experimental materials."

label: LDR:A059
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “就像餐桌上的高级鱼子酱一样，再高级也是果腹之物。”」
translated: Delta: "Just like the caviar on the table, no matter how luxurious, it is only to fill your stomach."

label: LDR:A060
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “唉……这里已经完全被摧毁了。”」
translated: Delta: "Alas... this place has been completely destroyed."

label: LDR:A061
value: 「林德拉克： （虽然这个地方有点奇怪，但他好像有什么心事，我还是不要问了为好）」
translated: "Rynderack: (This place is a bit strange, But it seems sensitive to him. I'd better not ask)"

label: LDR:A062
value: 警告 - 复制中心在全力运作，克隆大量狂兽人！
translated: WARNING - Cloning Vats is operating at full capacity, producing large numbers of Brutes!

label: LDR:A063
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那些复制中心有点麻烦。等救出了更多囚犯，我们就有能力炸毁它们。”」
translated: Delta: "Those Cloning Vats are a bit troublesome. We will be able to blow them up getting more forces."

label: LDR:A064
value: 「林德拉克： “基因突变器已经被毁，近在眼前的危机暂时性的结束了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "The Genetic Mutator has been destroyed. At least we are not in any immediate danger now."

label: LDR:A065
value: 「林德拉克： “我们得想办法多救出来些帮手，然后闯出去。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We have to find a way to rescue more helpers and then break out."

label: LDR:A066
value: “除了你以外，还有其他的试验体吗？”
translated: "Besides you, are there any other test subjects?"

label: LDR:A067
value: “我们还能在附近找到哪些帮助呢？”
translated: "What other help can we find nearby?"

label: LDR:A068
value: “逃出这座实验室以后，接下来我们怎么办？”
translated: "After escaping from this lab, what should we do next?"

label: LDR:A069
value: 「林德拉克： “除了你以外，还有其他的试验体吗？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Besides you, are there any other test subjects?"

label: LDR:A070
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “还有。但是我不想回忆起相关的事情了。”」
translated: Delta: "Yes, there is more. But I don't want to talk about it."

label: LDR:A071
value: 「林德拉克： （好像问到了敏感话题……算了我不问了）」
translated: Rynderack: (It seems like I've asked a sensitive question... Never mind, I won't ask anymore)"

label: LDR:A072
value: 「林德拉克： “我们还能在附近找到哪些帮助呢？”」
translated: Rynderack: "What other help can we find nearby?"

label: LDR:A073
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “心灵起义军的另一名领袖，艾拉，应该在接应我们的途中。”」
translated: Delta: "Another leader of the Psychic Rebellion, Ella, should be on her way to meet us."

label: LDR:A074
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “在她的帮助下，我们应该可以夺取尤里的生产设施来发展自己的力量。”」
translated: Delta: "With her help, we should be able to seize Yuri's facilities and develop our own strength."

label: LDR:A075
value: 「林德拉克： “逃出这座实验室以后，接下来我们怎么办？”」
translated: Rynderack: "After escaping this laboratory, what should we do next?"

label: LDR:A076
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “外面也全都是尤里残部的军队，我们得想办法离开他们的势力范围。”」
translated: Delta: "There are Yuri's remnants outside as well. We have to find a way to leave their zone of control."

label: LDR:A077
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “至少脱离他们的视线，躲在暗处，等找到机会再进行反攻。”」
translated: Delta: "At least get out of their sight, hide in the dark, and wait for an opportunity to counterattack."

label: LDR:A078
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “可别像之前德古拉要塞那次，和欧盟匆匆忙忙地发动进攻，反而收效甚微。”」
translated: Delta: "Don't rush into an attack with EU like we did in Dracula's Fortress, resulted in little success."

label: LDR:A079
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “尤里可是个野心家，他把身边的一切人都当作实现目标的工具。”」
translated: Delta: "Yuri is an ambitious man. He treats everyone around him as a tool to achieve his goals."

label: LDR:A080
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “妈的，不会聊天可以不聊……”」
translated: Delta: "F**k you, you don't have to talk if you don't know how to ..."

label: LDR:A081
value: 您的说话水平可真不错，下次不要再说了。
translated: (Sarcasm) You speak really well. Don't say that again next time.

label: LDR:A082
value: 终端交互 - 获得奖励木箱，解锁对话。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Get the bonus crate, unlock the dialogue.

label: LDR:A083
value: 失败的试验体
translated: Failed test subject

label: LDR:A084
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “好像有敌人的增援从实验区域北部过来了，我们得多多留意。”」
translated: Delta: "It seems that enemy reinforcement are coming from the north. We must pay close attention."

label: LDR:A085
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这些战车工厂在源源不断地生产盖特机炮坦克，先摧毁它们再说。”」
translated: Delta: "These war factories are continuously producing Gatling tanks. Let's destroy them first."

label: LDR:A086
value: 「林德拉克： “该死，他们在试图建造防御塔封锁这个路口！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn it, they're trying to build defenses to block this intersection!"

label: LDR:A087
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “摧毁他们的建造厂，动作快！”」
translated: Delta: "Destroy their construction yard, quickly!"

label: LDR:A088
value: 警告 - 一个心灵能量极高的危险单位正在接近！
translated: Warning - a dangerous unit with extremely high psychic energy is approaching!

label: LDR:A089
value: 「尤里改： “谢天谢地，终于有人来了！我都快喊破嗓子了……”」
translated: Yuri Prime: "Thank God, someone finally showed up! I was about to scream my throat out…"

label: LDR:A090
value: 「林德拉克： “什么情况，为什么尤里残部会囚禁尤里的复制体？”」
translated: Rynderack: "What's going on? Why would the Yuri's remnant imprison Yuri clone?"

label: LDR:A091
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “也许是因为这些复制体产生了独立意识。”」
translated: Delta: "Perhaps these replicas have developed independent consciousness."

label: LDR:A092
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “在尤里的部队中，任何产生独立意识的个体都会被视作异端，会被囚禁，甚至被清除。”」
translated: Delta: "In Yuri's army, anyone with independent consciousness will be imprisoned or even eliminated."

label: LDR:A093
value: 终端交互 - 获得基因突变器使用权一次。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Gain access to the Genetic Mutator once.

label: LDR:A094
value: 「林德拉克： “这个房间没有敌人，但有一些奇怪的设施。”」
translated: Rynderack: "This room has no enemies, but has some strange facilities."

label: LDR:A095
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这里是整个实验室的核心控制室。”」
translated: Delta: "This is the central control room of the entire laboratory."

label: LDR:A096
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这些设备似乎是一些机关，我们需要解开谜题才能打开出口的大门。”」
translated: Delta: "These devices forms some kind of mechanism. We need to solve the puzzle to open the exit door."

label: LDR:A097
value: 交互提示 - 点击周围的意念交互终端，以解开谜题。
translated: Interaction Hints - Click on the surrounding interactive terminals to solve the puzzle.

label: LDR:A098
value: 机关开启 - 所有传输装置全开，左侧大门已经打开。
translated: Mechanism activated - All transmission devices are on and the left door is open.

label: LDR:A099
value: 机关开启 - 所有传输装置全关，右侧大门已经打开。
translated: Mechanism activated - All transmission devices are off and the right door is open.

label: LDR:A100
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这里是监狱瞭望台。管理者可以通过这里监视囚犯的一举一动。”」
translated: Delta: "This is the observation tower. The administrator can monitor every move of prisoners from here."

label: LDR:A101
value: 「林德拉克： “这个地方的视野很不错，刚好可以俯瞰下层的广场。”」
translated: Rynderack: "This place has a great view, overlooking the square below."

label: LDR:A102
value: 终端交互 - 获得力场护盾永久使用权。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Gain permanent use of the force shield.

label: LDR:A103
value: 终端交互 - 已在试验场释放心灵球。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Released the Psychic Orb at the Proving Grounds.

label: LDR:A104
value: 终端交互 - 获得奖励木箱。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Get the Bonus Wooden Crate.

label: LDR:A105
value: 「林德拉克： “自由！离开这个实验室，我们即将重获自由！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Freedom! Leave this lab and we will be free!"

label: LDR:A106
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “先别着急庆祝，外面应该也都是敌人。”」
translated: Delta: "Don't celebrate too early. There are probably enemies outside."

label: LDR:A107
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “出洞口时，我们需要随时保持警惕，准备战斗。”」
translated: Delta: "When we exit, we need to stay alert and be ready to fight."

label: LDR:A108
value: 已找到地下实验室的出口，任务完成。
translated: The exit of the underground laboratory has been found, object complete.

label: LDR:A109
value: 「林德拉克： “怎么回事，地震了吗？”」
translated: Rynderack: "What's going on? Is there an earthquake?"

label: LDR:A110
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不是。我能感受到，是某种强烈的心灵波产生的震动。”」
translated: Delta: "No. I can feel it. It's the vibration caused by some strong psychic waves."

label: Name:YGTSFR
value: 意念能量传输装置
translated: Spiritual energy transmission device

label: LDR:A111
value: 机关关闭 - 左右大门均关闭。
translated: Mechanism Closed - Both left and right doors are closed.

label: LDR:A112
value: 「工程师： “啊！我真的只是被迫——”」
translated: Engineer: "Ah! I was really just forced—"

label: LDR:A113
value: 「？？？： “到此为止了，小猫咪们！放下武器，回牢笼去吧！”」
translated: ???: "That's enough, kittens! Drop your weapons and return to your cages!"

label: LDR:A114
value: 「林德拉克： “糟了，我们中埋伏了！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Oh no, we've been ambushed!"

label: LDR:A115
value: 「艾拉： “我来了！”」
translated: Ella: "Here I come!"

label: LDR:A116
value: 提示 - 艾拉已经带领心灵起义军的接应小队到达。
translated: Hint - Ella has arrived with the Psychic Rebellion support team.

label: LDR:A117
value: 「艾拉： “现在由心灵起义军来接管这个基地！”」
translated: Ella: "The Psychic Rebellion will now take over this base!"

label: LDR:A118
value: 「艾拉： “如果你们还有一丝丝残存的自我意识，请加入我们反抗的行列中来！”」
translated: Ella: "If you still have a shred of self-awareness, please join us in the resistance!"

label: LDR:A119
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “艾拉！我就知道你会来的这么及时！”」
translated: Delta: "Ella! I knew you would come just in time!"

label: LDR:A120
value: 提示 - 使用援军中的工程师占领敌人的生产建筑物。
translated: Hint - Use Engineers from your reinforcements to capture enemy production buildings.

label: LDR:A121
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “现在去厕所干什么？难不成厕所下面有秘密通道？”」
translated: Delta: "Why are you going to the toilet now? Is there a secret passage under the bathroom?"

label: LDR:A122
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “厕所！又是厕所！！你对厕所有什么说不清道不明的执念吗？”」
translated: Delta: "Toilet! Toilet again!! Do you have some inexplicable obsession with toilets?"

label: LDR:A123
value: 「尤里新兵： “噫嘿……舒服！刚才差点就憋不住了。”」
translated: Initiate: "Ahhh... It feels so good! I almost couldn't hold it in just now."

label: LDR:A124
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “艾拉，这附近你比我熟悉多了，介绍一下周围的情况吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Ella, you are much more familiar with this area. Please introduce the surroundings to us."

label: LDR:A125
value: 「艾拉： “在北边有一座严密防守的港口，港口里面有一些运输船。”」
translated: Ella: "There is a heavily defended port in the north, and there are some transport ships in the port."

label: LDR:A126
value: 「艾拉： “如果我们想要离开这个地方，就必须夺取它们。”」
translated: Ella: "We must take them if we want to leave this place."

label: LDR:A127
value: 「艾拉： “在东边有一座废弃的铁幕装置，但我觉得它破损严重到无法修复……”」
translated: Ella: "There is an abandoned Iron Curtain device to the east, but I think it's beyond repaired..."

label: LDR:A128
value: 「林德拉克： “用不上完全修复。只要我能找到一些有用的零部件，就能修好我的聚能射线枪。”」
translated: Rynderack: "It doesn't need to be. As long as there are useful parts, I can repair my energy weapon."

label: LDR:A129
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那我们先去那座铁幕装置附近看看，然后再考虑夺取港口的计划。”」
translated: Delta: "Then let's go to the Iron Curtain first, and then come up with a plan to seize the port."

label: LDR:A130
value: 任务目标 - 护送林德拉克到达铁幕装置。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort Rynderack to the Iron Curtain Device.

label: LDR:A131
value: 任务目标 - 肃清港口并夺取运输船。
translated: Mission Objective - Clear the port and capture the amphibious transport.

label: LDR:A132
value: 警告 - 大量空中目标正在接近这个区域！
translated: WARNING - AERIAL TARGETS ARE APPROACHING THE AREA!

label: LDR:A133
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “怎么回事？难道还有别的势力来搅局？”」
translated: Delta: "What's going on? Is there another force trying to disrupt the situation?"

label: LDR:A134
value: 提示 - 美国军队的目标似乎是这里的村庄，应尽量避免和美国军队正面冲突。
translated: Hint - The US military's target seems to be the village here. Try to avoid direct confrontation with them.

label: LDR:A135
value: 警告 - 大量舰队正在港口外集结！
translated: Warning - A large fleet is gathering outside the port!

label: LDR:A136
value: 「火箭飞行兵： “看！尤里的部队之间正在自相残杀！是他们内部出现了叛乱吗？”」
translated: Rocketeer: "Look! Yuri's troops are killing each other! Is there a rebellion among them?"

label: LDR:A137
value: 「卡维利： “嗯，这也不是不可能。我们最好先隔岸观火，等着坐收渔翁之利。”」
translated: Carville: "Well, it's not impossible. We'd better wait and see what happens."

label: LDR:A138
value: 「卡维利： “全舰队听令，封锁港口但不要进攻，密切监视冲突双方动向！”」
translated: Carville: "All fleets, listen up. Block the port but don't attack. Keep a close eye on both sides!"

label: LDR:A139
value: 「卡维利： “空军继续执行战斗侦查，以削弱最近的防空力量为主。”」
translated: Carville: "The Air Force keep conducting combat reconnaissance operations, primarily to weaken their AA."

label: LDR:A140
value: 提示 - 美国舰队暂时不会进攻，我们需要抓紧这宝贵的时间了。
translated: Hint - The US fleet will not attack for the time being, we need to take this precious opportunity.

label: LDR:A141
value: 「卡维利： “尤里叛军的战术相当保守啊……我等得都快睡着了。”」
translated: Carville: "The tactics of Yuri's rebels are quite conservative... I almost fell asleep while waiting."

label: LDR:A142
value: 林德拉克已经成功到达铁幕装置附近，目标完成。
translated: Rynderack has successfully reached the vicinity of the Iron Curtain device, object complete.

label: LDR:A143
value: 「林德拉克： “巧了，刚好有一些设备还没坏……待我调调看。”」
translated: Rynderack: "What a coincidence, there are some devices that are still working...let me check them out."

label: LDR:A144
value: 「林德拉克： “好的，聚能射线枪能量环流器参数已经恢复，现在它会以最大功率输出。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Okay, the energy circulator have been restored. My weapon will output at maximum power."

label: LDR:A145
value: 提示 - 林德拉克现在拥有强大的范围攻击能力，但对攻击点附近的友军同样致命。
translated: Hint - Rynderack now has a powerful AoE attack, but it is also deadly to nearby friendly units.

label: LDR:A146
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 铁幕装置在林德拉克进入之前被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - The Iron Curtain device is destroyed before Rynderack can enter, mission failed.

label: LDR:A147
value: 艾拉受了重伤，她暂时无法参与战斗了。
translated: Ella was seriously injured. She could not participate in the battle for the time being.

label: LDR:A148
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “虽然暂时还没有心控科技，但磁电坦克也足够我们用来拆毁防御塔了。”」
translated: Delta: "Although we don't have mind control tech yet, magnetrons are enough to demolish the defenses."

label: LDR:A149
value: 港口已经肃清，现在去运输船附近准备上船。
translated: The port has been cleared, now head to the amphibious transport to prepare to board.

label: LDR:A150
value: 丧失关键单位 - 运输船被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - transport destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:A151
value: 美国，阿拉斯加州，诺姆。
translated: Nome, Alaska, United States.

label: LDR:A152
value: 已成功掌握运输船，目标完成。
translated: Successfully captured the transport ship, objective complete.

label: LDR:A153
value: 「林德拉克： “现在还不能离开。我还得去废弃铁幕装置那边调整武器，以准备以后的战斗。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We can't leave now. I still have to fix my weapon in the abandoned Iron Curtain."

label: LDR:A154
value: 「艾拉： “尤里残部在北极圈还有若干军事基地，对于起义军来说既是威胁又是机会。”」
translated: Ella: "Yuri's remnants still have some bases in the Arctic. This is both a threat and an opportunity."

label: LDR:A155
value: 「艾拉： “我在格陵兰那边还有些事情，西伯利亚方向靠你们两个了。”」
translated: Ella: "I have other things to do in Greenland, so I'll rely on you two for Siberia."

label: LDR:A156
value: 「艾拉： “只能分道扬镳了。”」
translated: Ella: "We have no choice but to go our separate ways."

label: LDR:A157
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “您对厕所的执着真是令人印象深刻……”」
translated: Delta: "Your obsession with the toilet is really impressive..."

label: LDR:A158
value: 注意 - 美国空军正在对尤里雕像发动攻击！
translated: Attention - the US Air Force is launching an attack on the Yuri statue!

label: LDR:AC
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “心灵起义军已经摆脱了阿拉斯加的牢笼，然而反抗才刚刚开始。”」
translated: Delta: "The Psychic Rebellion has escaped from the prison of Alaska, but the resistance has just begun."

label: Name:CAEUFGL
value: 欧盟旗帜
translated: European Union Flag

label: LDR:A159
value: 警告 - 更多的美国空军部队正在抵达！
translated: WARNING - MORE US AIR FORCE ARE ARRIVING!

label: LDR:A160
value: 警告 - 检测到重型轰炸机正在接近！注意避开轰炸区！
translated: Warning - Heavy bombers detected! Avoid the bombing zone!

label: LDR:A161
value: 提示 - 港口威胁未解除或还有其他目标未完成，现在还不能上船离开。
translated: Hint - The port is not secure or there are other objectives to be completed. You may not leave now.

label: LDR:C001
value: 美国，俄勒冈州，波特兰。
translated: Portland, Oregon, United States.

label: LDR:C002
value: 「卡维利： “守住防线！我们不能再退了！”」
translated: Carville: "Hold the line! We can't retreat any further!"

label: LDR:C003
value: “我们原计划把基地车在这座港口送上岸，以威胁敌人在附近的一座不明装置。”
translated: "We originally planned to land the MCV at this port to counter an unidentified building nearby."

label: LDR:C004
value: “可现在波特兰的美国军队已经快要被赶下威拉米特河了，我们不能坐视不理。”
translated: "But We can't just sit there, as the American troops are about to be driven down the Willamette River."

label: LDR:C005
value: “我们必须确保能从这座港口登陆。那只有一种办法了：接管这里的美军防线。”
translated: "We must land at this port. There is only one way to do that: take over the American defenses here."

label: LDR:C006
value: “是的，占领他们的建造厂，这样应该就能直接接管他们的指挥权。”
translated: "Yes, capture their construction yard, so that we should be able to take over their command."

label: LDR:C007
value: 任务目标 - 强行占领波特兰的美军建造厂。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture the American Construction yard in Portland.

label: LDR:C008
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我已经设法带领一支部队进入了城市。”」
translated: Delta: "I have managed to lead a force into the city."

label: LDR:C009
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “动作快！我们不知道美国人还能撑多久！！”」
translated: Delta: "Hurry up! We don't know how long the Americans can hold!"

label: LDR:C010
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “绕开那些楼房，那里面可有美国大兵驻扎。”」
translated: Delta: "Avoid those buildings. There are GI garrisoned inside."

label: LDR:C011
value: 「精神控制车： “等等，那些尤里残部的部队是怎么回事？”」
translated: Mastermind: "Wait, what's going on with those Yuri remnants?"

label: LDR:C012
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们正处于更强的心灵能量的影响下……我们的心灵控制无法对他们生效。”」
translated: Delta: "They are under the influence of stronger psychic energy… our mind control are ineffective."

label: LDR:C014
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “派更多的狂兽人来！对付这些废铁还得靠更硬的拳头！”」
translated: Delta: "Send more brutes! We need more force to deal with these scrap metals!"

label: LDR:C015
value: 注意 - 远离美国人和尤里残部的交战区域，避免被卷入混战。
translated: NOTE - Stay away from the fighting area to avoid being caught in the cross fire.

label: LDR:C016
value: 警告 - 美国人的防线正在崩溃！他们可能支撑不了多久了！
translated: Warning - American defenses are collapsing! They may not hold out much longer!

label: LDR:C017
value: 提示 - 我们最好避开美军基地的正面防御，从侧面薄弱处发动突袭。
translated: Hint - It is best to avoid the frontal defense of the US base and flank it from the side.

label: LDR:C018
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 美军建造厂被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - American construction yard destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:C019
value: 注意 - 我们需要占领美军的建造厂，不能让它被摧毁！
translated: Attention - we need to capture the American construction yard and not destroy it!

label: LDR:C020
value: 试验体-德尔塔受到了重伤，他已经不能继续战斗。
translated: Delta was seriously injured and could no longer fight.

label: LDR:C021
value: 丧失关键单位 - 我们没有更多的工程师了，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNITS LOST - we have no more engineers, mission failed.

label: LDR:C022
value: 更多的工程师准备通过空降的形式抵达。请为他们指引安全的降落区域。
translated: More engineers are arriving by airdrop. Please direct them to a safe landing area.

label: LDR:C023
value: 「卡维利： “该死！防线岌岌可危，我们得准备撤离了！”」
translated: Carville: "Damn it! The defense line is in jeopardy, we have to evacuate!"

label: LDR:C024
value: 美军撤离预估时间
translated: Estimated time for US military withdrawal

label: LDR:C025
value: 成功占领美军的建造厂，任务完成。
translated: Successfully captured the US construction yard, objective complete.

label: LDR:C026
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “现在这座基地由心灵起义军接管！所有人听令，继续抵抗尤里残部的进攻！”」
translated: Delta: "This base is now taken over by the Psychic Rebellion! Everyone listen up and keep resisting!"

label: LDR:C027
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “起义军的援军正在接近这座港口，你们不是孤军！”」
translated: Delta: "Reinforcements from the rebels are approaching this port. You are not alone!"

label: LDR:C028
translated: Carville: "???"

label: LDR:C029
value: 「卡维利： “等等，你们就是在阿拉斯加……没想到会以这种方式认识你们。”」
translated: Carville: "Wait, you guys are in Alaska… I didn't expect to meet you this way."

label: LDR:C030
value: 「卡维利： “我会将前线指挥权交出，更专注于后方支援的调度。”」
translated: Carville: "I will hand over the front-line command and focus more on the dispatch of rear support."

label: LDR:C031
value: 提示 - 已接管波特兰美军基地的控制权。
translated: Hint - Control of the American military base in Portland has been taken over.

label: LDR:C032
value: 「卡维利： “我会调动附近所有的资源和队赶来，支援波特兰的战场。”」
translated: Carville: "I will mobilize all nearby resources to come and support the battlefield in Portland."

label: LDR:C033
value: 提示 - 心灵起义军的登陆部队已经在港口外就绪，包含一辆尤里基地车。
translated: Hint - The Psychic Rebellion landing force is ready outside the port, including a Yuri MCV.

label: LDR:C034
value: 提示 - 我们还不能对尤里基地车进行量产，但是可以生产盟军基地车来拓展建造范围。
translated: Hint - We can't mass produce the Yuri MCV yet, but we can produce the Allied MCV to expand.

label: LDR:C035
value: 提示 - 我们已经可以训练混乱部队。
translated: Hint - We can now train Chaos Troops.

label: LDR:C036
value: 提示 - 他们可以喷射毒气，从远处使敌人陷入混乱状态，或者使建筑物内部产生损坏。
translated: Hint - They can spray gas, confusing enemies from a distance, or cause damage inside buildings.

label: LDR:C037
value: 提示 - 美军正在协助我们训练心灵突击队。他们可以通过空降投入战场。
translated: Hint - The US military is helping us train Psi commando. They can be air-dropped into the battlefield.

label: Name:PARAYURI2
value:
心灵空投
(部署2名
心灵突击队)
translated:
Psychic Airdrop
(Deploy 2 Psi commando)

label: LDR:C038
value: 提示 - 我们还没有回收镭射幽浮的技术，在空中力量方面更依赖美国军备。
translated: Hint - We can't produce floating discs yet and are more dependent on US armaments for air power.

label: Name:PARAENGINEER
value: 空降工程师
translated: Airborne Engineer

label: LDR:C039
value: 提示 - 工程师已经投放，请注意警戒降落区。
translated: Hint - Engineers has been dropped, please be aware of the landing zone.

label: LDR:C040
value: 警告 - 检测到能量浪涌！我们已经定位大型不明装置的位置！
translated: WARNING - ENERGY SURGE DETECTED! We have located a large unidentified building!

label: LDR:C041
value: 「？？？： “检测到4号试验体产生了‘好奇’的情绪，正在记录数据……”」
translated: ???: "The emotion of 'curiosity' has been detected in Test subject No. 4, recording data…"

label: LDR:C042
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “等一下，是谁接入了我们的通讯线路？”」
translated: Delta: "Wait a minute, who has access to our communication line?"

label: LDR:C043
value: 「？？？： “这里是『最终意志』。正在通过心灵广播链路接入。”」
translated: ???: "This is the Final Spirit. Connecting via psychic broadcast link."

label: LDR:C044
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “你是谁？是尤里的继承人吗？？”」
translated: Delta: "Who are you? Are you Yuri's successor?"

label: LDR:C045
value: 「最终意志： “本体为由程序与网络节点构成的AI复合体，但可以认为是尤里意志的继承。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "An AI complex composed of network nodes. It can be considered the successor of Yuri."

label: LDR:C046
value: 「最终意志： “其本质是尤里在死前将思维上传，进而在心灵网络中成型的独立人格。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "It's an independent personality formed in the psychic network based on Yuri's thoughts uploaded before his death."

label: LDR:C047
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他的意志居然还以这种方式存在着……那你的目的到底是什么？”」
translated: Delta: "His will still exists in this way... What is your purpose?"

label: LDR:C048
value: 「最终意志： “这是实验的一部分。4号试验体也只是实验的产物而已。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "This is part of the experiment. Test Subject No. 4 is just a product of the experiment."

label: LDR:C049
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “算了，不听这个AI自说自话了，还是先想办法破坏那座装置吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Forget it, I won't listen to this AI anymore. Let's find a way to destroy the device first."

label: LDR:C050
value: “这座『意念核心』连接了3座意念压制塔和3座计算主机。”
translated: "This 'Spiritual Core' connects to three Spiritual Suppression Towers and three compute hosts."

label: LDR:C051
value: “只要将它们全部破坏，就可以让其无法运作。”
translated: "Just destroy them all to make it inoperable."

label: LDR:C052
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁意念核心连接的三座计算主机。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the three compute hosts connected to the Spiritual Core.

label: LDR:C053
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁意念核心连接的三座意念压制塔。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the three Spiritual Suppression Towers.

label: LDR:C054
value: “『意念核心』已经开始充能。我们尚不清楚它的作用，请务必小心。”
translated: "The 'Spiritual Core' has begun charging. We don't know what it does yet, so please be careful."

label: LDR:CT000
value: 意念增幅
translated: Spiritual Amplification

label: LDR:CT001
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅1次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 1 time)

label: LDR:CT002
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅2次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 2 times)

label: LDR:CT003
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅3次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 3 times)

label: LDR:CT004
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅4次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 4 times)

label: LDR:CT005
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅5次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 5 times)

label: LDR:CT006
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅6次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 6 times)

label: LDR:CT007
value: 意念增幅 （已增幅7次）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Activated 7 times)

label: LDR:C055
value: 警告 - 意念增幅已经发动！
translated: Warning - Spiritual Amplification has been activated!

label: LDR:C056
value: 警告 - 我们已经确认了『意念核心』的作用。它可以持续强化与『最终意志』连接的所有部队。
translated: Warning - The "Spiritual Core" can continuously boost all units connected to the "Final Spirit".

label: LDR:C057
value: 警告 - 这种强化会不断叠加，使他们越来越强大！
translated: WARNING - these boosts stack, making them stronger and stronger!

label: LDR:C058
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “看来，我们得趁敌人还没有变得太强之前赶紧进攻。”」
translated: Delta: "It seems that we must attack quickly before the enemy becomes too strong."

label: LDR:C059
value: 「卡维利： “天气控制器的资料已经传输完毕。”」
translated: Carville: "The blueprint to the Weather Control Device has been transmitted."

label: LDR:C060
value: 「卡维利： “一旦建立天气控制器，我们就可以召唤闪电风暴来杀伤敌人。”」
translated: Carville: "Once we build the Weather Control Device, we can summon lightning storms against enemies."

label: LDR:C061
value: 「卡维利： “更多的美国陆军正在进入城市。”」
translated: Carville: "More U.S. army are moving into cities."

label: LDR:C062
value: 「卡维利： “『蒲公英』空中战术小队已经赶赴波特兰港口。”」
translated: Carville: "The 'Dandelion' aerial tactical team has arrived at the Port of Portland."

label: LDR:C063
value: 「卡维利： “他们都是最精英的空军部队，请妥善的利用。”」
translated: Carville: "They are the elites of air force, please use them properly."

label: LDR:C064
value: 提示 - 城市中还有数座心灵信标，它们控制着一些美国守军。
translated: Hint - There are several Psychic Beacons in the city, which control some of the American defenders.

label: LDR:C065
value: 提示 - 摧毁这些心灵信标以解救他们。
translated: Hint - Destroy these Psychic Beacons to free them.

label: LDR:C066
value: 提示 - 已摧毁一座意念压制塔。
translated: Hint - A Spiritual Suppression Tower has been destroyed.

label: LDR:C067
value: 提示 - 已摧毁一座尤里计算主机。
translated: Hint - A Yuri Compute Host has been destroyed.

label: Name:ADCLZY
value: 苍蓝之鹰
translated: Blue Eagle

label: LDR:C068
value: 提示 - 已摧毁一座心灵信标，附近的美军得到解救。
translated: Hint - A Psychic Beacon has been destroyed and the American troops nearby have been rescued.

label: LDR:C069
value: 已摧毁所有意念压制塔和计算主机，目标完成。
translated: All Spiritual Suppression Towers and compute hosts have been destroyed. Objective complete.

label: LDR:C070
value: 「最终意志： “4号试验体阻止了实验的进行，已将其标识为重点清除目标。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Subject No. 4 has obstructed the experiment. It has been identified for elimination."

label: LDR:C071
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “随你怎么办吧。反正现在这座『意念核心』已经没法运行了。”」
translated: Delta: "It's up to you. Whatever, this 'Spiritual Core' is no longer functioning."

label: LDR:C072
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “还是得好好调查一下，『最终意志』的秘密也许就藏在其中……”」
translated: Delta: "We still need to investigate it carefully. The secret of the 'Final Spirit' may hides inside..."

label: LDR:C073
value: 提示 - 心灵控制器已摧毁，敌人无法继续输送更多被心灵控制的部队了。
translated: Hint - The Psychic Dominator has been destroyed. The enemy can no longer send more mind controlled troops.

label: LDR:C074
value: 「卡维利： “怎么回事，他们怎么不继续释放『意念增幅』了？”」
translated: Carville: "What's going on? Why don't they continue to release the "Spiritual Amplification"?"

label: LDR:C075
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我能感受到，现在心灵能量已经到了一个危险的量级。”」
translated: Delta: "I can feel that the psychic energy has reached a dangerous level now."

label: LDR:C076
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “如果继续增幅下去，怕是他们也承受不住吧。”」
translated: Delta: "If the power continues to increase, Perhaps they won't be able to bear it."

label: LDR:C077
value: 「最终意志： “能量输出水平已经很危险，为了避免烧毁，不能继续增幅。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "The energy output level is critical. It cannot be increased further to avoid meltdown."

label: LDR:C078
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “对，你可以闭嘴了。”」
translated: Delta: "Right, you can shut up now."

label: LDR:C079
value: 「最终意志： “4号试验体的情绪不稳定，正在记录。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Subject No. 4 is emotionally unstable, recording in progress."

label: LDR:C080
value: 我方部队全灭 - 我们没有更多的进攻部队了，任务失败。
translated: All our troops have been destroyed - We have no more attacking troops, mission failed.

label: LDU:A050
value: 已经肃清仁川的海港，制海权很快就会落入我们的手中。
translated: The harbor of Inchon has been cleared, and control of the sea will soon be in our hands.

label: LDU:A051
value: 敌人桥头防御基地已经被击破，永宗大桥很快会对我们畅通无阻。
translated: The enemy's bridgehead defense has been broken. The Yeongjong Bridge will soon be open to us.

label: LDU:A052
value: 已经击溃敌人的补给基地，仁川城区的资源都将为我们所用。
translated: The enemy's supply base has been destroyed. All the resources in Incheon city will be at our disposal.

label: Name:CACABR
value:
卡布里欧国家纪念碑
纪念欧洲探险家胡安-罗德里格斯-卡布里欧
于1542年9月28日在圣迭戈湾登陆。
他是第一个踏足北美洲东海岸的欧洲人。
translated:
Cabrillo National Monument
Commemorates the landing of European explorer Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo in San Diego Bay on September 28, 1542.
He was the first European to set foot on the east coast of North America.

label: LDU:E062
value: 警告 - 「意念压制塔」会散发出破坏性的心灵波，对冒然靠近它所有单位造成伤害。
translated: Warning - The "Spiritual Suppression Tower" will emit destructive psychic waves, causing damage to all units that come close to it.

label: LDR:C081
value: 「卡维利： “这座基地……难道是『命运之瞳』的组装基地？”」
translated: Carville: "This base... could it be the assembly base of the Eye of Fate?"

label: LDR:C082
value: 「卡维利： “不过看使用痕迹来看，应该是刚开工没多久。”」
translated: Carville: "But judging by the trace, it should have been constructed recently."

label: LDR:C083
value: 「卡维利： “他们很早就开始了『命运之瞳』的量产计划，应该不止在这里。”」
translated: Carville: "They started mass producing Eye of Fate a long time ago. This should not be only base."

label: LDR:CC
value: 试验体-德尔塔： “我们确认了敌人的身份，并缴获了一座『意念核心』，隐藏于幕后的敌人终于被揭露。”
translated: Delta: "We have identified the enemy and seized a 'Spiritual Core'. The enemy hiding behind the scenes has finally been revealed."

label: LDR:C084
value: 「卡维利： “我已经把这座基地剩余的军费全数移交给你。”」
translated: Carville: "I have transferred all the remaining funds of this base to you."

label: LDR:C085
value: 「卡维利： “必须整合现有的力量了，不论是兵力科技还是金钱，总之是一切可以带来战斗力的东西。”」
translated: Carville: "We must integrate all that can bring combat effectiveness. Units, technology and fund."

label: LDR:D001
value: 美国，圣迭戈。
translated: San Diego, USA.

label: LDR:D002
value: 「安磊： “这是一场遍布世界的浩劫，没有人能够置身事外、独善其身。”」
translated: Anlei: "This is a global scale catastrophe. No one can stay out of it."

label: LDR:D003
value: 「安磊： “中国远征军已经做好了准备。我们将追击他们到天涯海角，直到完全胜利。”」
translated: Anlei: "The Chinese force is ready. We will pursue them until we achieve complete victory."

label: LDR:D004
value: 「清芷： “同志，若要在美国西海岸发动登陆，我们的舰队必须面对最终意志控制下的美国空军。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Comrade, if we want to land on the west coast, we must face the mind-controlled US Air Force."

label: LDR:D005
value: 「清芷： “他们的战机数量太多了。如果贸然靠近海岸，我们的登陆艇在海面上就如同气球靶子一样易碎。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "They have too many fighters. Our landing craft will be smashed should be approach the coast."

label: LDR:D006
value: 「安磊： “这也正是我们这一次合作的目的。我们需要你们的帮助，以掩护我们的登陆行动。”」
translated: Anlei: "This is the reason of our cooperation. We need your help to cover our landing operation."

label: LDR:D007
value: 「安磊： “需要对科罗纳多岛发动一次佯攻，吸引此处敌人空军的大部分力量。”」
translated: Anlei: "We need to launch a feint attack on Coronado Island to draw out enemy's air force."

label: LDR:D008
value: 「清芷： “首先，这里的间谍卫星终端必须被摧毁，这样他们就无法远距离探测中国舰队的动向了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "First, destroy the spy satellites so that they won't detect the movement of Chinese fleet."

label: LDR:D009
value: 任务目标 - 在限定时间内摧毁两座间谍卫星终端。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy two spy satellite uplinks.

label: LDR:D010
value: 「清芷： “然后尽可能的防守科罗纳多岛。在这里你可能吸引到敌人的全部空军火力。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Then hold Coronado Island as much as possible. You may draw all the firepower of enemy."

label: LDR:D011
value: 「清芷： “我们一旦完成登陆行动，会帮你们分担大部分压力，创造反攻机会。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Once we land, we will help you ease most of the pressure and prepare for counterattack."

label: LDR:D012
value: 心灵起义军的部队已经混入运输船队，成功登陆科罗纳多岛。
translated: The Psychic Rebellion have infiltrated the transport fleet and successfully landed on Coronado Island.

label: LDR:D013
value: 中国舰队被锁定预估时间
translated: Estimated time for the Chinese fleet to be targeted

label: LDR:D014
value: 任务目标 - 保证至少一座基地建筑物存在，直到中国登陆行动成功。
translated: Mission Objective - Hold the ground until the Chinese landing operation completes.

label: LDR:D015
value: 警告 - 中国舰队即将进入卫星探测范围，时间已经所剩无几！
translated: Warning - The Chinese fleet is about to enter satellite detection range, and time is running out!

label: LDR:D016
value: 成功摧毁了一座间谍卫星终端。
translated: Successfully destroyed a spy satellite uplink.

label: LDR:D017
value: 所有间谍卫星终端都已被摧毁，任务完成。
translated: All spy satellite uplinks have been destroyed, objective complete.

label: LDR:D018
value: 「清芷： “干的漂亮，同志！他们应该难以远距离监控后续的登陆舰队了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Well done, comrade! It should be difficult for them to monitor the landing fleet."

label: LDR:D019
value: 「清芷： “但战斗还没有结束，你们还需要把敌人的注意力死死的吸引在你们身上。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But the battle is not over yet. You still need to draw the enemy's attention to you."

label: LDR:D020
value: 「清芷： “只要拖到中国舰队发起登陆，我们就有办法逆转局势。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We will be able to reverse the situation as long as you can hold until we land."

label: LDR:D021
value: 警告 - 敌人的战斗机正在接近！
translated: Warning - enemy fighters are approaching!

label: LDR:D022
value: 「安磊： “只有这些大可爱们能从水下快速抵达前线了。好好利用它们！”」
translated: Anlei: "Only these cute ones can quickly reach the front line from underwater. Make good use of them!"

label: LDR:D023
value: 「清芷： “一支防空小组正在向科罗纳多岛空降。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "An air defense team is airdropping to Coronado Island."

label: LDR:D024
value: 「清芷： “我们的其余主力必须用来攻击滩头阵地，但愿这些防空部队能派上用场。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The rest of our force must be used to attack the beachhead. I hope these AA can be useful."

label: LDR:D025
value: 任务时间耗尽 - 中国的舰队已被锁定，他们即将遭受轰炸，任务失败。
translated: Mission time is running out - the Chinese fleet has been targeted, mission failed.

label: LDR:D026
value: 警告 - 一个不明水上目标正在接近科罗纳多！
translated: WARNING - An unidentified aquatic target is approaching Coronado!

label: LDR:D027
value: 「清芷： “呃，那……是什么鬼东西？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Uh, what the hell is that?"

label: LDR:D028
value: 「清芷： “我们的数据库里面没有这种东西的资料，说不定是什么的原型机……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "There is no intel about this thing in our database. It might be a prototype of something..."

label: LDR:D029
value: 「安磊： “它看起来是一种悬浮的要塞，而且具有远距离攻击能力。”」
translated: Anlei: "It looks like a floating fortress with long-range attack capabilities."

label: LDR:D030
value: 「安磊： “看起来不像是尤里或美国人的设计，他们的战术思想不会搞出这种‘海上堡垒’来。”」
translated: Anlei: "It doesn't look like Yuri or American design. Their doctrine would not lead to 'sea fortress.'"

label: LDR:D031
value: 提示 - 额外的镭射幽浮部队也已经抵达。
translated: Hint - Additional floating discs have also arrived.

label: LDR:D032
value: 「安磊： “我已经派出一支潜艇部队供你调遣。”」
translated: Anlei: "I have sent a submarine force for your deployment."

label: LDR:D033
value: 提示 - 我们已经拿到了镭射幽浮的关键图纸，现在我们可以批量生产它了。
translated: Hint - We can now mass produce floating discs.

label: LDR:D034
value: 提示 - 我们已经可以建造『心能尖塔』，它可以回复周围空军单位的耐久。
translated: Hint - We can now build "Psychic Spire", which can restore the durability of surrounding air units.

label: LDR:D035
value: 提示 - 『心能尖塔』同样可以解锁尤里机动基地车的建造权限。
translated: Hint - The Psychic Spire also unlocks the production of Yuri MCV.

label: LDR:D036
value: 警告 - 检测到大规模的重型轰炸机编队！
translated: Warning - massive heavy bomber formation detected!

label: LDR:D037
value: 「清芷： “坚持住，同志！我们马上就来了！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Hold on, comrade! We're coming soon!"

label: LDR:D038
value: 目标未达成 - 在中国军队到达前损失了所有基地建筑，任务失败。
translated: Objective not achieved - All base structures are lost before the Chinese troops arrive, mission failed.

label: LDR:D039
value: 中国军队已经开始在圣迭戈发动大规模登陆行动。
translated: Chinese troops have begun a large-scale landing operation in San Diego.

label: LDR:D040
value: 「安磊： “我们来了！敌人的防御完全忽视了这个方向，使得我们可以安全登陆。”」
translated: Anlei: "We are here! The enemy completely ignored this direction, allowing us to land safely."

label: LDR:D041
value: 「安磊： “接下来到我的回合了。我会先巩固滩头阵地，然后找机会发起进攻。”」
translated: Anlei: "It's my turn now. I will first consolidate the beachhead. Then I will prepare for an attack."

label: LDR:D042
value: 「清芷： “我已经为你们准备了重建需要的基地车和资金。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I have prepared the base vehicles and funds you need for reconstruction."

label: LDR:D043
value: 「清芷： “你可以选择一个位置重新建立基地，并和安磊将军一起发动反攻。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "You can choose a location to rebuild and launch a counterattack with General Anlei."

label: LDR:D044
value: 警告 - 检测到天气控制器！
translated: WARNING - WEATHER CONTROL DEVICE DETECTED!

label: LDR:D045
value: 警告 - 检测到一个不明重型单位！
translated: WARNING - An unidentified heavy unit has been detected!

label: LDR:D046
value: 「安磊： “我的部队已经肃清科罗纳多岛北部的机场。”」
translated: Anlei: "My troops have cleared the airport in the north of Coronado Island."

label: LDR:D047
value: 「安磊： “我会在这里拓展基地，并与敌人展开巷战。你要一起来嘛？”」
translated: Anlei: "I will expand the base here and engage with the enemy. Do you want to come with me?"

label: LDR:D048
value: 提示 - 中国突击队员天权已经进入战场。
translated: Hint - Chinese commando Tianquan has entered the battlefield.

label: LDR:D049
value: 「天权： “啊，陌生的土地！我也是第一次来到太平洋的另一岸执行任务。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Ah, foreign land! This is my first time to operate on the other side of the Pacific."

label: Name:TARGET
value: 选择位置
translated: Select Location

label: LDR:D050
value: 提示 - 额外的空降部队已经抵达。
translated: Hint - Additional airborne troops have arrived.

label: LDR:D051
value: 提示 - 我们设法弄到了一批雷鸣潜艇，它们已经潜入科罗纳多附近。
translated: Hint - We managed to get hold of a group of Boomer Submarines. They have been sneaking in near Coronado.

label: LDR:D052
value: 「天权： “虽然与家乡的氛围不太一样，但同样是饱受战火摧残的城市。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Although it is different from my hometown, this city has also been devastated by war."

label: LDR:D053
value: 「天权： “只要存在着压迫的地方，就都是我们解放的目标。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Wherever there is oppression, it is our goal to liberate."

label: LDR:D054
value: 「天权： “刚刚车子出了点故障，稍微修了修就又是一条好汉了。”」
translated: Tianquan: "The car had a problem just now. After some repair, it will be a good boy again."

label: LDR:D055
value: 「天权： “我回来了，再次出发。”」
translated: Tianquan: "I'm back. Let's set off again."

label: LDR:D056
value: 「天权： “别慌，刚才是技术性意外。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Don't panic, it was just a technical accident."

label: LDR:D057
value: 「天权： “那句话怎么说来着？『我得重新集结部队』是吧……”」
translated: Tianquan: "What did you say? 'I have to regroup the troops' right..."

label: LDR:D058
value: 「安磊： “玩尼玛！”」
translated: Anlei: "What the hell!"

label: LDR:D059
value: 中国军队到达圣迭戈海岸
translated: Chinese troops arrive at San Diego coast

label: LDR:D060
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁圣迭戈的最终意志基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the base of the Final Spirit in San Diego.

label: LDR:D061
value: 我方部队全灭 - 中国远征军部队全灭，任务失败。
translated: Our troops are completely wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDR:D062
value: 警告 - 那个不明目标开始移动了！
translated: WARNING - The unidentified target is moving!

label: LDR:D063
value: 「清芷： “我比对出来了，欧盟共享给我们的数据库中，有与这种单位匹配的数据。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I found it in the database shared by the EU. It has data matching this unit."

label: LDR:D064
value: 「清芷： “不过既然它已经被消灭了，那就不用管它了……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But since it has been destroyed, there is no need to worry about it..."

label: LDR:D065
value: 提示 - 不明目标已被摧毁。
translated: Hint - The unidentified target has been destroyed.

label: LDR:DC
value: 清芷： “中国远征军已经成功在美国西海岸站稳了脚跟。接下来我们会向内陆前进，向着最终意志所控制的核心地区前进。后会有期！”
translated: Qingzhi: "The Chinese Expeditionary Force has successfully established a foothold on the west coast of the United States. Next, we will move inland, towards the core of the Final Spirit. See you later!"

label: LDR:D066
value: 已经摧毁被心控的美国空军基地。
translated: The mind-controlled US Air Force base has been destroyed.

label: LDR:D067
value: 已经摧毁被心控的美国海军陆战队基地。
translated: The mind-controlled U.S. Marine Corps base has been destroyed.

label: LDR:D068
value: 已经摧毁最终意志在圣迭戈的核心基地。
translated: The Final Spirit's main base in San Diego has been destroyed.

label: LDR:D069
value: 最终意志在圣迭戈的势力完全被肃清，任务完成。
translated: The forces of the Final Spirit in San Diego was completely eliminated, objective complete.

label: LDR:D070
value: 「清芷： “这些通讯铁塔似乎可以被磁暴步兵磁化，成为大号的磁暴线圈……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "These towers can to be energized by the Tesla troops and become large Tesla coils..."

label: LDR:D071
value: 提示 - 占领医院，这样我们的步兵可以得到持续治疗。
translated: Hint - Capture the hospital so our infantry can get constant treatment.

label: LDR:E001
value: 罗马尼亚，塞贝什山区。
translated: Sebes Mountains, Romania.

label: LDR:E002
value: 「艾拉： “这里是心灵起义军小队长艾拉。呼叫自由欧盟，渗透小队什么时候可以抵达？”」
translated: Ella: "This is Ella. Calling the Free European Union, when can the infiltration team arrive?"

label: LDR:E003
value: 「威灵顿： “自由欧盟收到。他们马上可以到达附近的村庄，完毕。”」
translated: Wellington: "Free EU copy. They will be reaching the nearby village shortly, over."

label: LDR:E004
value: 「威灵顿： “我们所有的情报都最终指向了这里，最终意志正在此处对『命运之瞳』进行量产。”」
translated: Wellington: "Our intel points to this place. The final spirit is mass-producing the Eyes of Fate here."

label: LDR:E005
value: 「威灵顿： “虽然组装过程十分缓慢，但每完工一艘，我们受到的威胁就增加一分。”」
translated: Wellington: "Although the assembly process is slow, every completed ship increases the threat we face."

label: LDR:E006
value: 「艾拉： “我已经制定好计划了。你们需要从北部进攻这座要塞牵制他们……”」
translated: Ella: "I got a plan. You need to attack this fortress from the north to contain them…"

label: LDR:E007
value: 「威灵顿： “自由欧盟的兵力十分有限，恐怕难以强攻这座要塞。”」
translated: Wellington: "The Free EU has very limited forces and may find it difficult to attack this fortress."

label: LDR:E008
value: 「艾拉： “没事，你尽可能牵制他们就好。渗透才是关键所在。”」
translated: Ella: "It's okay. Just keep them busy as much as possible. Infiltration is the key."

label: LDR:E009
value: 「艾拉： “我们需要抢夺一架命运之瞳，把它开起来为我们所用，才能争取到足够的胜算。”」
translated: Ella: "We need to seize an Eye of Fate and use it for our benefit to have a good chance of winning."

label: LDR:E010
value: 「西蒙： “晚上好啊，女士。这次是我们一起执行任务吗？”」
translated: Simon: "Good evening, ma'am. Are we on this mission together?"

label: LDR:E011
value: 「艾拉： “是的，西蒙先生。你的渗透小组准备得如何了？”」
translated: Ella: "Yes, Mr. Simon. How is your infiltration team?"

label: LDR:E012
value: 「西蒙： “我们研究了中国共享的资料，现在应该可以破解命运之瞳的系统了，只不过得先尝试直接进入它内部。”」
translated: Simon: "We should be able to hack the Eye of Fate now, but we have to get inside first."

label: LDR:E013
value: 「艾拉： “好吧，那我们开始吧。”」
translated: Ella: "Okay, let's get started."

label: LDR:E014
value: 任务目标 - 使用间谍进入正在建造中的命运之瞳。
translated: Mission Objective - Infiltrate the Eye of Fate with spy.

label: LDR:E015
value: 丧失关键单位 - 命运之瞳被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Eye of Fate destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:E016
value: 艾拉受到了重伤，她无法继续执行任务了。
translated: Ella was seriously injured and could not continue the mission.

label: LDR:E017
value: 西蒙受到了重伤，他无法继续执行任务了。
translated: Simon was seriously injured and could not continue his mission.

label: LDR:E018
value: 丧失关键单位 - 我们没有更多的间谍了，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - We have no more spies, mission failed.

label: LDR:E019
value: 注意 - 我们不能在渗透过程中摧毁太多的建筑，这样可能会引发敌人的警觉！
translated: Note - we cannot destroy too many buildings during the infiltration process. This may alert the enemy!

label: LDR:E020
value: 警告 - 我们不能摧毁更多的建筑了！
translated: WARNING - We can't destroy any more buildings!

label: LDR:E021
value: 警告 - 敌人已经发现了我们的渗透行动！
translated: Warning - the enemy has discovered our infiltration!

label: LDR:C086
value: 「卡维利： “朋友，我这有一个坏消息。”」
translated: Carville: "My friend, I have bad news."

label: LDR:C087
value: 「卡维利： “我们的空中侦察发现，大量的敌人正沿威拉米特河向这个区域靠近。”」
translated: Carville: "A large number of the enemy are approaching this area along the Willamette River."

label: LDR:C088
value: 「卡维利： “我们无法抵挡这么多敌人的攻势，尤其他们还是被意念增幅强化过的。”」
translated: Carville: "We can't hold them for long, especially those strengthened by Spiritual Amplification."

label: LDR:C089
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们必须在被包围之前，揭开意念核心的秘密。”」
translated: Delta: "We must uncover the secret of the Spiritual Core before we are surrounded."

label: LDR:C090
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “留给我们的时间不多了。”」
translated: Delta: "We don't have much time left."

label: LDR:C091
value: 注意 - 必须在敌人发起最后进攻前完成任务，否则我们无法安全撤离。
translated: Note - We completed before enemy's final attack, otherwise we will not be able to evacuate safely.

label: LDR:C092
value: 最终意志的最后进攻预估时间
translated: Final Spirit's Final Attack Estimated Time

label: LDR:C093
value: 「卡维利： “他们来了！”」
translated: Carville: "They are coming!"

label: LDR:C094
value: 「卡维利： “看来这些最终意志的狂热信徒真的想要阻止我们探索它的秘密了！”」
translated: Carville: "It seems that the Final Spirit really want to prevent us from exploring its secrets!"

label: LDR:C095
value: 「卡维利： “雷达图上黑压压的一片！我数不清楚他们的数量！！”」
translated: Carville: "The radar chart is full of detections! I can't count their number!!"

label: LDR:C096
value: 任务时间耗尽 - 敌人的大部队已经到达，任务失败。
translated: Mission time has run out - the enemy's main force has arrived, mission failed.

label: LDR:E022
value: 警告 - 检测到尤里雕像！极度危险！
translated: WARNING - YURI STATUE DETECTED! EXTREME DANGER!

label: LDR:E023
value: 「西蒙： “我们没法正面突破要塞的防御，得换个角度渗透进去。”」
translated: Simon: "We can't break through head-on. We have to infiltrate from another direction."

label: Name:SIMON
value: 西蒙
translated: Simon

label: LDR:EPPA
value: 破解回路A（30秒）
translated: Cracking Circuit A (30 seconds)

label: LDR:EPPB
value: 破解回路B（30秒）
translated: Cracking Circuit B (30 seconds)

label: LDR:EPPC
value: 破解回路C（30秒）
translated: Cracking Circuit C (30 seconds)

label: LDR:EPPD
value: 破解回路D（30秒）
translated: Cracking Circuit D (30 seconds)

label: LDR:EPPE
value: 破解回路E（30秒）
translated: Cracking Circuit E (30 seconds)

label: LDR:EPEA
value: 敌人正在执行：锁定传输回路A
translated: Enemy: Locking Transmission Circuit A

label: LDR:EPEB
value: 敌人正在执行：锁定传输回路B
translated: Enemy: Locking Transmission Circuit B

label: LDR:EPEC
value: 敌人正在执行：锁定传输回路C
translated: Enemy: Locking Transmission Circuit C

label: LDR:EPED
value: 敌人正在执行：锁定传输回路D
translated: Enemy: Locking Transmission Circuit D

label: LDR:EPEE
value: 敌人正在执行：锁定传输回路E
translated: Enemy: Locking Transmission Circuit E

label: LDR:EPP1
value:
制造电力故障（20秒）
命运之瞳升空时，使敌人停电3分钟
translated:
Create Power Failure (20s)
Enemy base power offline 3 min

label: LDR:EPP2
value:
战斗数据录入（20秒）
命运之瞳初始为精英状态
translated:
Combat Data Entry (20s)
Eye of Fate will be in elite

label: LDR:EPP3
value:
初始资金归档（40秒）
命运之瞳升空时，获得50000金钱
translated:
Initial Funds Archive (40s)
Receive 50,000 gold

label: LDR:EPP4
value:
开启感测模块（40秒）
命运之瞳升空时，获得心灵感测支援技能
translated:
Enable Sensor Module (40s)
Obtain Psychic Sensing skill

label: LDR:EPP5
value:
主脑觉醒（60秒）
命运之瞳升空时，获得超级武器『心灵控制器』
translated:
Mastermind Awakening (60s)
Obtain "Psychic Dominator"

label: LDR:EPP6
value:
命运规划（60秒）
命运之瞳升空时，获得超级武器『强运』（使命运之瞳高速回复耐久度一段时间）
translated:
Fate Planning (60s)
Obtain "Super Luck" (rapid recovery)

label: LDR:E024
value: 已破解命运之瞳的传输回路A。
translated: The transmission circuit A of the Eye of Fate has been cracked.

label: LDR:E025
value: 已破解命运之瞳的传输回路B。
translated: The transmission circuit B of the Eye of Fate has been cracked.

label: LDR:E026
value: 已破解命运之瞳的传输回路C。
translated: The transmission circuit C of the Eye of Fate has been cracked.

label: LDR:E027
value: 已破解命运之瞳的传输回路D。
translated: The transmission circuit D of the Eye of Fate has been cracked.

label: LDR:E028
value: 已破解命运之瞳的传输回路E。
translated: The transmission circuit E of the Eye of Fate has been cracked.

label: LDR:E029
value: 已执行『制造电力故障』 - 命运之瞳升空时，敌人将会短暂停电。
translated: Executed "Create Power Failure" - When the Eye of Fate is launched, the enemy's base will be offline.

label: LDR:E030
value: 已执行『战斗数据录入』 - 命运之瞳起飞时获得初始经验。
translated: Executed "Combat Data Entry" - Initial experience gained when Eye of Fate takes off.

label: LDR:E031
value: 已执行『初始资金归档』 - 命运之瞳升空时，将获得50000金钱。
translated: Executed "Initial Funds Archive" - When the Eye of Fate is launched, 50,000 gold will be obtained.

label: LDR:E032
value: 已执行『开启感测模块』 - 命运之瞳升空时，将获得心灵感测支援技能。
translated: Executed "Enable Sensor Module" - When the Eye of Fate is launched, it will gain psychic sensing support skills.

label: LDR:E033
value: 已执行『主脑觉醒』 - 命运之瞳升空时，将获得超级武器『心灵控制器』。
translated: Executed "Mastermind Awakening" - When the Eye of Fate is launched, the super weapon "Psychic Dominator" will be obtained.

label: LDR:E034
value: 已执行『命运规划』 - 命运之瞳升空时，将获得超级武器『强运』。
translated: Executed "Fate Planning" - When the Eye of Fate is launched, you will gain the super weapon "Super Luck".

label: LDR:E035
value: 未能成功破解 - 敌人锁定了命运之瞳的传输回路A，任务失败。
translated: Failed to crack - The enemy has locked the transmission circuit A of the Eye of Fate. Mission failed.

label: LDR:E036
value: 未能成功破解 - 敌人锁定了命运之瞳的传输回路B，任务失败。
translated: Failed to crack - The enemy has locked the transmission circuit B of the Eye of Fate. Mission failed.

label: LDR:E037
value: 未能成功破解 - 敌人锁定了命运之瞳的传输回路C，任务失败。
translated: Failed to crack - The enemy has locked the transmission circuit C of the Eye of Fate. Mission failed.

label: LDR:E038
value: 未能成功破解 - 敌人锁定了命运之瞳的传输回路D，任务失败。
translated: Failed to crack - The enemy has locked the transmission circuit D of the Eye of Fate. Mission failed.

label: LDR:E039
value: 未能成功破解 - 敌人锁定了命运之瞳的传输回路E，任务失败。
translated: Failed to crack - The enemy has locked the transmission circuit E of the Eye of Fate. Mission failed.

label: LDR:E040
value: 命运之瞳所有传输回路都已经被破解，目标完成。
translated: All transmission circuits of the Eye of Fate have been cracked, objective complete.

label: LDR:E041
value: 「艾拉： “在被敌人发现之前，我们应该还可以执行一些别的指令……”」
translated: Ella: "We should be able to execute some other commands before being exposed..."

label: LDR:E042
value: 提示 - 敌人的心灵控制塔和尤里复制人无法影响艾拉和西蒙，但他们可以识破间谍的伪装。
translated: Hint - Psychic towers and Yuri clones won't affect Ella and Simon, but they can detect spies.

label: LDR:E043
value: 已经成功渗透命运之瞳，目标完成。
translated: The Eye of Fate has been successfully infiltrated, objective complete.

label: LDR:E044
value: 「间谍： “好的，我已经开启了命运之瞳的操作面板。”」
translated: Spy: "Okay, I have opened the control panel of the Eye of Fate."

label: LDR:E045
value: 「间谍： “看起来我们需要花点时间解锁全部5个传输回路，才能使其启动。”」
translated: Spy: "Looks like it'll take us some time to crack all five transmission Circuits to launch it."

label: LDR:E046
value: 「间谍： “下面还有一些其它的按钮，似乎可以给我们后续的战斗带来一定的优势。”」
translated: Spy: "There are some other buttons below that seem to give us some advantages in subsequent battles."

label: LDR:E047
value: 「间谍： “不过要小心，一旦我们开始操作这个面板，就可能惊动敌人。”」
translated: Spy: "But be careful, once we start operating this panel, we may alert the enemy."

label: LDR:E048
value: 提示 - 可以把鼠标放置在操作面板各按钮上，阅读其简介后再开始行动。
translated: Hint - Read the introduction of each button of the operation panel before taking any action.

label: LDR:E049
value: 警告 - 敌人一旦成功的锁定了某个传输回路，命运之瞳就会无法启动，导致任务失败。
translated: Warning - If the enemy locked any transmission circuit, the Eye of Fate will not be able to launch.

label: LDR:E050
value: 注意 - 敌人正在试图锁定命运之瞳的传输回路A。
translated: Warning - The enemy is attempting to lock the Eye of Fate's transmission Circuit A.

label: LDR:E051
value: 注意 - 敌人正在试图锁定命运之瞳的传输回路B。
translated: Warning - The enemy is attempting to lock the Eye of Fate's transmission Circuit B.

label: LDR:E052
value: 注意 - 敌人正在试图锁定命运之瞳的传输回路C。
translated: Warning - The enemy is trying to lock the Eye of Fate's transmission Circuit C.

label: LDR:E053
value: 注意 - 敌人正在试图锁定命运之瞳的传输回路D。
translated: Warning - The enemy is trying to lock the Eye of Fate's transmission circuit D.

label: LDR:E054
value: 注意 - 敌人正在试图锁定命运之瞳的传输回路E。
translated: Warning - Enemies are attempting to lock the Eye of Fate's Transmission Circuit E.

label: LDR:E055
value: 正在破解系统，请稍候……
translated: Cracking the system, please wait...

label: LDR:E056
value: 任务目标 - 破解命运之瞳的5个传输回路。
translated: Mission objective - Crack all transmission circuits of the Eye of Fate.

label: LDR:E057
value: 「间谍： “他们察觉到异常了！我们不能再拖延时间了！”」
translated: Spy: "They've noticed something unusual! We can't delay any longer!"

label: LDR:E058
value: 「间谍： “我们必须立刻让命运之瞳起飞！”」
translated: Spy: "We must get the Eye of Fate off the ground immediately!"

label: LDR:E059
value: 全军覆没 - 渗透小队全灭，任务失败。
translated: The infiltration team is completely wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDR:E060
value: 「艾拉： “命运之瞳已经起飞。重复，命运之瞳已经起飞。”」
translated: Ella: "The Eye of Fate has taken off. I repeat, the Eye of Fate has taken off."

label: LDR:E061
value: 「威灵顿： “自由欧盟的部队将从北方进攻这座要塞，为你们分担压力。”」
translated: Wellington: "Free EU will attack this fortress from the north and relieve you of the pressure."

label: LDR:E062
value: 「威灵顿： “但是敌人的防御固若金汤，可能只有命运之瞳才能破坏这种程度的防御。”」
translated: Wellington: "But the enemy's defense is impregnable. Perhaps only the Eye of Fate can break through."

label: LDR:E063
value: 「威灵顿： “剩余几艘命运之瞳的位置已经标注在地图上了。它们可能随时会升空。”」
translated: Wellington: "The remaining Eyes of Fate are marked on the map. They may take off at any time."

label: LDR:E064
value: 「威灵顿： “接下来要做的就是彻底解决这些威胁！”」
translated: Wellington: "The next step is to completely neutralize these threats!"

label: LDR:E065
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁其余的命运之瞳和心灵控制器。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the remaining Eyes of Fate and Psychic Dominators.

label: LDR:E066
value: 丧失关键单位 - 我方的命运之瞳被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Our Eye of Fate is destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:E067
value: 「威灵顿： “咦？他们怎么在这里藏着一些基洛夫空艇？”」
translated: Wellington: "Huh? Why are they hiding some Kirov airships here?"

label: LDR:E068
value: 「威灵顿： “用于研究？我以为尤里先进的反重力技术早就把这种笨重的玩意淘汰了呢。”」
translated: Wellington: "For research? Yuri's anti-gravity tech would have made these obsolete long ago."

label: LDR:E069
value: 我们的战术空投系统已经上线。
translated: Our tactical airdrop system is now online.

label: LDR:E070
value: 你可以每次从两种不同的伞兵配置中选择一种进行投放。
translated: You can choose from two different paratrooper configurations to drop each time.

label: Name:SULU
value: 强运
translated: Super Luck

label: LDR:E071
value: 「盖特坦克： “命运之瞳怎么自行解锁起飞了！快拉响警报！”」
translated: Gattling Tank: "How did the Eye of Fate take off on its own? Raise the alarm!"

label: LDR:E072
value: 提示 - 超级武器『强运』可以使命运之瞳本体高速回复耐久度一段时间。
translated: Hint - The super weapon "Super Luck" can quickly restore the durability of the Eye of Fate.

label: LDR:E073
value: 提示 - 由命运之瞳提供的『心灵控制器』超级武器控制范围更大。
translated: Hint - The "Psychic Dominator" provided by the Eye of Fate has a larger control area.

label: LDR:E074
value:
空投伞兵
（2心灵突击队
+7尤里新兵）
translated:
Airdrop Paratroopers
(2 Psi Commandos
+7 Initiates)

label: LDR:E075
value:
空投伞兵
（3混乱部队
+6狂兽人）
translated:
Airdrop Paratroopers
(3 Chaos Troops
+6 Brutes)

value:
命运规划（已完成）
命运之瞳升空时，获得超级武器『强运』（使命运之瞳高速回复耐久度一段时间）
translated: Fate Planning (Completed)

label: LDR:EPPAC
value: 破解回路A（已完成）
translated: Cracking Circuit A (Completed)

label: LDR:EPPBC
value: 破解回路B（已完成）
translated: Cracking Circuit B (Completed)

label: LDR:EPPCC
value: 破解回路C（已完成）
translated: Cracking Circuit C (Completed)

label: LDR:EPPDC
value: 破解回路D（已完成）
translated: Cracking Circuit D (Completed)

label: LDR:EPPEC
value: 破解回路E（已完成）
translated: Cracking Circuit E (Completed)

label: LDR:E076
value: 注意 - 强运已经启动，命运之瞳会高速回复耐久度一段时间。
translated: Note - Super Luck has been activated, and the Eye of Fate will rapidly recover its durability.

label: Name:SULUTimer
value: 强运效果持续时间
translated: Duration of Super Luck

label: LDU:A053
value: 指挥官，你真的要这么做吗？我们这回可不是来抢石油的。
translated: Commander, are you really going to do this? We are not here to steal oil this time.

label: LDU:A054
value: 一旦敌人发现我们有这种闲情逸致，他们肯定会马上发起进攻。
translated: If the enemy discovers this, they will surely launch an attack immediately.

label: LDR:D072
value: 圣迭戈海洋世界
translated: SeaWorld San Diego

label: LDR:E077
value: 已摧毁一艘命运之瞳。
translated: Destroyed an Eye of Fate.

label: LDR:E078
value: 已摧毁一座心灵控制器。
translated: Destroyed a Psychic Dominator.

label: LDR:E079
value: 「威灵顿： “等等，我们正检测到异常的震动！”」
translated: Wellington: "Wait, we are detecting unusual vibrations!"

label: LDR:E080
value: 警告 - 敌人的最后一座命运之瞳起飞了！
translated: Warning - The enemy's last Eye of Fate has taken off!

label: LDR:E082
value: 「威灵顿： “该死，它怎么起飞了，这就难对付多了……”」
translated: Wellington: "Damn it, how did it take off? This makes it much more difficult to deal with..."

label: LDR:E083
value: 「艾拉： “别慌，我们应该可以使用被心控的单位摧毁它。”」
translated: Ella: "Don't panic, we should be able to use the mind-controlled units to destroy it."

label: LDR:E084
value: 所有命运之瞳和心灵控制器都已被摧毁，目标完成。
translated: All Eyes of Fate and Psychic Dominators have been destroyed, objective complete.

label: LDR:E085
value: 「艾拉： “欧洲的最终意志部队终于受到了重大挫败，但我们已经没有更多的精力去管他们了。”」
translated: Ella: "Final Spirit has suffered a major setback in EU, but we don't have time to deal with them."

label: LDR:E086
value: 「艾拉： “相比之下，建设时间更长的北美洲才是他们的核心据点。”」
translated: Ella: "In comparison, North America, which took longer to build, is their main base."

label: LDR:E087
value: 「艾拉： “我们必须立刻做好前往美国战场的准备。为了一场终结之战。”」
translated: Ella: "We must prepare to go to the American battlefield immediately. For a final battle."

label: LDR:EC
value: 「艾拉： “心灵起义军和自由欧盟将继续并肩战斗，前面还有更加凶险的情况在等着我们。”」
translated: Ella: "The Psychic Rebellion and the Free EU will continue to fight together. There are more dangerous situations awaiting us ahead."

label: LDR:E081
value: 「威灵顿： “我得处理一下这边敌人的防空阵地……”」
translated: Wellington: "I have to deal with the enemy's anti-aircraft positions here..."

label: CRD:LDMolihua
value: 霈然若雨
translated: TODO

label: CRD:LDHuanhai
value: Viodsea
translated: TODO

label: CRD:LDPingge
value: 平格拉底Official
translated: TODO

label: CRD:LDQingzhi
value: 清芷
translated: 清芷(Qingzhi)

label: LDR:E088
value: 「威灵顿： “虽然静滞力场的关键资料已经遗失，但我们还有超时空技术可以用。”」
translated: Wellington: "Although we have lost the immobilization field, we still have the Chronosphere to use."

label: LDR:E089
value: 「威灵顿： “如果有需要，我可以使用超时空向你们那边的战线传送部队。”」
translated: Wellington: "If necessary, I can use Chronosphere to transport troops to your side."

label: LDR:E090
value: 提示 - 点击地图上的超时空传送标记，为威灵顿下一次超时空传送的位置提供建议。
translated: Hint - Click on the marker on the map to suggest locations for Wellington's Chronosphere.

label: LDR:E091
value: 「威灵顿： “我这边准备了一架满载工程师和间谍的夜鹰直升机。”」
translated: Wellington: "I have prepared a Nighthawk helicopter full of engineers and spies."

label: LDR:E092
value: 「威灵顿： “如果需要，你可以通过心灵控制来调动它。”」
translated: Wellington: "You can mobilize it through mind control if necessary."

label: LDR:E093
value: 已经选定位置。威灵顿的下一次超时空传送会向该处投放部队。
translated: The location has been chosen. Wellington's will drop troops there when Chronosphere is available.

label: LDR:E094
value: 自由欧盟的麦斯韦尔将军已经抵达。
translated: General Maxwell of the Free EU has arrived.

label: LDR:E095
value: 「麦斯韦尔： “我会在这里建立防御阵地，分隔两侧敌人的攻击。”」
translated: Maxwell: "I will set up a defensive position here to divide the enemy attacks from both sides."

label: LDR:E096
value: 提示 - 威灵顿的直升机小队已经就绪，你可以使用心灵控制调动它。
translated: Hint - Wellington's helicopter squad is ready and you can use mind control to mobilize it.

label: LDR:E097
value: 「威灵顿： “我们的间谍正在进行破坏行动，他们会切断敌人的电力。”」
translated: Wellington: "Our spies are attempting to cut off the enemy's power."

label: LDR:E098
value: 「威灵顿： “该死！我们的阵地要撑不住了！”」
translated: Wellington: "Damn it! Our position is about to collapse!"

label: LDR:E099
value: 提示 - 自由欧盟的基地被摧毁，他们已经无力继续发动进攻。
translated: Hint - The Free EU base has been destroyed. They are no longer able to launch further attacks.

label: LDR:E100
value: 「威灵顿： “我需要重新集结部队，这边暂时只能全靠你们了。”」
translated: Wellington: "I need to regroup my troops. I can only rely on you for now."

label: LDR:E101
value: 「西蒙： “对了，女士，我很奇怪，我们这边为什么就鲜有女性拿起枪参加战斗呢？”」
translated: Simon: "By the way, I'm wondering why there are so few women taking up guns and fighting here?"

label: LDR:E102
value: 「艾拉： “我也很奇怪。捍卫自己的理想与信念这种事情，不应该是平等的吗？”」
translated: Ella: "I'm also confused. Shouldn't everyone be equal in defending their ideals and beliefs?"

label: LDR:E103
value: 「西蒙： “可能是适合的方式不同罢了。自由欧盟有不少女性的驾驶员，但拿起枪来的还真没见过。”」
translated: Simon: "Maybe it's different approaches. There are female drivers, but I have never seen one with gun."

label: LDR:E104
value: 「艾拉： “不过战场比大多数女人想象中还要残酷得多，这是真的。”」
translated: Ella: "It's true that the battlefield is much more cruel than most women imagine."

label: LDR:E105
value: 「西蒙： “艾拉女士，你的枪法看起来不赖嘛。”」
translated: Simon: "Ms. Ella, you seem to be skilled in shooting."

label: LDR:E106
value: 「艾拉： “什么嘛，你居然还有闲工夫关心这个。”」
translated: Ella: "What? You actually have the time to care about this."

label: LDR:E107
value: 「西蒙： “用一把发射飞镖的气步枪居然可以做到这么远距离命中，真是令我刮目相看。”」
translated: Simon: "I'm really impressed that you can hit from such a long range with an air rifle shooting darts."

label: LDR:E108
value: 「艾拉： “还是你更厉害些。我只需要瞄准躯干部位就行了，飞镖中的病毒会完成后续的伤害。”」
translated: Ella: "You're still better. I only need to aim at the torso. The virus will do the actual damage."

label: LDR:E109
value: 「西蒙： “女士，我突然想起，我们在特兰瓦尼西亚的那次失败的行动了。”」
translated: Simon: "Madam, I suddenly remembered our failed operation in Transvanesia."

label: LDR:E110
value: 「艾拉： “你是说德古拉要塞？”」
translated: Ella: "You mean Dracula's Fortress?"

label: LDR:E111
value: 「西蒙： “对的。我们提前渗透了周围的防御，但在进攻要塞的时候出了点岔子。”」
translated: Simon: "Right. We infiltrated the defenses ahead of time. But something went wrong when we attacked."

label: LDR:E112
value: 「艾拉： “防守要塞的那位教徒真的令人印象深刻，我们都不是他的对手……”」
translated: Ella: "The Proselyte defending the fortress is truly impressive. We are no match for him..."

label: LDR:E113
value: 「艾拉： “但现在也不用惋惜了，我们可以从另一条不同的道路走向胜利。”」
translated: Ella: "But there is no need to feel sorry now. We can find victory from another different path."

label: LDR:E114
value: 「威灵顿： “自由欧盟的间谍正在破坏他们的电力设施。”」
translated: Wellington: "Free EU spies are sabotaging their power infrastructure."

label: Name:YAALPH
value: 试验体-阿尔法遗体的存放罐
translated: Storage tank for the remains of the test subject Alpha

label: LDR:FZ001
value: 「尤里新兵： “该死，大门要堵不住了！”」
translated: Initiate: "Damn, the gate is about to be breached!"

label: LDR:FZ002
value: 「尤里新兵： “不！！不要过来！！”」
translated: Initiate: "No!! Don't come over here!!"

label: LDR:FZ003
value: 美国，阿拉斯加，诺姆。
translated: Nome, Alaska, United States.

label: LDR:FZ004
value: 「艾拉： “你总是那么固执……既然已经逃出来了，为什么还要回到这个地方？”」
translated: Ella: "You are always so stubborn... Why do you want to come back since you have already escaped?"

label: LDR:FZ005
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我还有一个人没有见……不，是有一件事情没有了结。”」
translated: Delta: "There is someone I haven't met... No, there is one thing I haven't settled yet."

label: LDR:FZ006
value: 任务目标 - 探索地下实验区域。
translated: Mission Objective - Explore the underground experimental area.

label: LDR:FZ007
value: 任务目标 - 解锁中部实验室的大门。
translated: Mission Objective - Unlock the door to the central laboratory.

label: LDR:FZ008
value: 任务目标 - 完成与试验体-西格玛的决斗。
translated: Mission Objective - Defeat Sigma in the duel.

label: LDR:FZ009
value: 「狂兽人： “这些心灵控制塔只能影响不坚定的心灵，它对我们毫无威胁。”」
translated: Brutes: "These psychic towers can only affect weak minds. They pose no threat to us."

label: LDR:FZ010
value: 终端交互 - 获得升级工具箱。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Obtained the Upgrade Toolbox.

label: LDR:FZ011
value: 丧失关键单位 - 艾拉阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Ella is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:FZ012
value: 丧失关键单位 - 试验体-德尔塔阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Delta is killed, mission failed.

label: LDR:FZ013
value: 任务目标 - 试验体-德尔塔和艾拉不能阵亡。
translated: Mission objective - Keep Delta and Ella alive.

label: LDR:FZ014
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我不能离开。这是无法逃避的命运。”」
translated: Delta: "I can't leave. This is an inescapable fate."

label: LDR:FZ015
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们是不是有点反应过度了，居然搬来这么多集装箱堵路……”」
translated: Delta: "Are they overreacting? They actually moved so many containers to block the road..."

label: LDR:FZ016
value: 「艾拉： “我一直有一点没明白，这些计算主机都是做什么用的？”」
translated: Ella: "There's one thing I don't understand. What are these compute host used for?"

label: LDR:FZ017
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “当然是为了做数据计算。准确的说，是基因的数据计算。”」
translated: Delta: "Of course it's for computing. To be more precise, it's to analyze genes."

label: LDR:FZ018
value: 「艾拉： “这就是尤里基因技术的奥秘吗？产生狂兽人之类的。”」
translated: Ella: "Is this the secret of Yuri's genetic technology? Producing Brutes or something like that."

label: LDR:FZ019
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “怎么说呢……狂兽人只能说是基因技术的残次品。”」
translated: Delta: "How should I put it... the Brutes can only be said to be defective products."

label: LDR:FZ020
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “最终目标还是，通过人工合成全基因组，制造心灵能量更高的生命体。”」
translated: Delta: "The ultimate goal is to create a life form with higher psychic energy via genome synthesis."

label: LDR:FZ021
value: 「艾拉： “这个房间……等等，中间那个罐子里是……你的克隆体？？”」
translated: Ella: "This room... wait, the one in the tank in the middle is... your clone?"

label: LDR:FZ022
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不是，这里保存着尤里成功合成出的第一个人工生命体，被编号为阿尔法。”」
translated: Delta: "No, this is where Yuri's first artificial life form is stored, numbered Alpha."

label: LDR:FZ023
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “基因组的残缺让它过早夭折，我们现在看到的只是罐中的标本。”」
translated: Delta: "The incompleteness of its genome caused it to die prematurely. All we see now is a specimen in a tank."

label: LDR:FZ024
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不过，尤里还是倾向于把这部有纪念意义的躯壳保留。”」
translated: Delta: "However, Yuri still prefers to keep this commemorative shell."

label: LDR:FZ025
value: 「奴隶： “不……不要过来！”」
translated: Slave: "No... don't come over here!"

label: LDR:FZ026
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “别怕！我们这就来解救你们！”」
translated: Delta: "Don't be afraid! We are here to rescue you!"

label: LDR:FZ027
value: 「奴隶： “别过来！！这是个陷阱！！……啊！！！”」
translated: Slave: "Don't come over here!! This is a trap!!! ...Ah!!!"

label: LDR:FZ028
value: 「艾拉： “我有点不明白，既然克隆技术已经被广泛使用，尤里为什么不直接克隆某个试验体呢？”」
translated: Ella: "I don't understand. Since cloning has been widely used, why doesn't Yuri clone a test subject?"

label: LDR:FZ029
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “合成过程中都有大量的失败品，更别提克隆了。”」
translated: Delta: "There are a lot of failures in the synthesis process, not to mention cloning."

label: LDR:FZ030
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “对于试验体，基因组必须极其精确。”」
translated: Delta: "For the test subject, the genome must be extremely accurate."

label: LDR:FZ031
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “克隆过程中产生的微小误差，就足以让其心灵能量显著降低，从而成为残次品。”」
translated: Delta: "Errors during cloning will reduce its psychic energy, thus producing a defective product."

label: LDR:FZ032
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “尤里是真的像照顾孩子一样，精心照顾着他每一个宝贵的试验体。”」
translated: Delta: "Yuri really takes care of each of his precious test subjects like a child."

label: LDR:FZ033
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “不过这么说，我真是个叛逆的孩子呢（苦笑）。”」
translated: Delta: "But now that I say that, I was really a rebellious child (bitter smile)."

label: LDR:FZ034
value: 「艾拉： “对于这样残暴而疯狂的『父亲』，叛逆反倒是正当其理的事情……”」
translated: Ella: "Rebellion against such a cruel and crazy 'father' is the right thing to do..."

label: LDR:FZ035
value: 终端交互 - 获得医疗包，所有步兵单位受到自动治疗。
translated: Terminal Interaction - Obtained a medkit, all infantry units are automatically healed.

label: LDR:FZ036
value: 「艾拉： “这个瞭望台的视野真宽敞，是个不错的狙击位置。”」
translated: Ella: "This observation tower has a wide field of view. It's a good sniping position."

label: LDR:FZ037
value: 「艾拉： “吓，他们居然把意念压制塔塞到室内了……”」
translated: Ella: "Oh my god, they actually put the Spiritual Suppression Tower inside the room..."

label: LDR:FZ038
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “这天花板都快被这高塔顶破了。”」
translated: Delta: "The ceiling is almost pierced through by this tower."

label: LDR:FZ039
value: 「艾拉： “停留在它周围会受到持续的伤害，得远距离摧毁它或者快速通过。”」
translated: Ella: "We have to destroy it from a distance or pass through quickly to avoid taking damage."

label: LDR:FZ040
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “……”」
translated: Delta: "..."

label: LDR:FZ041
value: 「艾拉： “你怎么了？好像若有所思的样子……”」
translated: Ella: "What's going on? You seem to be thinking about something..."

label: LDR:FZ042
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我是从这里诞生的。”」
translated: Delta: "I was born from here."

label: LDR:FZ043
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “一次成功的基因组合成的结果，作为4号试验体而诞生。”」
translated: Delta: "Born as Subject No. 4 as a result of a successful genome synthesis."

label: LDR:FZ044
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “快结束了。人总有一天要离开襁褓。”」
translated: Delta: "It's almost over. People have to leave the cradle one day."

label: LDR:FZ045
value: 终端交互 - 已经封闭外侧屏蔽门，打开内侧屏蔽门。
translated: Terminal interaction - The outer gate is closed and the inner gate is opened.

label: LDR:FZ046
value: 「艾拉： “下面的屏蔽门被锁住了。不过开关应该就在附近，找找看！”」
translated: Ella: "The gate down there is locked. But the switch should be nearby, let's look for it!"

label: LDR:FZ047
value: 「艾拉： “我们还是来晚了，这边的囚犯都被最终意志下令处决了……”」
translated: Ella: "We are still too late. All the prisoners here have been executed by the Final Spirit"

label: LDR:FZ048
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “它头上已经记了数不清的账，不差这一笔。”」
translated: Delta: "Its crime is too numerous to list. This won't be the only one left."

label: LDR:FZ049
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们可以继续向下方探索了。”」
translated: Delta: "We can continue to explore downwards."

label: LDR:FZ050
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我能感觉到，我们离那个人越来越近了。”」
translated: Delta: "I can feel that we are getting closer and closer to that person."

label: LDR:FZ051
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “等等，还有另一方势力搅局！”」
translated: Delta: "Wait, there is another force interfering!"

label: LDR:FZ052
value: 「艾拉： “他们似乎来者不善，但好像和最终意志也是敌对。”」
translated: Ella: "They seem unkind, but they also seem to be hostile to the Final Spirit."

label: LDR:FZ053
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “注意那些会爆炸的心灵球！别让它们靠近！”」
translated: Delta: "Be careful of those exploding psychic orbs! Don't let them get close!"

label: LDR:FZ054
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “艾拉，你能用你的狙击枪瞄准那些心灵球嘛？”」
translated: Delta: "Ella, can you aim at those psychic orbs with your sniper rifle?"

label: LDR:FZ055
value: 「艾拉： “我试试看。悬浮在空中的东西我需要仔细测算距离。”」
translated: Ella: "Let me try. I need to carefully calculate the distance since it's suspended in the air."

label: LDR:FZ056
value: 提示 - 只有艾拉的狙击枪可以攻击心灵球，请手动命令艾拉攻击它们。
translated: Hint - Only Ella's sniper rifle can attack the Psychic Orbs, please manually command Ella to attack them.

label: LDR:FZ057
value: 「艾拉： “这里都是毒气，可能是某种防御系统。”」
translated: Ella: "There's poisonous gas all over here. It could be some kind of defense system."

label: LDR:FZ058
value: 「艾拉： “这条走廊一眼望不到边，我们得多加小心。”」
translated: Ella: "This corridor seems endless. We have to be careful."

label: Name:SIGB
value: 心灵球
translated: Psychic Orb

label: LDR:FZ059
value: 「艾拉： “通往大厅的门居然也被锁住了，难道大厅里有人？”」
translated: Ella: "The door to the hall is also locked. Is there someone in the hall?"

label: LDR:FZ060
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “嗯，隔着很远就能感受到他的心灵能量，很危险。”」
translated: Delta: "Well, I can sense his psychic energy from a long distance. It's very dangerous."

label: LDR:FZ061
value: 「艾拉： “还得去其他地方找找看，看看有没有大门的开关。”」
translated: Ella: "We need to look elsewhere to see if there is a switch for the gate."

label: LDR:FZ062
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “危险！先别冒然进入！！”」
translated: Delta: "Wait! Don't enter yet!! It's dangerous!"

label: LDR:FZ063
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “心灵能量正在这个房间中聚集，然后产生震爆，摧毁范围内的一切东西。”」
translated: Delta: "Psychic energy is gathering in this room, creating a shock wave destroy everything in range."

label: LDR:FZ064
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我能感受到哪里在聚集能量。我们得小心绕开。”」
translated: Delta: "I can feel the energy gathering somewhere. We have to be careful to avoid it."

label: LDR:FZ065
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “啊……这个机关，我似乎有点忘了应该怎么操作了。”」
translated: Delta: "Ah... I seem to have forgotten how to operate this mechanism."

label: LDR:FZ066
value: 终端交互 - 高尔顿实验室的房门已经解锁。
translated: Terminal Interaction - The door to Galton's laboratory has been unlocked.

label: LDR:FZ067
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “好了，确实是这里。现在大厅的大门解锁了。”」
translated: Delta: "Okay, it is definitely here. The door to the hall is now unlocked."

label: LDR:FZ068
value: 「艾拉： “等等，这个瞭望台刚好可以俯瞰大厅，是个不错的狙击位置。”」
translated: Ella: "Wait, this observation deck overlooks the hall, it's a good sniping position."

label: LDR:FZ069
value: 「艾拉： “我觉得我可以待在这里，监视大厅中的情况，并为你提供掩护。”」
translated: Ella: "I think I can stay here, keep an eye on the hall, and provide cover for you."

label: LDR:FZ070
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那我们要分开一段时间了。一定要多加小心！”」
translated: Delta: "We will be separated for a while. Be careful!"

label: LDR:FZ071
value: 「艾拉： “你也多保重。”」
translated: Ella: "Take care of yourself too."

label: LDR:FZ072
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “他们怎么把一辆精神控制车忘在这里了？”」
translated: Delta: "How come they left a mastermind here?"

label: LDR:FZ073
value: 「艾拉： “反正现在它归我们了。”」
translated: Ella: "It belongs to us now."

label: LDR:FZ074
value: 提示 - 点击右侧的图标以继续对话。
translated: Hint - Click the icon on the right to continue the conversation.

label: LDR:FZA01
value: 「？？？： “你终于来了。我等你好久了，兄长。”」
translated: ???: "You are finally here. I have been waiting for you for a long time, brother."

label: LDR:FZA02
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我不太愿意被你叫做『兄长』的，试验体-西格玛。”」
translated: Delta: "I don't really want you to call me 'brother', Sigma."

label: LDR:FZA03
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “哦？我这样称呼你，只是为了表示对你的尊敬而已。”」
translated: Sigma: "Oh? I call you that just to show my respect."

label: LDR:FZA04
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你可不要敬酒不吃吃罚酒。”」
translated: Sigma: "Don't refuse a toast and then drink a forfeit."

label: LDR:FZA05
value: “我并不怕你的威胁。”
translated: "I'm not afraid of your threats."

label: LDR:FZA06
value: “所以你现在想要做什么？”
translated: "So what do you want to do now?"

label: LDR:FZA07
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我并不怕你的威胁。”」
translated: Delta: "I am not afraid of your threats."

label: LDR:FZA08
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “别这样，兄弟。”」
translated: Sigma: "Come on, brother."

label: LDR:FZA09
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你可能没有看到『高尔顿实验』的结局，否则就不会这样想了。”」
translated: Sigma: "You may not have seen the outcome of the Galton Experiment, otherwise you wouldn't think so."

label: LDR:FZA10
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我记得。那是在『最终意志』的指示下，全部尚存的试验体在这个试验场中进行大逃杀。”」
translated: Delta: "Under the instruction, all remaining test subjects fought a battle royale in this test field."

label: LDR:FZA11
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “是的。优胜劣汰，最后存活的，便是最强的试验体。”」
translated: Sigma: "Yes. Survival of the fittest, the last one to survive is the strongest test subject."

label: LDR:FZA12
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我通过战斗证明了自己，你却中途逃跑了，也算留了一条性命。”」
translated: Sigma: "I proved myself through fighting, but you escaped halfway. That saved your life."

label: LDR:FZA13
value: “面对对自己不利的状况，主动撤离也是一种智慧。”
translated: "When faced with a unfavorable situation ..."

label: LDR:FZA14
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “面对对自己不利的状况，主动撤离也是一种智慧。”」
translated: Delta: "When faced with a unfavorable situation, it is wise to evacuate proactively."

label: LDR:FZA15
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你啊，拳头不怎么硬，就是嘴硬。赶紧加入我这边，成为我们的一员吧。”」
translated: Sigma: "Your fist is not as strong as your words. Hurry up and join me and become one of us."

label: LDR:FZA16
value: “当时我还有更重要的事情要做。”
translated: "I had more important things to do at the time."

label: LDR:FZA17
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “当时我还有更重要的事情要做。”」
translated: Delta: "I had more important things to do at the time."

label: LDR:FZA18
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我现在不顾最终意志反对，私下里与你会面，就是为了劝你回归。这是我觉得最重要的事情。”」
translated: Sigma: "I am persuading you to return in private now. This is the most important thing."

label: LDR:FZA19
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “但是最强的试验体还没有决出，高尔顿实验还没有结束。”」
translated: Delta: "But the strongest test subject has not been decided. Galton's experiment has not ended yet."

label: LDR:FZA20
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们之间还欠一场决斗。”」
translated: Delta: "We still owe each other a duel."

label: LDR:FZA21
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “所以你现在想要做什么？”」
translated: Delta: "So what do you want to do now?"

label: LDR:FZA22
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我就开门见山了。我私下里希望你能回归最终意志。”」
translated: Sigma: "I'll get straight to the point. I secretly hope you can return to the Final Spirit."

label: LDR:FZA23
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我希望我能拯救你，从错误的道路上把你拉回来。”」
translated: Sigma: "I wish I could save you and pull you back from the wrong path."

label: LDR:FZA24
value: “我不认为我现在的道路是错误的。”
translated: "I don't think I'm on the wrong path right now."

label: LDR:FZA25
value: “我不认为你有资格指点我。”
translated: "I don't think you are qualified to instruct me."

label: LDR:FZA26
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我不认为我现在的道路是错误的。”」
translated: Delta: "I don't think I'm on the wrong path right now."

label: LDR:FZA27
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “去『背叛』你父亲的意志？这就是你所说的正确的道路？”」
translated: Sigma: "To 'betray' your father's will? Is this what you call the right path?"

label: LDR:FZA28
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我不认为你有资格指点我。”」
translated: Delta: "I don't think you are qualified to instruct me."

label: LDR:FZA29
