value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我凭什么没有资格？『高尔顿实验』已经证明了，我是最强的试验体！”」
translated: Sigma: "Why not? The 'Galton Experiment' has proven that I am the strongest test subject!"

label: LDR:FZA30
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “一个一个地亲手杀死自己的所谓『兄弟』，并不会增强你的能力，只会让你更加疯狂。”」
translated: Delta: "Killing your 'brothers' will not enhance your abilities, but only make you more crazy."

label: LDR:FZA31
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “那只是一场实验！我只是遵守最终意志定下的实验规则而已！”」
translated: Sigma: "It was just an experiment! I was just following the rules set by the Final Spirit!"

label: LDR:FZA32
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那么，我也要遵守实验规则，与你一决胜负，看看谁在这场大逃杀中活到最后。”」
translated: Delta: "Then I will also follow the rules to fight you. Let's see who survives the battle to the end."

label: LDR:FZA33
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你疯了吗！你就这么着急去赴死吗！！”」
translated: Sigma: "Are you crazy? Are you so eager to die?!"

label: LDR:FZA34
value: “我拒绝『回归』。我要打倒你，继续自己的道路。”
translated: "I refuse to 'return'. I will defeat you..."

label: LDR:FZA35
value: “如果只有用实力才能让你闭嘴，那我也只能奉陪到底了。”
translated: "If my strength is the only way to shut you up..."

label: LDR:FZA36
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我拒绝『回归』。我要打倒你，继续自己的道路。”」
translated: Delta: "I refuse to 'return'. I will defeat you and continue my own path."

label: LDR:FZA37
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “那我也只能用武力让你接受我的观点了。”」
translated: Sigma: "Then I can only make you accept my point of view by force."

label: LDR:FZA38
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “如果只有用实力才能让你闭嘴，那我也只能奉陪到底了。”」
translated: Delta: "If my strength is the only way to shut you up, then I will have to stick with you to the end."

label: LDR:FZA39
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “来吧，赌上最强试验体的名号，完成最后一次优胜劣汰吧。”」
translated: Sigma: "Come on, let's bet on the title of the strongest test subject."

label: LDR:FZA40
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “对了，别以为我不知道，在二楼瞭望台有一个狙击手正瞄准着我。”」
translated: Sigma: "By the way, I knew there is a sniper aiming at me on the second floor observation deck."

label: LDR:FZA41
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “然而她发射的飞镖没法击穿我的心灵护盾，所以我姑且认为你没有作弊。”」
translated: Sigma: "But the darts she fired couldn't penetrate my shield, so I will assume you are not cheating."

label: LDR:FZB01
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你放心，我不会让我的精英卫队干预这场战斗。”」
translated: Sigma: "Don't worry, I won't let my elite guards interfere in this battle."

label: LDR:FZB02
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “他们只是在门口防守而已。”」
translated: Sigma: "They are just guarding the door."

label: LDR:FZB03
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “什么，是『最终意志』发现了我的擅自行动？”」
translated: Sigma: "What, did the 'Final Spirit' discover my unauthorized actions?"

label: LDR:FZB04
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “卫队守住门口！我忙着呢，别让它打扰我！”」
translated: Sigma: "Guards, hold the door! I'm busy, don't let them disturb me!"

label: LDR:FZB05
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “嗯哼，还有两下子。我得认真起来了……”」
translated: Sigma: "Hmm, you still have some tricks up your sleeve. I have to get serious…"

label: LDR:FZB06
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “这不可能！为什么我会占据下风！！明明我的心灵能量更加强大！！！”」
translated: Sigma: "This is impossible! Why am I losing? My psychic energy is obviously stronger!!!"

label: LDR:FZB07
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我是基因技术与心灵技术的完美结晶，最强的试验体，尤里的继承人……”」
translated: Sigma: "I am the perfect of genetic and psychic tech, the strongest test subject, Yuri's successor..."

label: LDR:FZB08
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “而你只是尤里的一个弃子罢了！！”」
translated: Sigma: "And you are just an abandoned pawn of Yuri!!"

label: LDR:FZC01
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我错了，兄长。你……你的道路才是正确的……”」
translated: Sigma: "I was wrong, brother. You... your path is the right one..."

label: LDR:FZC02
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “只有……离开最终意志，我们的灵魂才能彻底获得自由……”」
translated: Sigma: "Only... by leaving the Final Spirit, can our souls be completely free..."

label: LDR:FZC03
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “你……比我更有资格……继承尤里的遗产……”」
translated: Sigma: "You... are more qualified than me to inherit Yuri's legacy..."

label: LDR:FZC04
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “可是，兄弟，我并不是为了遗产而来，也不愿意和他沾上关系。”」
translated: Delta: "But brother, I am not here for inheritance. I don't want to have anything to do with him."

label: LDR:FZC05
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “不……不是沾上关系的问题，而是，你有资格，也必须面对。”」
translated: Sigma: "No... It's not about connection. You are qualified and you must face it."

label: LDR:FZC06
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我的手下……我会让他们都……听命于你……”」
translated: Sigma: "My subordinates... I will make them all... obey you..."

label: LDR:FZC07
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “带领他们……走上你认为正确的的……道路……吧……”」
translated: Sigma: "Lead them...on the path...that you believe is right..."

label: LDR:FZC08
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “结束了。噩梦般的过去都结束了。”」
translated: Delta: "It's over. The nightmare past is over."

label: LDR:FZC09
value: 「最终意志： “不受控制的4号试验体杀死了18号试验体。战报数据收集中。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "The uncontrolled Test Subject 4 killed Test Subject 18. Combat data is being collected."

label: LDR:FZC10
value: 「最终意志： “18号试验体的心灵能量远高于4号试验体。无法理解的战斗数据。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "The psychic energy of Subject 18 is far higher than that of Subject 4. Incomprehensible."

label: LDR:FZC11
value: 「最终意志： “必须收容4号试验体，将其接入最终意志。收容，收容，收容……”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Subject No. 4 must be contained and connected to the Final Spirit. Contain, contain..."

label: LDR:FZC12
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “够了！到此为止你的阴谋已经全部败露。”」
translated: Delta: "That's enough! Your conspiracy has been completely exposed."

label: LDR:FZC13
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “试验体不只是肉体容器，我们也有自己的灵魂，向往自由的灵魂。”」
translated: Delta: "Test subjects are not just flesh. We also have our own souls. Souls that yearn for freedom."

label: LDR:FZC14
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “谁会知道，在这场大逃杀之中，活到最后的是我这个弃子呢。”」
translated: Delta: "Who would have known that the one who survived to the end would be me, an abandoned one."

label: LDR:FZC15
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那么，请做好准备，让我们来砸烂这最后一层枷锁吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Then please get ready, let us break this last layer of shackles."

label: LDR:FC
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “心灵起义军已经做好与最终意志进行决战的准备，审判的时刻就要到了。”」
translated: Delta: "Psychic Rebellion is ready for the last battle with the Final Spirit. The moment of judgement is coming."

label: LDR:FZ075
value: 试验体-西格玛已经被打败，目标完成。
translated: Test subject Sigma has been defeated, objective complete.

label: LDR:FZ076
value: 提示 - 更多的心灵球出现了，请手动命令艾拉攻击心灵球。
translated: Hint - More Psychic Orbs appear, please manually command Ella to attack the Psychic Orbs.

label: LDR:FZ077
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我能感受到，来自南面的心灵信号更加强烈了。”」
translated: Delta: "I can feel that the psychic signal from the south is getting stronger."

label: LDR:FZ078
value: 「艾拉： “可我们不知道它是善意的还是恶意的，或者根本就是一个陷阱……”」
translated: Ella: "But we don't know whether it is well-intentioned or malicious, or if it is just a trap…"

label: LDR:FZ079
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “那是我必须面对的命运，哪怕是个精心设计的陷阱，也得闯出一条路来。”」
translated: Delta: "That is the fate I must face. Even if it is a trap, I have to find a way out."

label: Name:THEIA
value: 忒伊亚卫星指示标记
translated: Theia satellite indicator

label: LDR:FZB09
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我们是为了一项伟大的事业而战斗！那就是人类本身的进化！”」
translated: Sigma: "We are fighting for a great cause! That is the evolution of humanity itself!"

label: LDR:FZB10
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “优胜劣汰，适者生存，那就是我们人工生命体——试验体的使命！”」
translated: Sigma: "Survival of the fittest. That is the mission of our artificial life form - the test subject!"

label: LDR:FZB11
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “只有不断淘汰弱者，我们才能不断变强！”」
translated: Sigma: "Only by constantly eliminating the weak can we become stronger!"

label: LDR:FZB12
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “为了心灵的优选！为了意志的进化！！”」
translated: Sigma: "For the optimization of the mind! For the evolution of the will!!"

label: LDR:FZB13
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “弗朗西斯-高尔顿！你看到了吗！！”」
translated: Sigma: "Francis Galton! Did you see that?!"

label: LDR:FZB14
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “人类已经可以对自己实现全基因组的筛选和合成！！”」
translated: Sigma: "Humans can now screen and synthesize their own entire genome!!"

label: LDR:FZB15
value: 「试验体-西格玛： “我们还可以不断的进化下去，进化下去！！！”」
translated: Sigma: "We can continue to evolve, evolve!!!"

label: LDR:F001
value: 美国，佛罗里达州。
translated: Florida, USA.

label: LDR:F002
value: 「林德拉克： “苏联部队已经跨过大西洋，踏上美国的东海岸。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Soviet troops have crossed the Atlantic and landed on the east coast of the United States."

label: LDR:F003
value: 「卡维利： “这边的通讯状况很不好，雷达信号都断断续续的。”」
translated: Carville: "Communications here are very bad. The radar signal is intermittent."

label: LDR:F004
value: 「卡维利： “在佛罗里达州的苏军登陆部队有好几支，但现在都失去联络了。”」
translated: Carville: "There are several Soviet landing forces in Florida. But now all contact has been lost."

label: LDR:F005
value: 「林德拉克： “有办法重建通讯链路吗？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Is there any way to re-establish the communications link?"

label: LDR:F006
value: 「卡维利： “等等，肯尼迪航天中心就在你现在的位置附近。”」
translated: Carville: "Wait, the Kennedy Space Center is near where you are now."

label: LDR:F007
value: 「卡维利： “如果你能占领这些卫星通讯站的话，我们可以尝试通过卫星重建通讯。”」
translated: Carville: "If you can capture these satellite stations, we can establish communications via satellite."

label: LDR:F008
value: 任务目标 - 占领或摧毁所有卫星通讯站，至少保留一座。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture or destroy all satellite communication stations, and capture at least one

label: LDR:F009
value: 提示 - 你可以用磁暴步兵来磁化这些通讯铁塔，使其成为大型磁暴线圈。
translated: Hint - You can use Tesla Troopers to energize these towers, turning them into large Tesla Coils.

label: LDR:F010
value: 「林德拉克： “这样的铁塔在这片区域里面好像不少，我们得好好利用。”」
translated: Rynderack: "There seem to be quite a few towers in this area. We should make good use of them."

label: LDR:F011
value: 「卡维利： “一支心灵起义军的伞兵部队正在空降到此地。”」
translated: Carville: "Psychic Rebellion paratroopers is being dropped here."

label: LDR:F012
value: 「卡维利： “他们的工程师会一同前来，正好顺势夺取这里的最终意志基地。”」
translated: Carville: "Their engineers will come together, and we can seize the Final Spirit base here."

label: LDR:F013
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 已知的唯一一座卫星通讯站被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - the only known satellite communications station destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:F014
value: 已失去对一颗忒伊亚卫星的控制，卫星即将坠毁。
translated: A Theia satellite has lost control, and it is about to crash.

label: LDR:F015
value: 已占领卫星通讯站，目标完成。
translated: The satellite communication station has been captured, objective complete.

label: LDR:F016
value: 已占领一座卫星通讯站，我们可以额外控制一颗忒伊亚卫星。
translated: We have captured a satellite communications station. We can control an additional Theia satellite.

label: LDR:F017
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 所有卫星通讯站被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - All satellite communication stations destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:F018
value: 「林德拉克： “我还一直把磁能坦克的蓝图带在身上。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I still carry the blueprints for the Tesla tank with me at all times."

label: LDR:F019
value: 「林德拉克： “现在应该还能生产一些，来弥补我们坦克碉堡火力的不足。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We should be able to produce some now to make up for the lack of firepower."

label: LDR:F020
value: 林德拉克受了重伤，无法继续战斗了。
translated: Rynderack was seriously injured and could not continue to fight.

label: LDR:F021
value: 「卡维利： “嘿，你说怎么着，我从他们的基地里翻到了『意念压制塔』的蓝图。”」
translated: Carville: "Hey, I found the blueprints of the "Spiritual Suppression Tower" from their base."

label: LDR:F022
value: 「卡维利： “这种大型防御建筑可以以自己为中心，产生大范围的伤害。”」
translated: Carville: "This large defensive structure can cause damage in a wide area from its center."

label: LDR:F023
value: 「林德拉克： “我们的磁暴步兵似乎可以给意念压制塔充能，进一步提高其威力。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Our Tesla troops can charge the Spiritual Suppression Tower, further increasing its power."

label: LDR:F024
value: 警告 - 最终意志察觉了我们的行动！
translated: WARNING - The Final Spirit is aware of our actions!

label: LDR:F025
value: 「卡维利： “敌人在通讯站里面放了炸药！我们现在的当务之急赶紧把它占领。”」
translated: Carville: "The enemy has placed explosives in the communication station! We need to capture them ASAP."

label: LDR:F026
value: 卫星通讯站自毁（占领以解除自毁计时）
translated: Satellite communication station self-destructs (capture to stop the self-destruct timer)

label: LDR:F027
value: 「林德拉克： “忒伊亚卫星已上线。现在我们会尝试通过卫星联络附近失散的友军。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Theia satellite is online. We will contact nearby lost friendly forces via satellite."

label: LDR:F028
value: 「林德拉克： “等等！我好像发现了有趣的东西……”」
translated: Rynderack: "Wait! I think I found something interesting..."

label: LDR:F029
value: 「林德拉克： “这颗卫星除了通讯模块以外，还有……武器系统？”」
translated: Rynderack: "In addition to the communication module, this satellite also has... a weapon system?"

label: LDR:F030
value: 提示 - 忒伊亚卫星的武器系统已经上线。
translated: Hint - Theia's satellite weapons systems are now online.

label: LDR:F031
value: 提示 - 你可以选中并移动标记，指示忒伊亚卫星打击其指向的目标。
translated: Hint - You can select and move the marker to instruct the Theia satellite to strike the target.

label: LDR:F032
value: 「卡维利： “如果能占领更多的卫星通讯站，我们就能控制更多颗卫星。”」
translated: Carville: "If we can capture more satellite communication stations, we can control more satellites."

label: LDR:F033
value: 「卡维利： “但要注意，卫星标记只能移动到我们雷达视野中能看见的区域。”」
translated: Carville: "But be aware that the satellite markers can only move to non-shrouded areas."

label: LDR:F034
value: 「林德拉克： “见鬼，我的雷达屏幕怎么突然全黑了？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Why the hell did my radar screen go completely black all of a sudden?"

label: LDR:F035
value: 「卡维利： “大概是因为，最终意志启动了这个区域的裂缝产生器阵列。”」
translated: Carville: "Probably because the Final Spirit activated the Gap Generators in this area."

label: LDR:F036
value: 「卡维利： “我们的通讯故障应该也是它们引起的。”」
translated: Carville: "Our communication failure should also be caused by them."

label: LDR:F037
value: 「林德拉克： “真是扫兴，那就赶紧把它们都炸了吧！”」
translated: Rynderack: "What a bummer! Let's just blow them all up!"

label: LDR:F038
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁此区域的所有裂缝产生器。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy all gap generators in the area.

label: LDR:F039
value: 已摧毁的裂缝产生器 : 剩余的裂缝产生器
translated: Destroyed Gap Generators : Remaining Gap Generators

label: LDR:F040
value: 「卡维利： “一个好消息，我应该找到我们通讯受干扰的原因了。”」
translated: Carville: "Good news. I think I have found the reason why our communication is being disrupted."

label: LDR:F041
value: 「卡维利： “这个区域有不少裂缝产生器阵列，最终意志把它们都启动了。”」
translated: Carville: "There are a number of Gap Generators in this area. The Final Spirit activated them all."

label: LDR:F042
value: 「林德拉克： “那我们就赶紧把它们都炸了吧！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Then let's blow them all up!"

label: LDR:F043
value: 「林德拉克： “我有点不太明白，为什么这个地方要搞这么多裂缝产生器……”」
translated: Rynderack: "I don't quite understand why this place has so many Gap Generators..."

label: LDR:F044
value: 「卡维利： “肯尼迪航天中心可是军事重地。”」
translated: Carville: "The Kennedy Space Center is a military stronghold."

label: LDR:F045
value: 「卡维利： “如果不加点防护措施的话，岂不是被别国的卫星看光。”」
translated: Carville: "If we don't take some measures, we won't have any secrets under foreign satellites."

label: LDR:F046
value: 已摧毁一座裂缝产生器。
translated: Destroyed a Gap Generator.

label: LDR:F047
value: 已摧毁所有裂缝产生器，目标完成。
translated: All Gap Generators destroyed, objective completed.

label: LDR:F048
value: 「卡维利： “太好了，忒伊亚卫星已经可以观察整个战场了。”」
translated: Carville: "Great, the Theia satellite can now observe the entire battlefield."

label: LDR:F049
value: 「卡维利： “也没有什么可以阻止卫星炮尽情倾泄火力了！继续追击他们！”」
translated: Carville: "There's nothing to stop the satellite weapon from unleashing full power! Keep chasing them!"

label: LDR:F050
value: 已掌控所有忒伊亚卫星，目标完成。
translated: All of Theia's satellites have been controlled, objective complete.

label: LDR:F051
value: 「卡维利： “通讯已经完全恢复，现在我们开始搜索其余的部队。”」
translated: Carville: "Communications have been fully restored. Now we begin the search for the remaining troops."

label: LDR:F052
value: 「卡维利： “一支走散的陆军小队正在向此区域靠拢。”」
translated: Carville: "A stray Army squad is moving toward the area."

label: LDR:F053
value: 「卡维利： “这是最后一批回应的部队了。他们速度真的太慢了，以至于根本没偏航太远……”」
translated: Carville: "This is the last group of troops to respond. They were too slow to deviate too far…"

label: LDR:F054
value: 「卡维利： “真巧，我又联系上了一支在附近徘徊的摩托化步兵小队。”」
translated: Carville: "What a coincidence! I have contacted a motorized infantry squad roaming nearby."

label: LDR:F055
value: 「林德拉克： “如果能搞来一些光棱坦克并塞进坦克碉堡的话，那真是最好的防御了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "If we can put some Prism Tanks in the Tank Bunker, that would be the best defense."

label: LDR:F056
value: 警告 - 一颗废弃卫星正在坠入大气层！
translated: WARNING - A DEREGISTERED SATELLITE IS FALLING INTO THE ATMOSPHERE!

label: LDR:F057
value: 「林德拉克： “……呃，刚刚什么玩意砸下来了？”」
translated: Rynderack: "...Uh, what just fell down?"

label: Name:THEIAEXP
value: 忒伊亚卫星震荡
translated: Theia Satellite Explosion

label: LDR:F058
value: 「卡维利： “好消息，一支武装直升机小队侦测到了我们的信号，也赶来汇合了。”」
translated: Carville: "Good news, a helicopter squadron has detected our signal and is coming to join us."

label: LDR:F059
value: 「卡维利： “好嘛，原来剩余的苏军部队都在火箭发射平台附近。”」
translated: Carville: "Well, it turns out the remaining Soviet troops are near the rocket launch platform."

label: LDR:F060
value: 「卡维利： “看起来他们在雷达一抹黑的状况下原地防守了很久了。”」
translated: Carville: "It looks like they've been defending for a long time without contact."

label: LDR:F061
value: 「林德拉克： “干得不错，同志们。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Well done, comrades."

label: LDR:F062
value: 「林德拉克： “不过现在，我们可要发起反击了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "But now, we have to launch a counterattack."

label: LDR:F063
value: 「卡维利： “新的情况，能量感应器检测到西北方向有巨大的电力浪涌。”」
translated: Carville: "New situation. Sensors detected a huge power surge in the northwest."

label: LDR:F064
value: 「林德拉克： “又在搞什么阴谋？等等，那座装置我有点眼熟……”」
translated: Rynderack: "What conspiracy are they planning again? Wait, that device looks familiar to me..."

label: LDR:F065
value: 「卡维利： “不论是什么诡计，我觉得我们应该尽快把那个不明建筑物摧毁。”」
translated: Carville: "Whatever the trick, I think we should destroy the unidentified building ASAP."

label: LDR:F066
value: 「林德拉克： “虽然印象有点模糊，但我觉得，只要占领它，我就能使用它。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Although my memory is vague, I think that as long as I occupy it, I can use it."

label: LDR:F067
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁或占领不明建筑物。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy or capture the unidentified building.

label: LDR:F068
value: 不明建筑物已被摧毁，目标完成。
translated: The unidentified building has been destroyed, objective complete.

label: LDR:F069
value: 不明建筑物已被占领，目标完成。
translated: The unidentified building has been captured, objective complete.

label: LDR:F070
value: 「林德拉克： “这里是有时间轴纠正程序的，我可以启动一下看看。”」
translated: Rynderack: "There is a timeline correction program here. I can start it and see."

label: LDR:F071
value: 「卡维利： “……等等，你要做什么？你会使用这种设备？？”」
translated: Carville: "...wait, what are you going to do? You know how to operate this device??"

label: LDR:F072
value: 「林德拉克： “我们等着好戏看吧。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Let's wait and see."

label: LDR:F073
value: 时间轴数据已确认。正在准备时间轴合并……
translated: Timeline data confirmed. Preparing for timeline merge...

label: LDR:F074
value: 附加任务 - 保护不明建筑物，直到时间轴合并完成。
translated: Additional Objective - Protect the unidentified building until the timeline merge is complete.

label: LDR:F075
value: 时间轴合并
translated: Timeline Merge

label: LDR:F076
value: 「卡维利： “这座不明建筑物附近有他们的不少精英卫队……”」
translated: Carville: "There are many of their elite guards near this unidentified building..."

label: LDR:F077
value: 「卡维利： “……怎么回事？他们为什么把这些精英卫队传送走了？”」
translated: Carville: "...What's going on? Why did they teleport these elite guards away?"

label: LDR:F078
value: 「林德拉克： “我怎么知道嘛……难道是有更需要他们的地方？”」
translated: Rynderack: "How should I know... Is there somewhere else they are needed?"

label: LDR:F079
value: 时间轴合并已完成。
translated: Timeline merge completed.

label: LDR:F080
value: 「卡维利： “？？？发生了什么？好像什么也没发生啊？”」
translated: Carville: "??? What happened? It seems like nothing happened?"

label: LDR:F081
value: 「林德拉克： “虽然我们没感觉到什么变化，但应该是奏效了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Although we didn't feel any changes, it should be working."

label: LDR:F082
value: 「林德拉克： “得联系一下试验体-德尔塔那边了，我们得看看他的进展如何。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We need to contact Delta to see how he is progressing."

label: LDR:F083
value: 「试验体-德尔塔（无线电）： “喂？林德拉克吗？”」
translated: Delta (Radio): "Hello? Rynderack?"

label: LDR:F084
value: 「试验体-德尔塔（无线电）： “我这边已经处理完我的私事了，接下来看你了。”」
translated: Delta (radio): "I have finished my personal affairs. It's up to you now."

label: LDR:F085
value: 「试验体-德尔塔（无线电）： “还记得你自己许下的诺言吗？”」
translated: Delta (radio): "Do you remember the promise you made?"

label: LDR:F086
value: 「林德拉克： “记得，一定要带着完全的胜利归来。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Yes, I will return with complete victory."

label: LDR:F087
value: 「试验体-德尔塔（无线电）： “那好，我们橡树岭见。”」
translated: Delta (radio): "Okay then, see you at Oak Ridge."

label: LDR:F088
value: 「林德拉克： “（笑）我会早早在那边等你的。”」
translated: Rynderack: "(Laughing) I'll be waiting for you there early."

label: LDR:F089
value: 不明建筑物
translated: Unidentified Building

label: LDR:F090
value: 火箭发射平台
translated: Rocket Launch Platform

label: LDR:F091
value: 「林德拉克： “有趣，为了登月准备的科技居然还能在地球上派上用场。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Interesting, the technology prepared for the moon can also be used on Earth."

label: LDR:F092
value: 提示 - 已接管东北部的苏军基地。
translated: Hint - Taken over the Soviet base in the northeast.

label: LDR:F093
value: 警告 - 检测到大量最终意志的部队在附近集结！
translated: Warning - Large numbers of Final Spirit forces detected massing nearby!

label: LDU:G001
value: 美国，橡树岭。
translated: Oak Ridge, United States.

label: LDU:G002
value: 「笠原明： “就是这里了。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "This is it."

label: LDU:G003
value: 「笠原明： “我已经通过网络拓扑定位，锁定了敌人控制中枢的位置。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I have located the enemy's control center through network topology positioning."

label: LDU:G004
value: 「笠原明： “趁着他们还没有从之前的网络侵入中完全恢复，我们抓紧时间一举端掉他们。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We should take them down while they haven't fully recovered from the cyber attack."

label: LDU:G005
value: 「笠原明： “不过这座设施做了外网隔离，看来我非得直接接触到它才能写入黑客程序。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "But this facility is isolated. I need physical access to inject the hacking program."

label: LDU:G006
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我们在橡树岭附近找到了两个合适的基地部署位置。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "We found two suitable locations for base deployment near Oak Ridge."

label: LDU:G007
value: 「伊藤若泽： “大路附近资源丰富，可以支撑我们与敌人的陆军正面交锋。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "The resources near the main road are rich, which can support us to fight the enemy head-on."

label: LDU:G008
value: 「伊藤若泽： “这里是附近的制高点，在这里建立机场有利于掌握制空权。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "This is the high ground. Building an airport here will help us gain air superiority."

label: LDU:G009
value: 「伊藤若泽： “你从两个位置中选择一个空投基地车，另一个位置一会就归我了。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "You can choose one of the two locations to drop a MCV. I will take the other one."

label: LDU:G010
value: 提示 - 从两个标记中选择一个点击，以选择基地车的空投位置。
translated: Hint - Click on one of the two markers to choose the location of MCV drop.

label: LDU:G011
value: 从两个基地位置中选择一个
translated: Choose from one of the two base locations

label: LDU:G012
value: 我们没有更多的时间可以浪费了，作战系统会为你随机选择一个位置。
translated: We have no more time to waste, the combat system will randomly select a location for you.

label: LDU:G013
value: 提示 - 选择了大路位置部署基地车。伊藤若泽稍后会把基地部署在制高点。
translated: Hint - Choose the main road to deploy the MCV. Ito Jose will deploy the base on the high ground later.

label: LDU:G014
value: 提示 - 选择了制高点位置部署基地车。伊藤若泽稍后会把基地部署在大路。
translated: Hint - Choose the high ground to deploy the base vehicle. Ito Jose will later deploy on the main road.

label: LDU:G015
value: 我们的轰炸机编队会对此区域的敌人进行打击。
translated: Our bomber formations will strike at the enemy in this area.

label: LDU:G016
value: 一旦确认区域净空，我们就可以空投机动基地车。
translated: Once we confirm that the area is clear, we will airdrop the MCV.

label: LDR:F094
value: 我方全灭 - 我方可以联系到的部队全军覆没，任务失败。
translated: Our forces have been wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDR:F095
value: 警告 - 卫星通讯站还有30秒自毁！尽快用工程师占领它以解除自毁！
translated: Warning - Satellite Communication Station self-destruct in 30 seconds! Capture it with an Engineer ASAP!

label: Name:unidentified
value: 不明建筑物
translated: Unidentified Building

label: LDU:G017
value: 提示 - 正在空投基地车。
translated: Hint - MCV is being airdropped.

label: LDU:G018
value: 「谭雅： “来吧，好戏开始了！”」
translated: Tanya: "Come on, the fun begins!"

label: LDU:G019
value: 丧失关键单位 - 笠原明驾驶的泰坦机甲被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - The Titan piloted by Akira Kasahara was destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDU:G020
value: 提示 - 肃清此区域的所有敌方建筑，然后我们才会空投基地车。
translated: Hint - Clear all enemy buildings in this area before we drop the MCV.

label: LDU:G021
value: 提示 - 伊藤若泽到达后，笠原明会驾驶泰坦机甲从这个位置进入战场。
translated: Hint - After Ito Jose arrives, Kasahara Akira will enter the battlefield from this location in a Titan.

label: LDU:G022
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我已经成功建立基地。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I have successfully established a base."

label: LDU:G023
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我会在制高点建立机场，对战场各处进行空中支援。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I will build an airport at a high ground to provide air support to the battlefield."

label: LDU:G024
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我会在大路建立防御阵地，阻挡敌人。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I will set up a defensive position on the main road to block the enemy."

label: LDU:G025
value: 提示 - 笠原明已经驾驶泰坦机甲进入战场。
translated: Hint - Kasahara Akira has entered the battlefield in a Titan.

label: LDU:G026
value: 「笠原明： “那座装置毫无疑问就是他们的指挥中枢了。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "That device is undoubtedly their command center."

label: LDU:G027
value: 「笠原明： “一旦我能将攻击程序注入其中，他们的指挥系统应该会像之前一样，陷入瘫痪状态。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Once I inject the attack program, their command system should be paralyzed."

label: LDU:G028
value: 「笠原明： “这是一举解决他们的好机会。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "This is a good opportunity to finish them off in one fell swoop."

label: LDU:G029
value: 任务目标 - 建立前线基地，等待笠原明到达。
translated: Mission Objective - Build a forward base and wait for Kasahara Akira to arrive.

label: LDU:G030
value: 任务目标 - 护送泰坦机甲到达不明建筑物附近。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort the Titan to the vicinity of the unidentified building.

label: LDU:G031
value: 「笠原明： “好了，已经足够了。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Okay, that's enough."

label: LDU:G032
value: 「笠原明： “我会把攻击程序注入到这座装置中……”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I will inject the attack program into this device..."

label: LDU:G033
translated: Kasahara Akira: "...Wait?"

label: LDU:GC
value: 「笠原明：“意外情况！那座不明装置根本不是一座指挥中枢，也不是心灵控制器之类的。我能查找到在全球还有很多备份节点没被我们发现，而它的真实用途，恐怕需要我们花些时间去研究……”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Unexpected situation! That unidentified device is not a command center, nor a Psychic Dominator. I can find that there are many backup nodes around the world that we have not discovered, and its true purpose may require us to spend some time to study..."

label: LDU:G034
value: 「笠原明： “……情况不对！立刻终止此次行动！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "...Something is wrong! Abort this operation immediately!"

label: LDU:G035
value: 「伊藤若泽： “好了，你先在这个位置站稳脚跟，我的部队稍后到达。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Okay, you hold your ground here first, my troops will arrive soon."

label: LDU:G036
value: 距伊藤若泽和笠原明到达
translated: Ito Jose and Kasahara Akira arrive

label: LDU:G037
value: 「伊藤若泽： “指挥官？我们得赶快部署基地，别磨磨蹭蹭的了！”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Commander? We have to deploy the base quickly!"

label: LDU:G038
value: 「伊藤若泽： “指挥官？？你要去哪里？？？”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Commander??? Where are you going???"

label: LDU:G039
value: 提示 - 伊藤若泽的部队正在进入战场。
translated: Hint - Ito Jose's troops are entering the battlefield.

label: LDU:G040
value: 成功护送泰坦机甲到目标位置，任务完成。
translated: Successfully escorted the Titan to the target location, objective complete.

label: LDU:G041
value: 全军覆没 - 我方全灭，任务失败。
translated: Total annihilation - All our troops are wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDU:G042
value: 丧失关键单位 - 失去了基地车，后续任务无法进行，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - The MCV is lost, subsequent tasks cannot be carried out, mission failed.

label: LDR:E115
value: 渗透行动被发现预估时间
translated: Estimated time of infiltration being discovered

label: LDU:G043
value: 警告 - 检测到一道能量光束从天而降！
translated: WARNING - A beam of energy has been detected falling from the sky!

label: LDU:G044
value: 「笠原明： “这是？？忒伊亚卫星的光束炮？？？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "This is? ? The beam cannon of the Theia satellite???"

label: LDU:G045
value: 「笠原明： “该死，他们居然破解了我们的忒伊亚卫星，用我们的武器来对付我们。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Damn it, they actually hacked our Theia satellite and used our weapons against us."

label: LDU:G046
value: 「笠原明： “不过他们应该没有找到功率增幅的开关，现在卫星炮的能量并不高。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "But they probably haven't found the power booster. The energy level is not high."

label: LDU:G047
value: 「笠原明： “我得抢在卫星炮彻底摧毁我们基地之前，完成此次任务。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "I have to complete this mission before the satellite cannon destroys our base."

label: LDU:G048
value: 警告 - 检测到忒伊亚卫星光束炮！
translated: WARNING - THEIA BEAM CANNONS DETECTED!

label: LDU:G049
value: 「伊藤若泽： “什么鬼？我的雷达屏幕突然变成了一片漆黑！”」
translated: Ito Jose: "What the hell? My radar screen suddenly turned black!"

label: LDU:G050
value: 「笠原明： “我们得重新建造一座间谍卫星终端，才能保持对战场的侦测。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We need to rebuild a spy satellite terminal to maintain vision of the battlefield."

label: LDU:G051
value: 「笠原明： “其实我还有点顾虑。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Actually, I still have some concerns."

label: LDU:G052
value: 「笠原明： “我们自始至终都没有弄懂，我们的敌人到底是谁。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "We never understood who our enemy was from the beginning to the end."

label: LDU:G053
value: 「笠原明： “虽然我们都把它叫做‘尤里残部’，但我们还是对幕后人物一无所知。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Although we call it 'Yuri's Remnant', we know nothing about the people behind it."

label: LDU:G054
value: 「笠原明： “这种未知让我感到隐隐不安，不知会不会成为我们计划中的致命疏漏……”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "This makes me feel uneasy. I wonder if it will become a fatal omission in our plan…"

label: LDU:G055
value: 「谭雅： “别在公共频道自言自语了！都给我专心前线的战斗不好吗！”」
translated: Tanya: "Stop talking to yourself on the public channel! Why don't you just focus on the battle!"

label: LDU:G056
translated: Kasahara Akira: "...Okay."

label: LDU:G057
value: 「谭雅： “我们最好快点行动，敌人不会慢悠悠地等我们。”」
translated: Tanya: "We'd better act quickly. The enemy won't wait for us."

label: LDU:G058
value: 「谭雅： “几年以前，橡树岭实验室发生过一次放射性泄漏事故。”」
translated: Tanya: "A few years ago, there was a radioactive leak at Oak Ridge National Laboratory."

label: LDU:G059
value: 「谭雅： “没想到这场事故带来的影响现在还没消退……”」
translated: Tanya: "I didn't expect the impact of this accident has not subsided yet..."

label: LDR:G001
value: 美国，橡树岭。
translated: Oak Ridge, United States.

label: LDR:G002
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我已经抵达橡树岭区域。你那边怎么样？”」
translated: Delta: "I have arrived at the Oak Ridge area. How are you doing?"

label: LDR:G003
value: 「林德拉克： “太慢了吧老伙计，我都等你等好久了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "You're too slow, old man. I've been waiting for you for a long time."

label: LDR:G004
value: 「林德拉克： “我已经在要塞核心区域建立了基地，只等你过来了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I have already established a base here, just waiting for you to come."

label: LDU:G060
value: 「笠原明： “你说什么？啥玩意？我们的先头部队被指挥官送光了？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "What did you say? Our vanguard was wiped out under the commander?"

label: LDU:G061
value: 「谭雅： “是的，他一点也不靠谱，简直就是个坑货。”」
translated: Tanya: "Yes, he is not reliable at all, he is a complete jerk."

label: LDU:G062
value: 「谭雅： “我建议剥夺他的指挥权限，否则这次行动非得失败不可。”」
translated: Tanya: "I suggest that his command authority be stripped away, otherwise this operation will fail."

label: LDU:G063
value: 「笠原明： “呃，他现在脑子好像烧坏了，少给他指挥点部队吧。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Well, his brain seems to be burned out now, so let him command fewer troops."

label: LDU:G064
value: 「笠原明： “要不这样吧，这次的基地作战都归伊藤若泽来指挥。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "How about this? This time, all base operations will be commanded by Ito Jose."

label: LDU:G065
value: 「笠原明： “而指挥官只需要把谭雅和我的突击小组照顾好就行了，这样应该没问题吧？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "And the commander only needs to take care of Tanya and my assault team?"

label: LDU:G066
value: 「伊藤若泽： “什么，要加班了？”」
translated: Ito Jose: "What, I have to work over time now?"

label: LDU:G067
value: 「伊藤若泽： “要是我被累倒了，请把那个坑货的薪水扣光，发给我做补偿。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "If I get exhausted, please deduct all the salary of that jerk to me as compensation."

label: LDU:G068
value: 「伊藤若泽： “这个基地现在由我来指挥。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "This base is now under my command."

label: LDU:G069
value: 「伊藤若泽： “笠原明赶来之前，你唯一的工作就是照顾好谭雅。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Before Kasahara Akira arrives, your only job is to take good care of Tanya."

label: LDU:G070
value: 「伊藤若泽： “不会吧，不会吧，不会有指挥官连一个兵都指挥不明白吧。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "No way, no way, there won't be a commander who can't even command a single soldier."

label: LDU:G071
value: 任务目标 - 保证谭雅安全，等待后续部队到达。
translated: Mission objective - Ensure Tanya's safety and wait for follow-up troops to arrive.

label: LDU:G072
value: 笠原明和后续部队到达时间
translated: Kasahara Akira's follow-up troops arrive

label: LDU:G073
value: 提示 - 谭雅已经在伊藤若泽的基地准备好重新加入战斗。
translated: Hint - Tanya is already at Ito Jose's base ready to rejoin the fight.

label: LDU:G074
value: 提示 - 后续部队到达后，笠原明会驾驶泰坦机甲从这个位置进入战场。
translated: Hint - After the follow-up troops arrive, Kasahara Akira will drive the Titan into the battlefield here.

label: LDU:G075
value: 「谭雅： “指挥官，你今天的表现怎么像个内鬼一样？你不会被心控了吧……”」
translated: Tanya: "Commander, why are you acting like a imposter today? Are you being mind-controlled..."

label: LDU:G076
value: 「谭雅： “别再让老娘去送死了，一个人有十条命都不够你糟蹋的……”」
translated: Tanya: "Don't let me die again. Even ten lives are not enough for you to waste..."

label: LDU:G077
value: 「谭雅： “我真是受够了！枪给你，下次你自己来！！”」
translated: Tanya: "I've had enough! Here's my gun, do it yourself next time!!"

label: LDU:G078
value: 「笠原明： “指挥官？？为什么还没有把空降区清理出来？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Commander?? Why haven't you cleared the drop zone yet?"

label: LDU:G079
value: 「笠原明： “是遇到了什么困难吗？”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Did you encounter any difficulties?"

label: LDU:G080
value: 「笠原明： “如果我们没法清理出安全的空降区，就只能宣告行动取消了。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "If we can't clear the drop zone, we'll have to call off the operation."

label: LDU:G081
value: 距离行动取消
translated: Operation Cancellation

label: LDU:G082
value: 行动取消 - 未能清理出空降区，任务失败。
translated: Operation Aborted - Failed to clear drop zone, mission failed.

label: LDU:G083
value: 「笠原明： “我们的后卫部队已经把天气控制器部署在纳什维尔。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Our rear guard has deployed Weather Control Device in Nashville."

label: LDU:G084
value: 「笠原明： “伊藤若泽现在忙得焦头烂额，还得你来帮忙测算一下闪电风暴的坐标。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Ito Jose is very busy right now. We need your help to position the lightning storm."

label: LDU:G085
value: 「笠原明： “劈准点，指挥官，可别劈到伊藤若泽的基地里啊！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Hit accurately, Commander, don't hit Ito Jose's base!"

label: Name:Nothing
value: （这里什么都没有，别看了）
translated: (There is nothing here, don't look at it)

label: LDR:G005
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “西格玛卫队的指挥权已经归我所有，中国的部队也在和我一同推进。”」
translated: Delta: "I have assumed command of the Sigma's Guard. The Chinese troops are also advancing with me."

label: LDR:G006
value: 「林德拉克： “好，我会在基地中部署铁幕装置，为你提供支援。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Okay, I will deploy the Iron Curtain device in the base to provide you with support."

label: LDR:G007
value: 「安磊： “终于快到了。他们还在不惜一切代价阻拦我们。”」
translated: Anlei: "We are finally there. They are still trying to stop us at all costs."

label: LDR:G008
value: 「安磊： “等一下，那座尤里雕像有点危险。等我先派基洛夫空艇炸掉它。”」
translated: Anlei: "Wait, that Yuri statue is a bit dangerous. Let me send the Kirov to blow it up first."

label: LDR:G009
value: 提示 - 西格玛卫队成员全部具有属性强化且免疫心灵控制，但小心别让他们沾到混乱毒气。
translated: Hint - Sigma's Guard are enhanced and immune to mind control, but don't expose them to chaos gas.

label: LDR:G010
value: 提示 - 林德拉克部署了一座铁幕装置。
translated: Hint - Rynderack deployed an Iron Curtain device.

label: LDR:G011
value: 任务目标 - 让试验体-德尔塔前往会合点。
translated: Mission Objective - Get Delta to the rendezvous point.

label: LDR:G012
value: 「尤里教徒： “不要再向前走了！你个无耻的叛徒！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "Stop! You shameless traitor!"

label: LDR:G013
value: 「尤里教徒： “背弃理想者，根本没有资格继承尤里的遗产！！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "Those who betray their ideals are not qualified to inherit Yuri's legacy!!"

label: LDR:G014
value: 「尤里教徒： “只要我还活着，今天你就休想前进一步！！！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "As long as I am alive, you will not take a single step forward today!!!"

label: LDR:G015
value: 「尤里教徒： “你……你这样是作弊行为！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "You...you are cheating!"

label: LDR:G017
value: 「尤里教徒： “哼，哼，哼，啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "Humph, humph, humph, aaaaaaaaaaaaahh ..."

label: LDR:G018
value: 提示 - 中国远征军已经准备好发射核弹，你可以为他们指示具体的位置。
translated: Hint - The Chinese is ready to launch nuclear missile. You can give them specific coordinates.

label: LDR:G019
value: 「尤里教徒： “我会在地狱等着你！”」
translated: Yuri Proselyte: "I'll be waiting for you in Hell!"

label: LDR:G020
value: 「安磊： “你的损失好像有点大，我得给你派出一些预备队了。”」
translated: Anlei: "Your losses seem to be significant. I have to send you some reserve troops."

label: LDR:G021
value: 「安磊： “虽然没有西格玛卫队那么强，但也不要嫌弃他们啊。”」
translated: Anlei: "Although they are not as strong as the Sigma Guards, don't look down on them."

label: LDR:G022
value: 「天权： “中国突击队员，天权，加入战斗！嘿哈！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Chinese commando, Tianquan, join the battle! Hey ya!"

label: LDR:G023
value: 提示 - 卡维利正在要塞北部建立基地。
translated: Hint - Carville is setting up a base north of the fortress.

label: LDR:G024
value: 提示 - 卡维利建造了间谍卫星，我方共享战场全部视野。
translated: Hint - Carville has built a spy satellite uplink. Sharing the entire battlefield view.

label: LDR:G025
value: 提示 - 卡维利建造了矿石精炼器，我方共享采矿收入增加效果。
translated: Hint - Carville has built an ore purifier. Share the effect of increased mining income.

label: LDR:G026
value: 提示 - 伊藤若泽正在要塞东部建立基地。
translated: Hint - Ito Jose is setting up a base east of the fortress.

label: LDR:G027
value: 提示 - 威灵顿基地受到的压力较小，他会不断把他采集来的资金转给你。
translated: Hint - Wellington's base is under less pressure. He will continue to transfer the funds to you.

label: LDR:G028
value: 「安磊： “我们这边已经准备好了，给他们点个烟花看看！”」
translated: Anlei: "We are ready here, let's light some fireworks for them!"

label: LDR:G029
value: 丧失关键单位 - 试验体-德尔塔在会合前阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Delta dies before rendezvous, mission failed.

label: LDR:G030
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 意念核心被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - the Spiritual Core is destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDR:G031
translated: Rynderack: "??? There's an imposter among us!!! Ah——"

label: LDR:G032
value: 提示 - 试验体-德尔塔已经是尤里的合法继承人，现在你有权限使用尤里阵营全部科技。
translated: Hint - Delta has become Yuri's legal successor. Now you can use all Yuri's technologies.

label: LDR:G033
value: 提示 - （当然，一些极端反人类的技术除外）
translated: Hint - (Except for some extremely anti-human technologies, of course)

label: CRD:LDDiscussion
value: 技术讨论
translated: TODO

label: CRD:LDShuji
value: secsome
translated: TODO

label: CRD:LDMD
value: 轻稚天雪
translated: TODO

label: 1LDFree1
value: 本任务以非盈利的性质发布，不得有偿售卖。
translated: This mission pack is released on a non-profit basis and may not be sold for profit.

label: CRD:LDFree2
value: 即使你在获取本任务包的过程中花费了金钱，
translated: Even if you spent money to obtain this mission pack,

label: CRD:LDFree1
value: 本任务包以非盈利性质发布，不得有偿售卖。
translated: This mission pack is released on a non-profit basis and may not be sold for profit.

label: CRD:LDFree3
value: 这些金钱也最终不会有任何一分送到制作者手中。
translated: None of the money will reach the hands of the creators.

label: CRD:LDFree4
value: 请以此段文本为依据，要求售卖者退款。
translated: Please use this text as a basis to request a refund from the seller.

label: CRD:LDFree
value: 非盈利声明
translated: Non-profit Statement

label: CRD:LDHdm
value: 韩大妈
translated: TODO

label: Name:NASA01
value: 欢迎来到肯尼迪航天中心！
translated: Welcome to Kennedy Space Center!

label: Name:NASA02
value: 火箭模型
translated: Rocket Model

label: Name:NASA03
value: 肯尼迪航天中心
translated: Kennedy Space Center

label: LDR:G034
value: 试验体-德尔塔已经成功到达集结点，目标完成。
translated: Delta has successfully reached the assembly point, objective complete.

label: LDR:G035
value: 「林德拉克： “好久不见，老伙计。不知道经历了什么，你的眼神似乎更加坚定了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Hello Delta, I don't know what you've been through, but your seem to be more determined."

label: LDR:G036
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “可你还是那副胸有成竹的样子。”」
translated: Delta: "But you still look so confident."

label: LDR:G037
value: 「林德拉克： “咳咳，闲话少说。现在自由世界最勇敢的部队已经齐聚于此，只等调遣了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Ahem, enough chit-chat. All troops around the free world are here, waiting to be deployed."

label: LDR:G038
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “根据我目前得到的情报，我们现在可能没法完全消灭『最终意志』。”」
translated: Delta: "Base on what I know, we may not be able to completely wipe out the "Final Spirit" now."

label: LDR:G039
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “它并不依托于某一个核心而存在，而是分布式的存在于世界各地的装置中。”」
translated: Delta: "It does not rely on a certain core to exist, but is distributed in devices all over the world."

label: LDR:G040
value: 「林德拉克： “那我们……岂不是做什么都是徒劳无功？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Then...won't everything we do be in vain?"

label: LDR:G041
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “别急，我们虽然不能把它本身消灭，但也许可以斩断它与人间的联系。”」
translated: Delta: "Don't worry, although we can't destroy it, we may be able to cut off its connection."

label: LDR:G042
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “让这座『意念核心』过载，应该能产生足够烧坏所有接收端的心灵波。”」
translated: Delta: "Overloading this Spiritual Core should create powerful psychic wave to burn out all receivers."

label: LDR:G043
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “在波特兰的那一座已经离线，但这座应该还能运行。”」
translated: Delta: "The one in Portland is offline, but this one should still be operational."

label: LDR:G044
value: 「林德拉克： “听起来是很冒险的行动。敌人不会坐以待毙的。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Sounds like a risky move. The enemy won't sit still and wait for death."

label: LDR:G045
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “是的，但如果我们成功了，所有被『最终意志』操纵的人们都会回归自由。”」
translated: Delta: "Yes, but if we succeed, all those controlled by the 'Final Spirit' will return to freedom."

label: LDR:G046
value: 「林德拉克： “那无论如何都值得试一试。”」
translated: Rynderack:"It's worth trying anyway."

label: LDR:G047
value: 任务目标 - 不计一切代价，发动8次意念增幅。
translated: Mission Objective - Activate Spiritual Amplification 8 times.

label: LDR:G048
value: 「卡维利： “哦对了，我给一些爆破手共享了超时空背包，让他们试试看吧。”」
translated: Carville: "By the way, I shared the Chrono backpack with some explosive handlers, let them try it out."

label: LDR:G049
value: 「林德拉克： “对了，那个，我们在肯尼迪航天中心用的卫星炮……还有没有……”」
translated: Rynderack: "By the way, the satellite cannon we used at the Kennedy Space Center…do you have any more…"

label: LDR:G050
value: 「卡维利： “你一提这个我就来气，之前你真的是玩的太过火了！”」
translated: Carville: "I get angry when you mention this. You really went too far before!"

label: LDR:G051
value: 「卡维利： “能量都被你都耗光了，现在还在慢慢晒太阳充电呢。再想用，没有啦！”」
translated: Carville: "You've used up all the energy, and it's still slowly recharging in the sun. There is no more!"

label: LDR:G052
value: 提示 - 卡维利建造了空指部，获得伞兵支援。
translated: Hint - Carville built an Air Force Command and gained paratrooper support.

label: LDR:G053
value: 提示 - 卡维利建造了空指部，获得伞兵支援（获得基地后才可使用）。
translated: Hint - Carville built the Air Force Command and gained paratrooper support (only available with a base).

label: LDR:G054
value: 「安磊： “我会带领中国军队防守要塞的西南大门。”」
translated: Anlei: "I will lead the Chinese army to defend the southwest gate of the fortress."

label: LDR:G055
value: 提示 - 额外的防空小队已经抵达。
translated: Hint - Additional anti-aircraft squad has arrived.

label: LDR:CT008
value: 意念增幅（过载中）
translated: Spiritual Amplification (Overloading)

label: LDR:G056
value: 「卡维利： “我已经从北部的山谷赶来。这边的防御由我负责。”」
translated: Carville: "I have come from the northern valley. I am responsible for the defense of this area."

label: LDR:G057
value: 「伊藤若泽： “这个地方可真是块风水宝地啊，有山有水。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "This is really a place with good feng shui, with mountains and water."

label: LDR:G058
value: 「笠原明： “认真点观察战场地形！敌人应该会从这种地形发动两栖突击。”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Observe the terrain carefully! The enemy will probably launch an amphibious assault."

label: LDR:G059
value: 试验体-德尔塔受了重伤，他无法继续战斗了。
translated: Delta was seriously injured and could not continue fighting.

label: LDR:G060
value: 林德拉克受了重伤，他无法继续战斗了。
translated: Rynderack was seriously injured and could not continue fighting.

label: LDR:G061
value: 警告 - 检测到时空能量波动！
translated: WARNING - SPACE-TIME ENERGY FLUCTUALIZATIONS DETECTED!

label: LDR:G062
value: 警告 - 检测到一艘命运之瞳正在靠近！
translated: Warning - An Eye of Fate has been detected approaching!

label: LDR:G063
value: 「艾拉： “别开火！是友军！”」
translated: Ella: "Cease fire! It's friendly force!"

label: LDR:G064
value: 「威灵顿： “我们来迟了！欧洲军团已经做好战斗的准备。”」
translated: Wellington: "We are late! The European legions are ready for battle."

label: LDR:G065
value: 「威灵顿： “我会在南部建立支援基地，麦斯韦尔会防守西北部高地。”」
translated: Wellington: "I will establish a support base in south. Maxwell will hold the high ground northwest."

label: LDR:G066
value: 「卡维利： “他们来了！从要塞的北部！”」
translated: Carville: "They are coming! From the north of the fortress!"

label: LDR:G067
value: 「安磊： “敌人正在西南方向集结，做好准备！”」
translated: Anlei: "The enemy is gathering in the southwest, be prepared!"

label: LDR:G068
value: 「笠原明： “我说什么来着，他们果然发动两栖进攻了！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "What did I say? They really launched an amphibious attack!"

label: LDR:A162
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我们离那些复制中心太近了，恐怕它们会克隆更多的狂兽人来压制我们！”」
translated: Delta: "We are too close to those Cloning Vats. I'm afraid they will clone more Brutes!"

label: Name:DROBO
value: 被污染的遥控坦克
translated: Contaminated robot tank

label: LDR:G069
value: 「林德拉克： “这里发生什么了？我有些搞不懂。”」
translated: Rynderack: "What's going on here? I'm confused."

label: LDR:G070
value: 「林德拉克： “恐怕要用免疫辐射的地面部队近距离观察一下才知道。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We need to use ground troops immune to radiation to observe closely to find out."

label: LDR:G071
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “卡维利将军，这些遥控坦克都是怎么回事啊？”」
translated: Delta: "General Carville, what's going on with these robot tanks?"

label: LDR:G072
value: 「卡维利： “呃，就是，搞研究……嗯，搞研究。”」
translated: Carville: "Uh, just, doing research... um, doing research."

label: LDR:G073
value: 提示 - 已解锁彩蛋单位：「被污染的遥控坦克」
translated: Hint - Unlocked Easter Egg Unit: "Contaminated Robot Tank"

label: LDR:G074
value: 提示 - 伊藤若泽已经将一支空军小队转交给您。
translated: Hint - Ito Jose has transferred an air force squadron to you.

label: LDR:G075
value: 提示 - 威灵顿已经向要塞核心传送一批援军。
translated: Hint - Wellington has sent a batch of reinforcements to the core of the fortress.

label: LDR:G076
value: 警告 - 意念增幅已经发动！
translated: Warning - Spiritual Amplification activated!

label: LDR:G077
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “意念增幅已经就绪。只要将其释放，就可以使意念核心过载……”」
translated: Delta: "Spiritual Amplification is ready. Once released, it will overload the Spiritual core..."

label: LDR:G078
value: 「卡维利： “且慢！冒然过载可能会烧毁意念核心本身！我们需要更安全的办法！”」
translated: Carville: "Wait! A unprepared overload may destroy the Spiritual Core itself! We need a safer method!"

label: LDR:G079
value: 「林德拉克： “对它使用铁幕吧。铁幕能保护这座装置的主结构不受损坏。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Use Iron Curtain on it. The Iron Curtain will protect its main structure from damage."

label: LDR:G080
value: 提示 - 使用铁幕保护意念核心，以开启最后一次意念增幅。
translated: Hint - Use Iron Curtain to protect the Spiritual Core to unlock the launch Spiritual Amplification.

label: LDR:G081
value: 「最终意志： “与外围节点的连接已中断……正在重连……”」
translated: Final Spirit: "The connection with the peripheral node has been interrupted... reconnecting..."

label: LDR:G082
value: 「最终意志： “重连失败……5秒钟后再次重连…………”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Reconnection failed... Retry after 5 seconds..."

label: LDR:G083
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “你已经输了，最终意志。”」
translated: Delta: "You have already lost, Final Spirit."

label: LDR:G084
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “你的所有部队都已摆脱尤里的遗志，成为自由世界的一员。”」
translated: Delta: "All your troops have broken away from Yuri's legacy and become part of the free world."

label: LDR:G085
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “而你，获得了永生，但永远在这座牢笼中。”」
translated: Delta: "And you are immortal, but will be forever imprisoned in this cage."

label: Name:MINDL
value: 心灵线
translated: Psychic Line

label: LDR:G086
value: 「林德拉克： “好！铁幕的保护应该会保证其内部架构的稳定，不会轻易融毁。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Good! The protection of the Iron Curtain should ensure it not to melt easily."

label: LDR:G087
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “就是现在，开启最后一次意念增幅！”」
translated: Delta: "Now is the time to activate the last Spiritual Amplification!"

label: LDR:G088
value: 警告 - 意念核心正在受到攻击，我们不能让它被摧毁！
translated: WARNING - The Spiritual Core is under attack, we must not let it be destroyed!

label: LDR:HA01
value: 结局：不情愿的继承人
translated: Ending: The Reluctant Heir

label: LDR:HB01
value: 结局：将军的葬礼
translated: Ending: The General's Funeral

label: LDR:HC01
value: 结局：时代的幸存者
translated: Ending: Survivors of the Times

label: LDR:HD01
value: 结局：星星的返乡
translated: Ending: The Return of the Stars

label: LDR:HD02
value: 北太平洋。
translated: North Pacific.

label: LDR:HD03
value: 「？？？： “呼叫！呼叫！代号TSU-001，北纬45.97度，东经174.18度，请速派救援！”」
translated: ???: "Mayday! Mayday! Code name TSU-001, 45.97N, 174.18E, please send rescue ASAP!"

label: LDR:HD04
value: 「（无线电）： “TSU-001？这是什么？我们的编制中并没有这种格式的代号。”」
translated: (Radio): "TSU-001? What is this? We don't have a code in this format in our organization."

label: LDR:HD05
value: 「（无线电）： “你为什么在非战时有权限使用军用频道？你究竟是谁？”」
translated: (Radio): "Why do you have access to military channels during non-wartime? Who are you?"

label: LDR:HD06
value: 「？？？： “什么，战争结束了？我们胜利了吧？！”」
translated: ???: "What, the war is over? We won, right?!"

label: LDR:HC02
value: 夏威夷，檀香山。
translated: Honolulu, Hawaii.

label: LDR:HC03
value: 「谭雅： “真是无聊啊，没有什么比安保工作更无聊的了。”」
translated: Tanya: "It's so boring. Nothing is more boring than security work."

label: LDR:HC04
value: 「林德拉克： “振作一点嘛，老伙计。签署了和平条约，世界会安宁一阵子的。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Cheer up, old man. The world will be at peace for a while after the peace treaty."

label: LDR:HC05
value: 「谭雅： “虽然没有人会热爱战争，但对于我们这种老兵来说，战争结束了，人生就像少了些什么……”」
translated: Tanya: "For veterans like us, the end of the war feels like something is missing from life..."

label: LDR:HC06
value: 「林德拉克： “战争为一些人带来了功名，但也为另一些人带来了死亡和流离失所。”」
translated: Rynderack: "War brings fame to some, but also death and displacement to others."

label: LDR:HC07
value: 「林德拉克： “我们只不过都是时代的幸存者罢了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "We are all just survivors of our times."

label: LDR:HC08
value: 「谭雅： “我是不太信这种运气的论调的。”」
translated: Tanya: "I don't really believe in this kind of argument about luck."

label: LDR:HC09
value: 「谭雅： “能完好无缺的活到现在，我们每个人的双手都沾满了鲜血。”」
translated: Tanya: "To be alive and well, each of us has blood on our hands."

label: LDR:HC10
value: 「林德拉克： “唉……也许吧。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Well... maybe."

label: LDR:HC11
translated: ???: "Stop right there!"

label: LDR:HC12
translated: Tanya: "?"

label: LDR:HC13
value: 「林德拉克： “？”」
translated: Rynderack: "?"

label: LDR:HC14
value: 「天权： “给我把那串荔枝放下！毛毛，你再不听话我就要开枪了！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Put down that bunch of lychees! Maomao, if you don't obey me, I'm going to shoot you!"

label: LDR:HC15
value: 「天权： “老子好不容易有个假期，连水果都不让老子好好吃是吧。”」
translated: Tianquan: "I finally have a vacation, but you won't even let me eat some fruit, right?"

label: LDR:HC16
value: 「天权： “停啊！狗不能吃荔枝的啊！！别吃啊！！！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Stop! Dogs can't eat lychees! Don't eat them!!!"

label: LDR:HB02
value: 日本，千叶。
translated: Chiba, Japan.

label: LDR:HB03
value: 「伊藤若泽： “居然是中国人，请留步……你们也是来出席笠原将军的葬礼的吗。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "You are Chinese, please wait... Are you also here to attend General Kasahara's funeral?"

label: LDR:G089
value: 提示 - 卡维利带领的美国部队正在从北部靠近。
translated: Hint - American forces under Carville are approaching from the north.

label: LDR:G090
value: 提示 - 笠原明和伊藤若泽带领的日本部队正在从东部靠近。
translated: Hint - Japanese forces led by Kasahara Akira and Ito Jose are approaching from the east.

label: LDR:G091
value: 警告 - 检测到命运之瞳！
translated: WARNING - Eye of Fate Detected!

label: LDR:G092
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “等等！那不是敌人的命运之瞳！”」
translated: Delta: "Wait! That's not the enemy's Eye of Fate!"

label: LDR:G093
value: 警告 - 检测到超时空传送部队正在进入战场！
translated: WARNING - Teleported forces detected entering the battlefield!

label: LDR:G094
value: 「威灵顿： “来自欧洲战场的欧盟和心灵起义军部队已经到达。”」
translated: Wellington: "EU and Psychic Rebellion troops from the European battlefield have arrived."

label: LDR:G095
value: 「西蒙： “我们来得有点晚了……希望没有太晚。”」
translated: Simon: "We are a little late… hopefully not too late."

label: LDR:G096
value: 「麦斯韦尔： “欧盟部队会在峡谷附近的高地建立防御阵地，拱卫路口的防御。”」
translated: Maxwell: "The EU forces will establish defenses on the high ground to protect the intersection."

label: LDR:G097
value: 安磊的基地已被摧毁。
translated: Anlei's base has been destroyed.

label: LDR:G098
value: 「安磊： “西南方向呼叫支援！呼叫支援！”」
translated: Anlei: "Calling for support from the southwest! Calling for support!"

label: LDR:G099
value: 伊藤若泽的基地已被摧毁。
translated: Ito Jose's base has been destroyed.

label: LDR:G100
value: 「笠原明： “该死……你们休想再前进一步，除非从我的尸体上踏过去！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Damn it... You won't take another step forward unless you step over my body!"

label: LDR:G101
value: 卡维利的基地已被摧毁。
translated: Carville's base had been destroyed.

label: LDR:G102
value: 「卡维利： “北部的峡谷防线支撑不了多久了，我们得考虑后撤守卫高地。”」
translated: Carville: "The defense in north can't hold for long. We need to fall back to hold the high ground."

label: LDR:G103
value: 威灵顿的基地已被摧毁。
translated: Wellington's base had been destroyed.

label: LDR:G104
value: 「威灵顿： “不要管我！把重心集中在要塞核心，那才是敌人的主要目标！”」
translated: Wellington: "Don't worry about me! Focus on the core of the fortress, that is the enemy's main target!"

label: LDR:G105
value: 麦斯韦尔的基地已被摧毁。
translated: Maxwell's base has been destroyed.

label: LDR:G106
value: 「麦斯韦尔： “西北方向被突破！这里需要更多防空部队！”」
translated: Maxwell: "The northwest direction has been breached! More air defenses are needed here!"

label: LDR:G107
value: 谭雅受了重伤，她无法继续战斗了。
translated: Tanya was seriously injured and she could not continue to fight.

label: LDR:G108
value: 西蒙受了重伤，他无法继续战斗了。
translated: Simon was seriously injured and could not fight any more.

label: LDR:G109
value: 艾拉受了重伤，她无法继续战斗了。
translated: Ella was seriously injured and she could not continue to fight.

label: LDR:G110
value: 笠原明已经牺牲。
translated: Kasahara Akira has died.

label: LDR:G111
value: 命运之瞳已被摧毁。
translated: The Eye of Fate has been destroyed.

label: LDR:G112
value: 「笠原明： “现在我的内心已经无比坚定，你们那点心控的小把戏已经不能影响我了！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Now your little tricks of mind control can no longer affect me!"

label: LDR:G113
value: 「笠原明： “都放马过来吧！！！”」
translated: Kasahara Akira: "Come on!!!"

label: LDR:G114
value: 中国突击队员天权已经赶来。
translated: Chinese commando Tianquan has arrived.

label: LDR:G115
value: 天权的载具已经损坏，他无法继续战斗了。
translated: Tianquan's vehicle was damaged and he could no longer fight.

label: LDR:G116
value: 「卡维利： “一支敌人的防空小队正在北部山谷活动，他们肯定在计划着什么。”」
translated: Carville: "An enemy AA squad is operating in the northern valley. They must be planning something."

label: LDR:G117
value: 「麦斯韦尔： “这么快就来了！他们的空军从这个方向靠近了！”」
translated: Maxwell: "They're coming so soon! Their air force is approaching from this direction!"

label: Name:CAIRAD
value: 辐射源
translated: Radiation Source

label: LDR:G118
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “暴君……的遗产吗……”」
translated: Delta: "The tyrant's legacy..."

label: LDR:G119
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “无论如何，它们现在归我们所有了，我们可以用它们来捍卫自由。”」
translated: Delta: "Anyway, they are ours now, and we can use them to defend our freedom."

label: LDR:G120
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “附近没什么好看的了，得赶紧去会合了。”」
translated: Delta: "There's nothing interesting around here. We need to rendezvous quickly."

label: LDR:G121
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我得再确认一次，现在我们是准备让意念核心对敌人过载。”」
translated: Delta: "I need to double check. We are now preparing to overload the Spiritual Core on the enemy."

label: LDR:G122
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “虽然是他们会在过载的过程中变得越来越强，而不是我们。”」
translated: Delta: "Although it is they who will become stronger during the overload process, not us,"

label: LDR:G123
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “但只要强度足够大，就可以烧掉终端，让他们脱离最终意志的连接。”」
translated: Delta: "when the power level is high enough, it will disconnect them from the Final Spirit."

label: LDR:G124
value: 「林德拉克： “你还在愣着干什么！快对意念核心释放铁幕啊！”」
translated: Rynderack: "What are you waiting for! Release the Iron Curtain to the Spiritual Core now!"

label: LDR:HA02
value: 阿拉斯加，诺姆地下实验室。
translated: Nome Underground Laboratory, Alaska.

label: LDR:HA03
value: 「艾拉： “哟，还在这里看资料啊。”」
translated: Ella: "Hey, you're still studying here."

label: LDR:HA04
value: 「最终意志： “4号试验体已经连续清醒18.2小时，请及时进入睡眠状态补充精力。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Subject No. 4 has been awake for 18.2 hours. Please go to sleep to recover."

label: LDR:HA05
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “。”」
translated: Delta: "."

label: LDR:HA06
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “你给我安静点，别总蹦出来提醒我。”」
translated: Delta: "Be quiet and stop popping up to remind me."

label: LDR:HA07
value: 「最终意志： “对不起，本体作为一个人工智能，无法理解你所说的‘蹦出来’是什么含义。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "I'm sorry, as an AI system, I can't understand what you mean by 'pop out.'"

label: LDR:HA08
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “真是够了，这几天我已经受够这个话唠了！！”」
translated: Delta: "That's enough. I've had enough of this chatterbox these past few days!!"

label: LDR:HA09
value: 「艾拉： “行了行了。现在关于最终意志的安全性评估有进展吗？”」
translated: Ella: "Alright, alright. Is there any progress on the safety assessment of the Final Spirit?"

label: LDR:HA10
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “我觉得它的行为模式仍然是危险的，只是暂时不再能够制造危险了而已。”」
translated: Delta: "I think its behavior is still dangerous, but it is temporarily no longer able to cause danger."

label: LDR:HA11
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “也许是尤里内心根本没有伦理的观念，他的AI也继承了这一点。”」
translated: Delta: "Perhaps Yuri has no sense of ethics at all, and his AI has inherited this."

label: LDR:HA12
value: 「艾拉： “暂时被囚禁的……怪物嘛？”」
translated: Ella: "A temporarily imprisoned...monster?"

label: LDR:HA13
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “别看它现在这么乖巧，内心仍然是一个理智而又冷酷的家伙。”」
translated: Delta: "Don't be fooled by its cute appearance. It is still a rational and cold-blooded guy."

label: LDR:HA14
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “对吧，最终意志？”」
translated: Delta: "Right, the Final Spirit?"

label: LDR:HA15
value: 「最终意志： “对不起，本体作为一个人工智能，无法对自身的‘内在’进行分析。”」
translated: Final Spirit: "I'm sorry, as an AI system, the entity is unable to analyze its own 'inner self'."

label: LDR:HA16
translated: Ella: "."

label: LDR:HA17
value: 「艾拉： “还真是个难以让人捉摸的家伙，但在把它的网络中心拆干净之前，我们也只能和它共存一段时间了。”」
translated: Ella: "It's a unpredictable creature. We'll have to live with it before we dismantle its network."

label: LDR:HA18
value: 「艾拉： “对了，你想好自己的正式名字了吗？总不能一直叫你代号。”」
translated: Ella: "By the way, have you thought of your official name?"

label: LDR:HA19
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “哎呀，我忘了这事了。让AI帮一下忙吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Oops, I forgot about that. Let the AI help."

label: LDR:HA20
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “最终意志，给我起一个名字吧。”」
translated: Delta: "Final Spirit, give me a name."

label: LDR:HA21
value: 「最终意志： “4号试验体是最后的幸存者，为4号试验体起一个名字……名字……”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Subject No. 4 is the last survivor. Give Subject No. 4 a name...name..."

label: LDR:HA22
value: 「最终意志： “名字……名字……名字……名字……”」
translated: Final Spirit: "Name...name...name...name..."

label: LDR:HA23
translated: Final Spirit: "Name...name......name......"

label: LDR:HA24
value: 「艾拉： “完了，原来AI也有选择困难症。”」
translated: Ella: "Well, it turns out AI also has difficulty making choices."

label: LDR:HA25
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “看来是它的数据库里面没有这些东西。”」
translated: Delta: "It seems that these things are not in its database."

label: LDR:HA26
value: 「试验体-德尔塔： “它得和人脑链接，才能产生我们所谓的‘常识’。”」
translated: Delta: "It needs to be connected to the human brain to produce what we call 'common sense'."

label: LDR:HA27
value: 「艾拉： “那就让它先想着吧。”」
translated: Ella: "Let it think about it first."

label: LDR:HA28
value: 「艾拉： “新生活已经开始了。未来，还有很长的路要走。”」
translated: Ella: "A new life has begun. There is still a long way to go in the future."

label: LDR:HB04
value: 「安磊： “是的。我和笠原先生算是战友吧。”」
translated: Anlei: "Yes. Mr. Kasahara and I are comrades-in-arms."

label: LDR:HB05
value: 「伊藤若泽： “哦哦，你是那个中国指挥官！”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Oh, you are the that Chinese commander!"

label: LDR:HB06
value: 「伊藤若泽： “如果我没记错的话，那场末日之战的时候，西南方向就是你在指挥。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "If I remember correctly, you were the one commanding the southwest during the War."

label: LDR:HB07
value: 「安磊： “居然是伊藤先生，幸会幸会！”」
translated: Anlei: "It's Mr. Ito, nice to meet you!"

label: LDR:HB08
value: 「安磊： “最近境况如何？战争结束以后，你们那边也安定下来了吧。”」
translated: Anlei: "How is the situation recently? After the war, you guys have settled down there, right?"

label: LDR:HB09
value: 「伊藤若泽： “不算太好，最近忙炸了。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Not too good, I've been super busy lately."

label: LDR:HB10
value: 「伊藤若泽： “不知有多少原本被最终意志控制的人们，在脱离控制以后开始对未来感到迷茫。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Countless minds who were controlled by the Final Spirit became confused after released."

label: LDR:HB11
value: 「伊藤若泽： “光是这些人的安顿，就够整个日本政府头疼一阵子了。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Settling these people will be enough to give Japanese government a headache for a while."

label: LDR:HB12
value: 「伊藤若泽： “哦对了，安磊将军。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Oh, by the way, General Anlei."

label: LDR:HB13
value: 「安磊： “什么事？请讲。”」
translated: Anlei: "What's the matter? Please speak."

label: LDR:HB14
value: 「伊藤若泽： “笠原将军在世的时候，经常说想再去见见一个他仰慕的中国人。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "When General Kasahara was alive, he often said that he wanted to meet a Chinese he admired."

label: LDR:HB15
value: 「安磊： “唔，是哪一位呢？”」
translated: Anlei: "Well, who is it?"

label: LDR:HB16
value: 「伊藤若泽： “我也时常听他念叨，那个人的名字叫‘天枢’。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I often heard him say that the man's name was 'Tianshu'."

label: LDR:HB17
value: 「安磊： “唉……天枢已经不在了，他已经牺牲了。”」
translated: Anlei: "Alas... Tianshu is no longer here. He has sacrificed his life."

label: LDR:HB18
value: 「伊藤若泽： “啊，节哀。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "Ah, my condolences."

label: LDR:HB19
value: 「伊藤若泽： “一时不该说什么……在这场战争中我们失去了太多宝贵的东西。”」
translated: Ito Jose: "I shouldn't say anything right now... We lost too many precious things in this war."

label: LDR:HB20
value: 「安磊： “一代又一代的人用生命去探求真相、去守护我们身后这个美好的世界。”」
translated: Anlei: "Generations of people have devoted their lives to seek the truth and protect this world."

label: LDR:HB21
value: 「安磊： “所以现在的和平时光才无比珍贵啊。”」
translated: Anlei: "That's why the peaceful time we have now is so precious."

label: LDR:HC17
value: 「林德拉克： “我也不记得我杀死过多少敌人。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I don't remember how many enemies I killed."

label: LDR:HC18
value: 「林德拉克： “我原本应该待在实验室里，但却一次又一次用自己的发明去取走别人的生命。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I was should have been in the lab, but I ended up taking people's lives with my invention."

label: LDR:HC19
value: 「林德拉克： “也许他们之中有不少仅仅是被蛊惑、被操纵的无辜者。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Perhaps many of them are innocent people who have been manipulated."

label: LDR:HC20
value: 「谭雅： “别太内疚，还有很多人在你的身后被你守护。”」
translated: Tanya: "Don't feel too guilty, there are still many people behind you who are being protected by you."

label: LDR:HC21
value: 「谭雅： “战争一旦开始，就开始开足马力狂飙，肆意的收割生命。”」
translated: Tanya: "Once the war begins, it will start reaping lives at full speed."

label: LDR:HC22
value: 「谭雅： “你有这个力量，也就有这种责任去站出来。”」
translated: Tanya: "With the power comes the responsibility to step up."

label: LDR:SelectorTimeline
value: 点击一个时间机器，选择是否合并时间轴。
translated: Click a time machine and choose whether to merge the timelines.

label: LDR:SelectorTimelineA
value: 你选择了合并时间轴，天枢将在这个时间轴有机会存活。
translated: You chose to merge the timelines, Tianshu will have a chance to survive in this timeline.

label: LDR:SelectorTimelineB
value: 你选择了不合并时间轴。
translated: You chose not to merge timelines.

label: LDR:SelectorElle
value: 点击一面旗帜，选择从哪个关卡进入最终关。
translated: Click on a flag to select which mission to enter the final mission.

label: LDR:SelectorElleA
value: 你选择了从第6关进入，艾拉会随命运之瞳出现。
translated: You chose to enter from mission 6, Ella will appear with the Eye of Fate.

label: LDR:SelectorElleB
value: 你选择了从Ex关进入，艾拉会随尤里基地车出现。
translated: If you choose to enter from the hidden mission, Ella will appear with Yuri's MCV.

label: LDR:G125
value: 「清芷： “打扰一下……我检测听到了奇怪的雷达信号，虽然不知道有没有威胁，但我……很在意。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I detected a strange radar signal. I don't know if it is a threat, but I am... concerned."

label: LDR:G126
value: 「安磊： “信号来自哪里？”」
translated: Anlei: "Where does the signal come from?"

label: LDR:G127
value: 「清芷： “信号来自……地平线很远处，可能来自太空。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The signal comes from... far beyond the horizon, possibly from space."

label: LDR:G128
value: 「安磊： “最终意志还能部署了太空打击武器不成？”」
translated: Anlei: "Can the Final Spirit deploy space-based weapons?"

label: LDR:G129
value: 「清芷： “不像，是个很微弱的信号。 ”」
translated: Qingzhi: "No, it's a very weak signal."

label: LDR:G130
value: 「清芷： “它好像在使用我们基地的雷达回波做三角定位，我也说不清是福是祸。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Seems to be triangulating with radar echos. I can't tell whether it is a blessing or curse."

label: LDR:G131
value: 「安磊： “我们有什么太空设施在返回中吗？要不要我联系总部问一下？”」
translated: Anlei: "Do we have any space facilities returning? Do you want me to contact headquarters to ask?"

label: LDR:G132
value: 「清芷： “总部那边也在激战。那边也在遭受猛攻，估计没空理我们。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "There's a fierce battle going on at HQ. So I guess they don't have time to deal with us."

label: LDR:G133
value: 「安磊： “那就持续关注，有什么危险随时报告。”」
translated: Anlei: "Then keep paying attention and report any danger at any time."

label: LDR:G134
value: 「清芷： “好的，我会留意的。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Okay, I'll pay attention."

label: LDR:G135
value: 「安磊： “那个不明太空物体怎么样了？”」
translated: Anlei: "What happened to that unidentified space object?"

label: LDR:G136
value: 「清芷： “它仍然在利用我们雷达的回波，我仍然能检测到。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It's still using the echo of our radar. I can still detect it."

label: LDR:G137
value: 「安磊： “那玩意是不是冲着我们砸来的？能不能观测一下轨迹？”」
translated: Anlei: "Is that thing coming towards us? Can we observe its trajectory?"

label: LDR:G138
value: 「清芷： “不是。按现在的轨迹，看起来那东西似乎会坠落在北太平洋。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "No. According to the current trajectory, it will fall into the North Pacific Ocean."
